review_body: This little baby is awesome! I got it primarily to take with me when I travel, but now I use it at home instead of my regular hair dryer. It gets really hot (but not so hot that it has singed my hair or anything), and it has a lot of power for such a small blow dryer. Very lightweight too. Love it!

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: Our first Conair lasted 7 years of daily rigorous use. This replacement is a clone in every respect and fits the bill, compact, lightweight and powerful. The price is right as well.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Worked ok for a year and then the high setting crapped out-Also a bit in the heavy side-I guess a percentage will be lemons like mine

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I tried this blow dryer at a hotel and loved it. I ordered it when I got home and was not disappointed. This blow dryer is powerful and does the job efficiently!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I was looking for a quiet hair dryer that worked well & this one is perfect.  A little difficult to work the buttons one handed at first, but I'm sure that I just have to get used to it  -- i recommend it without reservation.

product_title: conair 1875 watt ergonomic handle hair dryer
review_body: Not very hot and not very strong.  I guess I shouldn't have expected much for ten bucks but at least a little more umph!  Not fabulous but a get what you pay for my toddler doesn't run away from it kind of deal that's why I gave 4 stars.  She is 2 and doesn't mind on high it blowing in her face some!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I will never go back to a hair dryer that doesn't have a retractable cord. Its amazing and so much more organized than they use to be. Maybe i'm late on this new technology but its great. Hair dryer itself is amazing as well and does the job in minutes.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: I'll keep it - at least for now
review_body:
Thie texture on this dryer feels nice, but it's much heavier than my last one. It hasn't gotten "sticky" as some have noted, but I've only used it for a few weeks. It comes with a tiny diffuser, which was good, because my diffuser doesn't fit it. I wish I could get a larger one, but I'll have to look at an after market one - I'll probably have to take the dryer with me to make sure it will stay on. The dryer is pretty quiet and powerful, which is nice.

One of the things I would change is the location of the buttons. I never fail to change the speed or heat when I'm using it. I use a stronger grip on it due to the weight, so it's easier for me to hit a button on accident.

I wouldn't "not" recommend it, but I would suggest to keep looking a little bit more.

product_title: conair 1875 watt ergonomic handle hair dryer
review_body: all hair dryers should have just the "cool" air function.  I like it, others like it the cool air is powerful and I think it does not make my hair fall off. get it.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_headline: i'm very happy with my purchase
review_body: I love this Hair Dryer. I have thick long hair and it take around 5 mins to dry my hair.. Love it

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I've only ever used Conair (I've tried the T3 and other fancy dryers and they are horrible, not to mention they don't come with diffusers) and it's always been good on my curls. The heat output on this one is insane, and my hair always looks good. Only problem is that I've had the thing for a few months, and the diffuser is completely melted. All the little sticks are bent down and it gets tangled in my hair. Conair should either answer their customer service emails or sell diffusers separately as well so I'm not left without one. FRUSTRATED.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: So far so good. I've had it about 2 months. Cord still retracts and dries my thick hair fast with minimal frizz.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body:
Great product, great airflow. I bought one a few years back. Still working.
A little big for travel. However I bought another for the guest bath.
Everything I've ever wanted in a hair blower.
Delivery was prompt.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Reasonably priced, light, works well, you can turn off the heat so that it's just blowing room temperature air which is safer for your hair...got it for the GF who loves it.  Amazon's price is much better than anything I could find locally.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I use this as my home hairdryer, not just when I'm traveling although the bag it comes with makes it perfect for that too. It doesn't have a lot of power but my hair is really fine so a lot of hairdryers seem a little bit of overkill for me. I wouldn't recommend it for someone with really thick hair though as it might take a lot longer to dry.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
This blow dryer replaced the ancient one I had been using for the last 5 years, so surpassing my standards may not have been too difficult.

It takes about 6 minutes to blow my long, medium thickness hair dry, which seems very quick to me! And the volume is such that I can have a conversation with raised voice while blowing my hair dry.

Overall very satisfied! Hopefully it lasts beyond this first month of ownership.

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: This works fabulous! Dries my hair in 1/2 the time and works great for getting hair straight before using my HSI professional hair straightener, followed with HSI Argan Oil. Worth every PENNY :)

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body:
Pros:

Good amount of drying power considering how small it is
Perfect size for travel
Dual voltage works great--no explosions when I brought this dryer to Europe!

Cons:

Plastic piece that changes the voltage has fallen out twice! :-(
When using in Europe, the wind is very powerful....but that's good for me because my thick hair dries faster.

Bottom line: I do like everything about the dryer except for that darn plastic piece that falls out. If that we're not an issue, this would get 5 stars.

product_title: t3 bespoke labs 83808-se featherweight professional ionic ceramic tourmaline hair dryer
review_headline: Good while it lasted, which was 1 1/2 years
review_body:
First off, the hair dryer worked great when it was working. You can read the other reviews about how well it works.

BUT -- the wire slowly starts to twist and it's not possible to fully untwist it. It has to do with the rubber that covers the copper wire. Well, this morning the wire completely disconnected from the hairdryer itself. There was no smoke, fire, etc. It just twisted off. This is poor construction and something that you'd expect from a cheap product, not from something that's $100+.

Giving it 2 stars because when it was working it was great, but a $100+ hair dryer should last longer than a year and a half. $30 hair dryers may suck, but they are at least built to last longer than this one.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_headline: This hairdryer is a danger to the user
review_body: After about a year this hair dryer started making a buzzing sound.  When I disassembled it, I could see that the blades were breaking allowing the blades to rub against the housing causing the buzzing sound.  Had I not seen this, the blades would have eventually broken off and fired out at the user.  There has been no recall so all the products are suspect.  Do not buy this product.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Should've returned this. Not hot enough..at all, buttons are in weird place. As you're drying your hair, you inevitably hit the off button, or another speed. Super annoying.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This hair dryer is easy to use and has lots of power. The rubberized texture is easy to grip and hold.

product_title: hands free hair dryer holder - compact for home and travel! by jumbl
review_body: Best $10 bucks spent. Put in on my mirror. Salon looking blowouts in minutes.  Why didn't I get this sooner?

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: My husband uses the hairdryer a lot more than I do. He does not care for the way it works and the lack of settings. He is considering replacing it or removing it altogether.

product_title: remington compact ionic travel hair dryer, (colors vary) d5000
review_body: I have had these for sooo long without any regret (except for blowing my hair out)...  Small, compact, quality product.  How often do you hear that about a small hair dryer?  Great product and for the price...

product_title: conair 207p infinity tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Of all of the dryers I've owned in my life- this is my favorite.  I've only been using it for 3 days and I'm in love!

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: This dryer is very light weight, two heat and air settings, dries hair quickly and quietly. Very glad i was able to locate it after using it in a hotel i recently stayed in.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_headline: Nice smooth hardware. Does the job.
review_body: Nice quality feel. Smooth operating switches. Not too garish a color like those bright red Conairs. Unique. Nice. Happy with purchase.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: This does dry my hair.  It is very light and compact but it does not have a lot of power even for my short hair!

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Nice ceramic dryer for a low price
review_body: I discovered this hair dryer at an upscale hotel in  Boston and took a photo of it with my phone to remember to research it. I am pleased with my purchase, it is lightweight and travels well.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: Works just fine, and has a heavier, quality "feel" than the cheaper ones. Mounts easy, and looks fine on the wall.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_body: "You get what you pay for". Don't get cheep like me, this hair dryer  is loud! Even though it is identical tech specs to its big sister the Infinity Cord-Keeper , it's the bigger that's better. The larger version acts like a muffler. Spend the extra $20 bucks. I did, the real deal is now on order.

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_headline: loved it until it died only a few months after purchase
review_body: I purchased this blow dryer a few months ago loved the product until it randomly DIED the other day. Fortunately I had saved my old one, or I would have had to leave the house in freezing weather with a wet head. Not pleased.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: This is the second time I've purchased this hair dryer as I loved the first one so much.  It gets hot enough to straighten as it dries.  Would recommend highly.

product_title: babyliss nano titanium portofino 6600 hair dryer, leopard
review_headline: Leopard Babyliss Portofino 6600 from Beauty And is a legit machine
review_body: I received my leopard Babyliss dryer from Beauty And, and I believe it is the real thing - not a counterfit. The packaging, accessories, and dryer all appear to be very well-made with great attention to detail. The cord is quite thick and long; you can tell by the cord alone that it is a powerful machine. It is the best hairdryer I have ever owned and it dried my very long fine blonde hair in under 5 minutes, without much heat at all (seems like it would cause less damage to hair). It is certainly worth the $59.95 I paid for it.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: Loved my Andis but it just exploded while drying my hair. Plastic everywhere, lucky no one was hurt. I don't hate it but it could be unsafe! trying to decide if I want another one or switch brands.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I joked that at $10, this hair dryer will be lucky to last one year. It lasted a month. By the time I checked to return it, I had missed the deadline to do so - by one day. Yup. This baby died quickly. Sometimes, you indeed get what you pay for.

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Compact for travel and very powerful.can't beat it for the price. Recommend it for anyone looking for a travel hairdryer or enen great for home use.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: A gift for my 11 year old daughter. She has thick hair and she has had no complaints with it

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I love this blow dryer! It's the most user friendly dryer I have ever used. It is well made & dries hair very nicely, without burning it. I love the retractable cord. The blow dryer folds shut so it's easier to store.  Cant believe I found such a great affordable blow dryer.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
Curly hair here. I think it does dry faster, but my old machine was pretty worn out.

I love that there is an actual setting for cool air plus the button for a shot of it.

My finger always ached after using my last one, which only had that blue button and not the addt'l setting.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: The cord was hanging down and my puppies chewed it to pieces. Used one time what a was of my money

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: Impossible to find in retail stores.
review_body: Works well.  Very convenient to use.  Just like in hotels.  Compact design takes up very little room on the wall.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Whom ever designed this hair dryer had to be stoned! They put the power switch buy your pinky finger so your constantly turning the dryer off every time you grip the handle. The "High" heat is ok, could be better. But as the old saying goes..."You get what you pay for!!" So true.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: I LIKE AND IT WAS VERY AFFORDABLE.I USED IT TODAY FOR THE FIRST TIME AND I WAS PLEASED.I WAS SKEPTICAL ABOUT IT BUT IT SAVED ME MONEY:-)

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: It's a basic hairdryer...without a diffuser and hardly functioning retractable cord
review_body:
So disappointed! Scrutinized the reviews before ordering this and totally disappointed.
Pros: The low, medium and high work fine. The cool shot, when held down works fine.
It does fold without issue.

Cons: Thank goodness I decided to err on the side of caution and test this out as soon as I took it out of the box. The retractable cord DOES NOT RETRACT ALL THE WAY! There is a good 7" of cord that can not be retracted because of a stopper that can not be moved or removed. The part that should fully retract did not, after 30 seconds of CAREFUL use.

There is no diffuser. The little black piece that is shown in the pic does not a diffuser make.

Ordered yesterday and returning today, enough said.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Wonderful product. Very well constructed and aesthetically pleasing. I would recommend this product to anyone who appreciates top quality at a reasonable price. WNC

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Purchase this item use it once and it's already in the box to be return. My daughter have natural hair so its all it easier to come her hair when it's blow dry and this could bit do the job at all.

product_title: conair 1875 watt ergonomic handle hair dryer
review_body: would recommend this for anyone, works great, runs fine and is perfect for what I needed it for. Don't hesitate to buy this nice piece

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: The power is not very high, which I was really hoping for. It's much less than that of the Conair Infiniti.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I bought this to replace another Andis 1600W hangup hair dryer I have used for 13 years. I thought since it was the same wattage it would have the same power, but alas, it seems a faint imitation of the mighty blower I had before. AND, the control is on the back of the handle, which makes it awkward to use, whereas the previous dryer had the control on the side, in the perfect position for ease of use. This does the job, and I do like the included night light, but it pales in comparison to my original. Sigh.....

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I like this product. I really like being able to change the heat settings. My only complaint is that the controls are in the same place as my hand so I sometimes inadvertently change the settings.

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: This blow dryer straightened my course afro hair from root to tip! It is not difficult to hold or maneuver.  The comb rubber comb is practically unbreakable.. And great for tender scalps as well as the cool shot button! I chose this one because my hairdresser recommended it. She has a wide range of hair dryers but This blow dryer straightened my course afro hair from root to tip! It is not difficult to hold or maneuver.  The comb rubber comb is practically unbreakable.. And great for tender scalps as well as the cool shot button! I chose this one because my hairdresser recommended it. She has a wide range of hair dryers but is most satisfied with this one....and it doesnt break the bank...they need to make one with titanium technology...she is most satisfied with this one....and it doesnt break the bank...they need to make one with titanium technology...

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: It has all of the settings (hot, warm & cold) plus the settings are on a slide as opposed to the toggle settings. You don't have to worry about  accidentally changing temperatures or turning drier off in the middle of styling you hair. I also like the retracting cord, it makes storing so much easier.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: I'd read some reviews stating this dryer had issues...but, I bought it anyway.  I have no problems with the hose falling out or it not getting hot enough.  Works great.  My only problem is that I had jumbo rollers in and the bonnet's opening was not large enough to easily get my head in without loosening the rollers in the process.  Next time, I'll just use smaller ones.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I have very thin fine hair and only use a hair dryer for spot drying on occasion. I had a great little travel dryer that worked great for years until it recently just died on me. In looking for a new dryer I found most were too big and bulky for me, as well as too powerful for my hair. This dryer had the lowest wattage I could find. While it's still a bit too powerful for me, it serves my purpose, as it is small and lightweight. The only improvement I would have made would have been to have a foldable handle.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Great power, Fast drying, but super tangly hair
review_body: I have normal to fine long hair, and while this dryer has dramatically shortened my drying time, my biggest issue is that it turns my dried hair into a tangly mess. A hairbrush literally rips my hair out after drying. I haven't had this issue with a dryer before, and an at-home coconut oil treatment has helped the situation somewhat, so I've decided to keep the dryer until my next haircut to see if that alleviates the tangles. If not, I will probably buy a new dryer.

product_title: mangroomer 1680xl-6 professional ionic hair dryer for men
review_body: I got this hair dryer b/c I wanted a no-frills, sturdy hairdryer, and that's exactly what I got. It performs exceptionally well and I have even dried - wait for it - CHICKENS w/ it outside. It's that sturdy. :) B/c I'm a woman I'm not using the little blue button; regardless, this is an awesome piece of equipment.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: I've used this dryer for less than 4 months and it's already acting up.  I keep it clean and store it in a holder (so it doesn't drop to the floor) and it's still acting up.  The power level drops.  The heat comes and goes.  The manufacturer wants me to ship it back to them....and then they'll send me a new one in 10 days.  How am I supposed to live without a hairdryer for that long?!?!?!  I don't recommend this at all.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_headline: 3 months' use and now it's dead
review_body: First, it's red and not blue. Second, it's large, very heavy and loud. Third, after 3 months' use, it died on me. Vendor offers no return/replacement after 30 days.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
I've only used this a few times so far, but I really love it. I've had difficulty finding a dryer that 1) doesn't fry curly hair, 2) isn't too heavy when drying the back of my head, 3) doesn't sound like a jet taking off, 4)has a diffuser, and 4) has separate heat and power settings - with the warm actually warm, not hot.

This dryer does all that - I'm a very happy camper!

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I am a flight attendant and many hotels I stay in have this hair dryer and I LOVE it! I had to order one for home!!

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: I have sister locs, I used the dyer to rod my hair and it worked great. It is exactly what I was looking for.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: Had a similar one before and missed it when it finally died. I probably had it ten years or more.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I really needed a good blow dryer to dry & straighten my hair and this one made my hair look really healthy. I love it.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: This hair dryer did not deliver the turbo drying that I wanted.  It takes too long to dry my hair.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This died about a year after I got it. I wish it lasted longer. It was good while it lasted.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body:
Let me first explain two things-
One being that I work the nightly re-stock shift at Sephora and have my pick of any high end professional hair dryer at 30-50% off sale costs and I still chose this for many reasons. Secondly, I have used the same Revlon Ionic $15-20 blowdryer since I was about 16years old and never had any problems with it. I always repurchased the same one maybe once every 6years or so.
My hair is naturally curly but its slowly lost most of its curl through the years and been left with a good amount of volume and wave. My hair had always gotten pretty frizzy when I blew it dry but I just figured that was part of the drying process. One day while at work I was looking at a T3 and discussing how my hair frizzes, i was told that with the new hair dryers and such that this isnt what should be happening and that i should get a new high end hair dryer. I researched many of the new T3 and the Drybar products only to be pretty disappointed considering the price. I actually bought a T3 and had problems with the end staying on it and the location of the switch and my hand. I had found the Elchim but was skeptical of it bc of the name in general. I wasnt a big name brand and no one i talk to had ever heard of it. After ONE use I could tell a huge difference. It doesnt dry my hair any faster though. I dont have any frizz and it is smoother, smells better, not to hot to touch, and a lot more shine! I really do recommend this to any woman (or man) who is considering buying a new expensive blowdryer and cant make up their mind...go with this one first!

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: I am a professional stylist and this blow dryer gets the job done!!! It is excellent for straightening natural African American hair.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I got this for my daughter for she like to do her hair a lot and washes it every day

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Very affordable, reviews were accurate.  It is quieter than my old one and quick.  No need to spend a lot of money on a dryer when you have the quality with Conair.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: The dryer is a good value for the price.  I purchased this because the cord was retractable and it is easier to pack when traveling.  It is light weight, which is a plus as I have thick long hair as my arm doesn't get tired.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: I am a 27yr old black woman and i use this dryer to dry my 20in malaysian body wave full sew in. it dried my braids completely so if you're wondering if it works for weave yes. I've only used it once since i bought it and once again to quickly dry my boyfriends boxers last minute and it worked for that too lol so im pretty satisfied. so far so good, thanks!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer functions as it should and meets all expectations... however, to me, there is just one con. The fan speed adjustment slider is a bad design. I constantly like to adjust the fan speed when I blow dry or style my hair and, if not careful, the adjuster piece can pinch you palm area if it's resting in the area where the adjustment piece slides down.... not quite sure how to describe it. Well, after getting pinched once it never happened again because now I'm aware - though it sucked the first time. Just a FYI!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I had an older model of this same hair dryer for several years (5-7?) and it was great. Recently, it started making some funny sounds while in use, so I decided it was about time to upgrade. For the price, there's really no better option than this one - it's relatively lightweight, easy to maneuver, and makes quick work of drying my long, thick hair. I've never had an expensive, fancy hair dryer, so I can't speak to whether this is better or not, but I'd say you can't beat the price for the quality.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: It works fine and it is really small. On the other hand, the cable and the plug are incredibly big for this kind of stuff....

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: I love it!! I have a bunch of hair and it dries it in no time while other dryers take more than 20 minutes to have way dry it!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I am not very good at styling my hair but I find this dryer seems to be the correct temperature and has the directional stream going in the right direction.  Very easy to use.  I had used the dryer at my daughters and so decided to purchase it.  I would highly recommend it

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: I order this after reading all the reviews. Before purchasing this blow dryer I had a very cheap bottom of the line dryer from walmart. I will have to say I am disappointed with how long it still takes to dry my hair. I was expecting more since for me this was an upgrade. It feels & looks cheap also.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I bought this to blow dry my baby's hair. It is the perfect size for her when she gets older to dry her own hair. It is strong enough to dry hair quickly, but not to the point of burning hair/scalp.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: I just opened up my package which I was very excited about because of the reviews I read. Well, once I opened it I found someone's hair all in the box and sticking to the plug stickers on the hair dryer. Also, there were scratches and dings all over the hair dryer. This was 100% used. I am totally grossed out that someone else's hair was all over a product that I paid good money for. When someone returns something it is not right to resell it so someone else. UPS is coming to pick it back up tomorrow and I am assuming I'll be getting a refund or at least I better. I am extremely disappointed and have never had this happen before using Amazon. Either way, I will not be buying from this seller anymore!

product_title: remington silk ceramic professional hair dryer
review_body: I think It's a good product, It leaves your hair soft and it dries it easily, It fullfiled my expectations.

product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_body: After using it, I turned off the hair dryer and put it down.  The hair dryer came back on, caught fire and left a very bad smell in the house.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body:
This dryer has great power and really does help keep your hair from frizzing.
It's great, and it has lots of power, or little, depending on the setting.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: I think this is great for travel and at home.  You just sit and get your hair dryed and device is small enough to walk around with.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body:
I like the compact size and light weight of of this dryer. And my hair is noticeably smoother!
My only disappointment is that I thought there were more heat settings - the product description says 3 heat/air speeds. It is actually only 3 air speeds + a cool shot button.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I did love this hair dryer.  Ordered it in Jul 2013.  It is now March 2014 and only the slow speed works.  The other two don't. I know hair dryers are a somewhat disposable item.  But come on, didn't even last a year?

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Great hair dryer for traveling, or for the gym, or for someone who doesn't have a large space for storage

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I looked at blow dryers online for months before making this purchase, some costing hundreds of dollars.  On my wish list was a dryer with a salon quality motor for durability, variable heat and speed settings, ceramic, and ionic.  This dryer checks all the boxes.  The reason I give it four stars rather than five is because there is no ionic on-off switch (ionic on for smoothness, off for greater volume).  I was surprised and pleased to learn that this dryer carries a four-year warranty.  Many of the high-priced dryers had only a one or two year warranty.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_headline: not good for very curly hair
review_body: The bristles on the brush are too flimsy to straighten very curly hair. plus this drier does not get hot enough or have enough air flow..it took forever to dry my hair and i was left with a frizzy mess.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w hair dryer with cord hanger
review_body:
We orde our 2nd hairdryer because same spot in the bathroom-hholes already.

But the drer doesnt last , 1. Year

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: no clue about the bad reviews...this dryer gets my hair good and dry. And it dries really fast too! Its a keeper!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This dryer is relatively quiet compared to some high priced brand. It provides adequate drying. The only issue I have is the rocker type on/off switch which is inconvenient. A push on/off type switch is ergonomically better just like holding a gun with a trigger.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I have had this hair dryer for several months now and am very satisfied.  I purchased this model as my daughter has used the same (former model) for years.  I highly recommend this purchase :)

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: This hairdryer is superb. Like that I can dry my hair quickly as it is quite powerful. Also like the folding handle. It is made for a woman's hand; easy to hold and handle.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I chose this dryer based on the great ratings it got. I am highly pleased with it. Works well, has all the temp. settings needed. I was looking at much more expensive dryers, and I really don't think one of them would have been better. Highly  recommend!

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: Today,( 3/14/14) that I used my hair dyer, I have to say I just love it. My hair is naturally curly but takes so, long too dry. I have a hand held dyer with the diffueser attchatment an it makes my hair puffy.  I started to look for this type of hair dyer that was quick an sufficient an when looking they were really expensive as well as shipping and handling but when I compared on amazon your company caught my eye because on the head of the dyer was elongated and there was zero shipping so, all I paid was 104.00 and other companies wanted more money and  shipping and handling. I also colored my hair an I use a heating cap an it does not color my head completely so, this will make for a better job on my color. Thank you so so so so so much......

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: works perfect for us, not too big and not too small, wife luvs the ease of it on the wall

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: Excellent my wife love it, this is one  of the best hair dryer Would live to recommend because is silence and efficient.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This thing works at spewing hot, warm and cool air.  It's not terribly big or terribly loud.  I have not used the accessories, but it's built pretty good and it has a nice hook on it for hanging it up.  No complaints so far. Get you one!

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body:
This hair dryer was to replace my wife's previous Conair travel hair dryer. This one is a little noisier than her old one, but is by no means a problem noise-wise. It still is much quieter than many she has used in the past.'

The dryer drys her hair well and quickly. Plus it was a great price on Amazon.

product_title: conair 207p infinity tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Seems to be a good hair dryer. Easy to use, not too heavy. I've had it about a month, no complaints so far. Cord is long enough. And it is a pretty teal.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I purchased this dryer for traveling after reading some of the reviews.  I thought the retractable cord would allow more room in my carry on bag too.  I did not use the dryer so I can't review how well it works.  The size even with the cord retracted was my problem; it was as large as my 'home' hair dryer & that is why I returned it.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Use this for my dog.  It has a mild setting that is just right for him after his bath.  He hates baths. He would not give any thing associated with it 5.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: Loved this blow dryer... BUT one night it got too hot too fast and went out! I thought it had died! But it was just hot and had to cool down overnight. I was only half dry!

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: Prefer this dryer for many years as it isn't too small to handle but large enough to hold and direct in drying hair. For medium size it is lightweight. I don't use the attachments for my shorter hair. Dryer lasts for many years.

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: I have used this dryer for years and I love it. Being a hairstylist ...we are rough on dryers and this one takes it to the bank!

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: A great dryer.  Always handy, but not in the way.  This is our second one and the first one lasted a long time.

product_title: conair 207p infinity tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
I won't lie, the color of this blow dryer caught my attention before anything! The reviews seemed decent and the price was great so I thought if go for it.

I'm glad I did. The blow dryer works really well! It dried my long hair really quickly, and my hair holds on to water forever!

The only thing that dropped a star were the locations of the switches. These aren't normal buttons you can avoid; the entire front of the handle is made of two switches that you slide up or down to control heat and air power. I haven't accidentally changed the setting on myself, but its just an always spot and not easy to avoid.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: I have short hair, so use this as my daily hair dryer. Very compact, strong heat and airflow.  Warning: it's a bit loud.

product_title: t3 tourmaline 83808 professional featherweight ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_headline: - DO NOT BUY - the 5 star reviews are fake
review_body:
Few problems with this Dryer.
First: I've had this dryer before. It was great, but after using it in the salon for a couple years it stopped working, as they do.
Second: The FIRST time I plugged this dryer in the low blast setting did not work (as in, no air came out). I contacted the seller and I've received no response. The dryer is not working, and I just want a different one.
Third: This seller is a complete scam! They send a piece of paper with the dryer that says they'll give you a two year warrantee if you leave a 5 star review. Complete extortion. I can't believe Amazon works with these guys. Mind you, since they are not an authorized retailer it is very likely the manufacturer's warrantee is void. This creates a problem.

Bottom line: buy this from a different seller.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Still kind of heavy and cord refused to retract after a few months
review_body:
I was looking for something light and easy to store, hence the foldable handle and retractable cords. It is not light, and not small. The retractable cord can only retract half way after a few months. Other than that, I don't mind it and has gotten used to the weight. Still on the lookout for my dream hair dryer...

Tip: retract the cord before folding the handle, cord will not retract otherwise.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: Love Love Love this hair dryer.  This is my 3rd one over the course of many years.  I not only use in my home but in my RV.  Great power and the size is just right .  Hangs on wall and that is a plus because it's at you fingertips when needed.  This one just purchased replace one I have had for 10 years........they last a good long while. Highly recommend!

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: Once again something I couldn't find on store shelves when my old one finally burned out, and once again a seller on Amazon came to the rescue, ordered 2 so I have a back up, nothing worse than your old hair dryer going on the fritz half way thru the job and no back back up, talk about bad hair day. Shipper got them to me quickly.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: i love this new blowdryer, it's just as it described and was a very good price. i got it on time, too !

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Works pretty well, but I've been using it just over a year and now every time I turn it on, it trips my surge protector just a couple minutes in. It makes drying my thick head of hair a rather extensive process with having to turn it off, let it cool down, and then reset the surge protector, which otherwise works fine. I unplug everything else from it when using the dryer… which I didn't have to do before, but now if I don't, the dryer shuts off even more frequently. I just purchased another dryer from another brand as result.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: This is a fantastic littler hair dryer.  Despite the small size, it still gets quite warm and blows a good stream of air on high.  While my hair is fairly short so perhaps this isn't saying much, it does dry it off quite quickly.  The small size is also a plus as it makes it perfect for traveling.  If you're looking for a hair dryer with attachments, you'll need to look elsewhere.  But if you want a good, compact hair dryer, look no further.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: Bought it because I've always liked the ones in the hotel rooms.  Has good power and lightweight.  Helps to organize my bathroom.

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body:
The description says a diffuser is included but it is not in the box.
Heavy for person with arthritis.
Not so quiet.

product_title: sunbeam 1632-040 global economizer hair dryer
review_body:
Both my daughter and myself were looking for a dryer that didn't go in the drawer. I read all the reviews and choose this one.

I really like the simplicity of the dryer. It dries my hair with ease and I have thick and long hair.

The only drawback to this dryer is the length of the cord. Make sure you can place close to the edge of your counter top.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_headline: Don't get too excited about it, especially if you have fine hair.
review_body:
I broke my wife's Babyliss TT 3000 dryer (guess they don't bounce), so I had to buy her a replacement. She has fine hair that lacks body. As I researched dryers I read that people with fine hair will get better volume & body if they don't use NEGATIVE Ion dryers but instead use NEUTRAL Ion dryers. The price on the MK-II was about $30 more than the TT3000 (which she liked) but I thought that with all the 5 star comments (i.e. lighter weight, quieter, 4 yr warranty, etc.) it was worth it, especially since it had a Negative/Neutral Ion switch. When it came I mentioned all of its advantages to her. I was crushed when her first comments were:
1. Yes, its quieter than the TT3000 but that's because on high fan the air volume was equal to the low fan speed of the TT3000.
2. No, the neutral Ion setting didn't give her any more body/volume than the TT3000 did.

It is 2.5 ounces lighter than the TT3000 (according to our digital postage scale) and she's OK with it's performance so I'm not sending it back but I wished I'd just gotten another TT3000 and saved the $30. Maybe a $180 unit with neutral Ion's would give her more volume but I do know that if this one breaks I'm not buying another MK-II. Sure wished someone would have posted a comment like this one so I didn't waste my money. Personally, I like the build quality of the TT3000 also.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: What a great item.  So much easier to have this regular item on my wall in the bathroom just like hotels!  Works great and has the ideal settings for my needs.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_headline: If you're looking for a retractable cord, don't buy this one!
review_body:
My previous Conair blow dryer had a retractable cord and I loved it. It was great for easy storage and my storage space is limited and cramped. After years though, that blow dryer died and I needed to replace it. I always go with Conair because they make a trusty, yet inexpensive, product. I chose this one because of the retractable cord, the folding handle, and the dual voltage. I figured that if the retracting cord helped with storage, the folding handle has to be even better, right? Plus, I'm traveling internationally this year, so I thought the folding handle would be good for a suitcase and the dual voltage would be good for international power conversion. While I had high hopes for his blow dryer, it has really been nothing but disappointing...

The blow dryer itself works great, like any other Conair I've owned. The retracting cord, the folding handle, and the dual voltage switch, however, do not. The joint on the folding handle is quite flimsy. The top of the blow dryer wobbles a bit back and forth and I'm sure this will only get worse over time. This feature doesn't seem built to last. The retractable cord also doesn't retract. It gets stuck halfway through and still leaves about a foot and a half of cord sticking out of the end of the blow dryer. It's not a huge deal since the blow dryer still works, but it is definitely irritating since I bought the blow dryer specifically for this feature. I don't know for sure, but in my opinion, I think the retractable cord doesn't work right because of the folding handle. It just seems like that whole area is made flimsy and I think the cord is getting stuck inside the blow dryer near the joint of the handle. And finally, the dual voltage switch--I can't, for the life of me, get that thing to switch over. I've tried using my acrylic nails, a screwdriver, my boyfriend, etc. and nothing has worked. Unless you're traveling with Thor, I wouldn't count on this feature. Luckily I have a power converter for other electric items, so I can use that with the blow dryer...if it makes it that long. I may chuck the thing out a window next week!

If anybody is interested in the Conair blow dryer I had prior to this one, it was the Conair YOU Cord Reel 2-in-1 Hair Dryer. It last me years and the retractable cord worked great!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I have VERY thick hair and needed a dryer that wouldn't take forever to dry my hair.  This one is a bit loud, but it does the job and doesn't make my hair too frizzy.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: Perfect size, for home or travel.  It's not too small or too bulky or large.  It puts out the perfect amount of heat and air.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: We used to buy the more expensive name brand hair products.  After reading reviews of this dryer, we decided to try it.  There are three girls in my family and we all use and love this dryer!

product_title: proversa micro turbo dual voltage portable hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: this is just the right size and weight. I have a lot of trouble with my wrist and this dryer handles so nice. Also it does not take up much space at all.

product_title: pibbs ttec8012 twin turbo 3800 professional ionic and ceramic hair dryer, black, 2100 watt
review_headline: Read the policy before you buy. No Refund ....
review_body: This hair dryer is very good, unfortunately  this dryer blew up on me In less than on month.  Please people read the policy,  before you buy read the return policy from this company.  The stars is for the product

product_title: conair 1875 watt ergonomic handle hair dryer
review_body: The only reason I have this four stars is because the only problem I have with it is that it isn't as powerful as my last dryer, which was different, but for the money I spent I got every penny. It works just fine and I love how you don't have to press an additional button to go to the cool setting like old dryer.

product_title: t3 featherweight journey travel hair dryer
review_body: I bought this blowdryer in 2004 and it always made my hair silky and shiny. This one which is advertised as the same exact thing doesn't work the same. My hair is always looking dry and burnt. I wouldn't recommend buying this blowdryer. It is the same as any cheap blowdryer you can buy at Cvs.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: i needed a blow dryer for college this was cheapest one i found and it has a cool setting works perfect for me

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This dries my hair so much faster than my old hair dryer. It gets hot enough but not to hot and I love that you can change the temp settings on it. The cool blast button also works very good. The cord is long enough and it is not to loud. Doesn't seem to dry my hair out and make it frizzy at all either. Would definitely buy again, very pleased.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Works great! It does exactly what it says & It came with all the attachments in the pic. I love it!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: My last blow dryer was a Remington and it lasted for well over 10 years. That is the reason I purchased this one. I looked at cheaper ones but kept coming back to this when it arrived I was not disappointed. It had all the features I wanted plus it feels sturdy in my hand not fragile like one drop and it's over. Also it drys quickly  and isn't terribly noisy.  If this one lasts half as long as my last one I will be a very pleased customer. Like I said I love it.

product_title: conair 1875 watt ionic conditioning cord-keeper folding handle hair dryer
review_headline: Good dryer but not my favorite.
review_body: I bought this dryer specifically because the handle could collapse and the cord was retractable, which I thought would make it fit in my drawer.  Both features work well but, it still wouldn't fit in the drawer.  This dryer does not get very hot so it takes longer to dry my hair than my previous one.  However, it was a good price and you get what you pay for.  I'll keep it but I would try another model before I bought this again.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: I used this brand of hairdryer for the first time during a recent hotel stay, and I just loved it.  It's light, fast, and easy to use.  The buttons are also conveniently placed so that my hand is not on them as I use the dryer.  I liked the dryer in the hotel so much that I immediately ordered one.  It's a super dryer, just about the best I've ever used.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This dryer just feels like a quality build. After a week of use, I will say that it performs way beyond what I expected. While I have relatively short hair and this dryer gets the job done in about one-fourth of the time my old dryer did. I wouldn't have believed it if I hadn't experienced it.

product_title: babyliss pro babfrv2 volare ferrari designed professional luxury mid sized hair dryer, red, 2000 watts
review_body:
"...more than you can afford pal." is not a phrase you should apply here. It's quieter, blows harder, has ionizer or maybe a deionizer, it's red, has an awesome cord.

And did I mention its very quiet? Has more of a whooooooooosh shound than typical shrill hair dryer, "Wheeeeeeee-zzzzzzzzzzzz-eeeeee-zzzzzz-eeee-hrrrrrrrrrrrrrr-ddrrrrrrrrrrrrr-wheeeeeeeeesh"

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_headline: Lots of Wind and Little Heat
review_body: I find it to be very high volume of air but the heat is low. The difuser snaps on poorly

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I ordered this during the holidays, with the knowledge that my current dryer weas gonna go anyday, well it did, and I just opened this and used for two days, it makes a terrible, terrible, humming sound......and I can not return due to that I waited to long to open it and try it now my return date is past.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body: Super awesome.  Dries my hair in no time.  Makes it shine and the style lasts for several days. Very good.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I bought this dryer to make it easier to do both my daughters hair and to teach them how to dry their hair on the type of dryer I learned on.  Wonderful purchase the price was great and this dryer dries hair so much faster than my old model.  Would buy again

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: Just what my wife wanted for the bath room. Just the right size to fit on the small apace next to the mirror. Was easy tp install and looks like a professional job of installation.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: This is an awesome blow drier.  I'm going to buy it and give it to my girlfriends for gifts, you really can't beat the price for the quality you get.  I first tried it in an upscale day spa in Chicago.  I had to call the place to find out the brand and model because that was the best hair day of my life to date.  Now my hair is shiny and frizz-free every day.  I couldn't be happier.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: This dryer never fails me. It does a great job every time. It gets super hot, which can be dangerous.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: I love this hair dryer.  Long cord and great power drying. Drys fast and styles with attachments that came with it. Hair looks great after.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I Love the retractable cord feature, except when the retract button sticks in place only a few weeks after purchase.  I guess I will do it the old fashioned way and wrap the cord :(

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I like it. It's working very well. Like the heat a lot, get things done faster. It's strong too. Definitely a good deal.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_headline: Worked great for about a month
review_body: While using it one day it all of a sudden sounded like it went on low, but it just lost its oomph and it never came back.  The next time I turned it on it ran for a few seconds then stopped working at all.  It had hardly been used, but I had it long enough that I couldn't return it.  Bummer.  I liked the idea of having it hang on the wall.  I hadn't even gotten around to hanging it yet.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: Surprisingly light and effective for drying my hair. It came with extra attachments in a cute zebra-striped bag. I wouldn't use it on the highest setting or for long periods of time. It is super small and easy to take around.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer was perfect for my needs, and the pricing didn't hurt anything either! I am MORE than satisfied! 2 thumbs up all around!

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: The bonnet hair dryer is fabulous💐.  It's so lightweight.  I can dry my curls and read a book in ease. Absolutely love it.

product_title: andis 33295 hangup pro turbo 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: I love the automatic on/off feature when you use the dryer.  Powerful enough for my short hair.  Would purchase again.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body:
I have a lot of hair. It's waist length, and thick. I used a plastic Conair Ion Shine 1875 hair dryer prior to buying this one. I could dry my hair with the Conair in maybe 15-20min. With the Remington, I can dry my hair in 5-10min! As for the less frizz the pearl ceramic plate is supposed to deliver, I think my hair is less frizzier... I have no idea if this is because of that, or because this dryer can sustain heat and air flow well enough to straighten my hair better.

The colors are a bit off from the product image. The removable cap on the back of the dryer is a darker shade of pink, while the buttons and the ceramic plate are a lighter pink (but the product image's pink is a lot lighter). The unit itself is a dark maroon or purple-ish sort of color. It's not black. The material is not plastic. It has an interesting finish... smooth but doesn't slide around on a marble countertop like plastic does). The entire hairdryer is a bit heavier than I'm used to, but it's not too much of a big deal as long as you keep your hairdryer steady and you don't swing it about. Since it dries my hair in just a few minutes, the weight really isn't an issue. The cord is a decent length, but I use this at the sink, so I don't need a very long cord.

I like the extra heat so I always have my heat set to the third level. The second level is probably better for finer hair. My hair is thick, so I like more heat. The first level is only slightly warm. It's just slightly warmer than the cold shot setting.

As for the air speeds... I also like to use the highest setting. The second highest setting is just as fine, but if I'm in a rush, I blast the settings to dry my hair quickly. The air flow is very strong, so with finer hair, you're probably better off at a lower setting here as well. I noticed that other reviews have said they actually keep the hairdryer about 8in from their head to avoid burns. Just to give you a better understanding of my hair, I use the highest settings for both heat and speed, and I place this a lot closer to my head than 8in. So much hair, and I like it long.

Overall, hairdryer is heavy, but the heat and the air speed is fantastic for anyone with a lot of hair that's thick and long. Saves me time in the morning when getting ready, and my hair isn't as frizzy. Bonus points: After placing my order, I received this unit the next morning. I'm impressed with the Prime shipping speed with this one.highest settings for both heat and speed, and I place this a lot closer to my head than 8in. So much hair, and I like it long.

Overall, hairdryer is heavy, but the heat and the air speed is fantastic for anyone with a lot of hair that's thick and long. Saves me time in the morning when getting ready, and my hair isn't as frizzy. Bonus points: After placing my order, I received this unit the next morning. I'm impressed with the Prime shipping speed with this one.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I needed a good hair dryer bad!  I ordered this not really knowing it had a retractable cord.  What an awesome idea!  Just love it.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I love this item!!!! Not only is pink my favorite color but one of my close friends is fighting cancer, so it serves 2 purposes but it also work great!!!! thank u!!!!

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: I appreciate it's light weight; however the "High" speed is much too powerful and quite loud.  I've put it aside as a travel or emergency hair dryer.

product_title: conair pro styler ionic conditioning hair dryer
review_body: This is the second one I've purchased (still using the first one which I purchased at Bed Bath & Beyond).  I like its features so much that I bought this second one as a back-up in case the first one quits, but it's still going strong at about five years old.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I received the Hair Dryer today.  I used it on my daughters hair and it worked just as promised.  I am African American and this is the first hair dryer that I have purchased that has actually lived up to its claims.  My daughter has thick hair and this dryer literally cut the drying time in half.  The handle is comfortable to hold and the attachments work perfectly.  Also this hair dryer is much quieter than older models similar to this one.  I would definitely recommend this hair dryer to anyone who hates long drying times.  It gets the job done and it gives your hair a natural shine.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_headline: I expected it to be great, based on others reviews
review_body:
I was really expecting a great little hair dryer, but it was not.
It is super loud and overly hot and makes a bit of a grinding noise.
Just really did not like it at all, so I sent it back.
Still looking for a quiet, powerful, but not too hot dryer.

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: I've had my dryer for 3 years.  I love it.  I'm african american and I decided to go natural.  Because I have very coarse, kinky hair, it proved to be a great dryer for straightening my hair.  One downfall.  My comb broke and trying to replace it with a universal comb has been a nightmare.  I called Conair and don't replace the comb, but they will replace the dryer.  The rep said to send it back to them and they will send me another dryer in 3 weeks.  I couldn't afford to wait that long so I decided to buy another dryer. So now I have two and I love both of them.

product_title: remington compact ionic travel hair dryer, (colors vary) d5000
review_body: I had my reservations before I bought this, but I am so glad I did! It is small enough to travel with and has loads of power to dry even the thickest head of hair. Great purchase!!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: My conair hair dryer decided to bite the dust on me and the following day I was having a medical procedure done.  I was pressed for time so I ordered this one and have one day shipping.  I must say that I love this hairdryer.  It is pretty in color and looks exactly like it does online.  It is not too heavy and comes with two extensions.  I love the choices between low, medium and high and also low, warm, hot and cool.  I highly recommend this item.  It is not too noisy either.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Powerful little hair dryer but be aware the cord doesn't retract all the way
review_body:
Dave's wife:

I was sick of my old 1875w hairdryer's cords always getting in the way in the cabinet so I ditched it for a folding model with a retractable cord.

People said this dryer was loud, but I didn't find that to be true.

It works very well and I'm happy with it, just be aware that the cord doesn't retract all the way, it only retracts to a certain point.

Still, much better than what I had and it works great!

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Haven't used it yet. The packaging is great and compare to the price I have seen for the same make and model it is good.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: This hairdryer has a good weight to it and the motor sounds quiet and smooth. Drys my hair quickly. Love the retractable cord.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: I have used this dryer for many years and decided to purchase another one for travel.  Lightweight and a good airflow!

product_title: conair 1875 watt mid-size hair dryer
review_body: I really like this dryer and am enjoying using it.  My other one had bit the dust after about 7 years.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I love this hair dryer!  It is very quiet compared to many dryers I have had.  It is awesome having so many heat and speed settings.  It comes with attachments which is a plus but doesn't really need them. The retractible cord is very handy for storing in the drawer.  I would definitely buy again. The only con I can find is that it is a little heavier them I am use it.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: Just not enough blow power compared to the one I had.  Takes too long to dry even on high.  No, I wouldn't buy it again.  Did not meet my expectations.

product_title: jerdon wall mount hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_headline: Really good deal, working great after two-years
review_body:
I researched various black on-wall hairdryers and I liked that this one was compact and a cord that seemed like it would stay out of the way. I mostly purchased this for when the girls are at the house and need a hairdryer, but it's actually come in handy for me as well. Anyway, mount and forget this thing. The cord for how I mounted it does slop around on the counter top a bit, but you really need that to have a comfortable amount of distance to use it.

Anyway, I'm very into more modern looking gadgets and the compactness of this and sleek black made it a great fit. After two-years, it's still working great and gets a decent amount of use. No problems whatsoever.

product_title: andis 80345 styler hair dryer
review_headline: I use this every day and it is a good reliable product but the power switch has started to stick . . .
review_body: I use this every day and it is a good reliable product but the power switch has started to stick.  I think that a shot of WD-40 would fix it, though.  I have been using it for many years and like the product.  I would buy another and recommend it highly to others.

product_title: remington d-2012 tstudio collection tourmaline and ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Heavy and stopped working after . Worked well on my hair though but it was too heavy and didnt last long!

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: I not always that I would find a blow dryer for this price and it gets as hot as this one. It does wonders with my daughters very natural hair. I love it and would recommend it to everyone.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_headline: I love it even with the odor
review_body: This hair dryer is as good as all the reviews say it is. It does give off a gross plastic smell when you use it though. If you can get past that then you'll love it.

product_title: conair 1875 watt ergonomic handle hair dryer
review_body: Excellent hair dryer for a low price;  I have 2 of these dryers;  They easily fit into a gym bag, get the job done and is very simple to operate;  You can't go wrong with this dryer

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
The ground fault circuit interrupter (the little red button) never worked and so the dryer never worked either. It was designed so that the GFCI couldn't be opened or repaired.
This was a total waste of money. Of course we never used it until the day AFTER the return date expired.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I have it and use it when I needed (usually for my bangs) I don't like how it stiffens my hair when I blow dry it. I like the real thing when I blow dry my long thick hair...

product_title: conair 1875 watt mid-size hair dryer
review_headline: I have had this hair dryer less than 2 months...no longer works right.
review_body: This hair dryer did not last even two months.  My hair would get caught in the back of the dryer.  Never had this problem with other hair dryers.  It is already useless and I had to replace it with another hair dryer.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I bought this for the retractable cord. Hadn't bought a new dryer in years because I have short fine hair and don't need one much. But I got tired of having to wind up the cord all the time after I used my old small dryer for a minute. This dryer is meant for a serious blow dryer, I think. Someone who has a lot of hair and needs drying power. Be aware that this machine is big and heavy. I don't need such a powerful machine, My mistake I guess, but threw away the box before I realized. Seems very well made, but I wish I had something lighter. With a retractable cord.

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: I put this dryer on my wishlist and it was purchased for me by my husband. It gets very hot, just like the ones in the salons. The temp. is adjustable and the motor runs without creating a lot of excess noise. I like that the hood is extra large and adjustable.Great color combination too. The instructions on how to put the unit together could be a bit more clear, but are not totally confusing and shouldn't keep anyone from purchasing the drying.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: The first one lasted me ten years and passed down to my son still working. I really love the retractable cord, prevents clutter.

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body: It's amazing you don't know how bad your old hair dryer was until you purchase a new one! This hairdryer has so much power but is also quieter than others.  My old hair dryer took 20 min to blow dry my thin, fine hair. This one only took 5 min! Love the neon green color and love how the handle folds for travel.  Works great!

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_body: My new Conair 1875-Watt Pro Style Hair Dryer works just fine, but my previous one (same brand and same wattage) was much lighter to hold. I'm getting used to it but was hoping when I ordered it that it would be exactly like the one I had, since it lasted for years.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: This really could be almost the perfect hairdryer if for only 2 things.  It doesn't get hot enough and it's missing a cold shot button.  The air flow is perfect, I love the different speeds and heat settings, how it feels, the lenth of the cord, etc... It just doesn't get hot enough to straighten/smooth the hair like my CHI did, even at its hottest setting.  I need to flat iron afterwards (my hair has a medium natural wave).  I love the way the Elchim is made, so I'm going to try different models to see if they have what I'm looking for.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: It worked fine on my trip to Israel.  It is easy to pack for travel and has a lot of power.

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_headline: Didn't last more than 30 uses and started smoking
review_body: I purchased this hair dryer in July for a 2 week trip and since have only used it a few times. It was compact and easy to travel with. It isn't terribly powerful but worked well enough to dry my hair and works better than most hotel dryers. I had even used it a few times in place of my every day Conair dryer and had no major complaints. Until I used it for a recent trip and when I turned it on it puttered, then started smoking and sparking. I have seen hair dryers die before, but usually not after such limited use, and I haven't seen them go out in smoke and flames before. I usually buy Conair but this product has given me doubts.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body:
I have had many blow dryers......... then of course I needed another one, so
instead of going to Target again, I thought let me see whats out there.... I love Amazon so
that was the first place I went to. I saw this blow dryer and read the reviews and thought, let me give this
a try (because of the revew) and I just LOVE, LOVE this blow dryer.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Great hair dryer....super quiet..and dries hair quickly.... it is very light compared to my other hairdryers and the cord winder works very well

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: It was Great while it Lasted!
review_body: Had this dryer for about a year and a half and it was great during that time. Dried my hair well, left it shiny. Only complaint was that the cord was somewhat short. Worked out okay for me as my outlet in the bathroom was in a convenient location. I used the concentrator daily.  After about a year and a half the dryer just stopped getting hot, only blew cold air. Decent dryer for the price but dont expect it to last very long with daily use.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
I ordered this Hair Dryer for my wife. Shipping was right on the money and packaged superbly with no damage.
My wife loves it. If she loves it then I plumb tickled!

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_headline: Revlon RV484 Pro Stylist Ionic/Ceramic 1875W Hair Dryer
review_body:
This was a gift to my Mrs.
Decent dryer.
All the features of her expiring one.
Very good price.
Arrived on time for Christmas.
Excellent packing and shipping.
Runs every day without a blip.

product_title: conair 1875 watt mid-size hair dryer
review_body: I chose a less expensive dryer because I have no need for a powerful one.  It serves my needs well with just the basic functions.

product_title: andis 80345 styler hair dryer
review_body:
This hair dryer is awesome. Dries my hair in 10 min. and leaves it smooth! Other dryers I've tried either overheat before I'm done drying, or take at least double the time.

I actually had to order one for my mother after she tried mine.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Dries my hair fast and love the cool shot button. What I don't like is that it has a big square plug.

product_title: andis 81290 tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Cord does not completely retract as I originally thought; it still hangs out of the dryer by about a foot. but it still works great!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I used the blow dryer for the first time tonight and I love love love it! For one it is pretty and it has different temperatures you can choose from, and different air speeds. My hair is really frizzy, and the blow dryer helped to de-frizz my hair. Love it!!

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body: I take this hair dryer to the gym with me in my gym bag.  It fits perfectly, and has my short hair dry in no time.  It also gives my hair some volume (I use the diffuser).  It's sturdy, and I'm very pleased with it.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, 36 ounce
review_body: This hair dryer is a life saver!  I have long, thick, curly, frizzy hair, and this product is the cure all!  Takes me about 15 minutes to blow dry and style my hair.  My hair dresser recommended this product,and she was spot on! Highly recommended!

product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_body: It is unique and portable. I love the style, the brand and by using it my hair dries quickly. I would recommend it to everyone who needs a blow dryer. Thank you

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Great hair dryer for the money
review_body: This is a good ceramic hair dryer for the money.  The retractable cord is a bonus.  Don't expect a $20 dryer to last forever so treat it gently and it will last a long time.

product_title: hello kitty 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Our daughter has very long hair and sometimes needs to be dried. She likes having her own hair dryer, and this model is not expensive. It gets the job done. It helps that she likes anything with hello kitty on it.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: bought 2 of these, shipping back for a refund
review_body: I really liked this dryer so much that I bought a second one.  The problem with both dryers is that after about 18 months of use both have started shotting sparks out once they get heated up.  if you have your receipt you can ship back for a refund.  Seems it is a known issue and they should stop selling or fix the issue.

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Exactly what I was looking for.....as it is only used when traveling and hair is short.  Light weight and folds neatly.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: It gets my long hair dry in record time without drying it out!!  I love the cool down button as well.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I used this first in a hotel and thought it blew my hair dry faster.  Bought for home, still love but wish it was a little less bulky.  A little heavy and hard to blow the back with a round brush and hold onto at the same time.  But it drys quick and I still like.  Love the retractable plug.
