product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_headline: My favorite dryer, but it died after 8 mos.
review_body: The dryer is lightweight and very easy to travel with.  This was my favorite until it blew with normal use.  Suddenly smoke came out.  I turned it off, vacuumed the lint that wasn't very bad.  Flipped the red safety switch.  Nothing worked.  I'm really bummed.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: Really like the hair blower. makes my hair feel soft and silky..its a little heavy but it dries your hair fast do its no problem

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: I bought this to replace an older model of the same. Not as good as my older one but a great little dryer nonetheless.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: 2 out of the 3 attachments don't fit the dryer; very cheap end of what I know Andis is capable of.  You won't be happy with this if you're looking for a professional grade dryer.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: wall-mounted hair dryer is a space-saver in the small bathroom. And for a condo that is also a vacation rental, this works very well. We won't know how well it holds up over time until we get "over time". But for now -- looks good, sounds good, dries well.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body:
Dry hair extremely quick and leave hair in a perfect condition.
It needs less about half time than other hair dryer.
And the hair is smooth without any damage.
It is an impressive product.

Cons is the weight. It is heavier than other brands.
However I don't have to hold it for too long since it dries hair super quick, hence the weight is not too big an issue to me.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Bought this hairdryer for my overseas travel needs, and considering that the features of being foldable and having a retractable cord would be suitable for travelling, I purchased this item (there was no information about the voltage on product description, but it was available for shipping internationally so I deduced that it is dual voltage). Amazon shipped this item to Singapore (220volts). Once I tried it on, it fried my adaptor plug, and the hairdyer stopped working too after 2 seconds. Such a dissapointment!

product_title: hello kitty 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: And she just loves it.  Not only does she like Hello Kitty, but pink is her "very mostest favoritest color in the whole world" as she puts it.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: Mine was getting quite old and cranky and I decided time for a new one, this has hot and cold setting, great power and is not terribly noisy.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: My husband and I got tired of having a blow dryer that either took up space on the counter or got pulled off the counter every time the drawer opened.  I ordered this and he mounted it on the wall under a towel rack.  We use the dryer and then place it back and it is very inconspicuous.

product_title: twin turbo 3200 ceramic and ionic professional hair dryer, 1900 watt
review_body: Great quality, easy to use, heats up fast with lots of power. It's well worth the money invested when you need to replace your outdated blow dryer.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: It worked well for me, since I use it everyday. No complaints on this product.  Easy to use and handle

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Works well so far! I thought I'd give it a try since it was a fairly low price. It was bigger than I thought it would be. So if you're looking for something to travel with, this might be a bit too big. Other than that, this is a really good deal

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: Love this hair dryer and it provides excellent results very quiet while drying and I can finally watch tv thank you

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: My daughter wanted an drier with a air disperser on it. This was exactly what they she wanted. The drier works exactly as stated. The only issue is it's bulking too bad you can't fold it.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: this dryer arrived in an "icky" plastic bag inside the 'banged up' product box.  The cord was unwrapped and stuffed willy-nilly inside the bag.  The dryer had scratches and smudges on it.  It had obviously been used and returned.  There was no instruction manual included, either.  The dryer may be a good dryer but I didn't want to touch an obviously used personal item.  I am just appalled that such a product was sent to a customer.  Very disappointed.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body: You plug it in and it blows warm, almost hot, air.  Both buttons are perfectly placed to maximize accidentally turning off the dryer in the middle of a blowout.  The cord becomes so twisted and tangled that you won't be able to get a foot from the outlet (hey, you'll never have to worry about dropping it in the tub!).

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: This works well and easy for me to hold over my head when drying my hair.  The night light is almost too bright and there is no off/on switch for it, so I unplug the unit when I don't want the light in.  If I needed a dryer for the gym or RV, I would choose a model with the dryer and holder as separate units so I could pack only the dryer alone.  As the unit is installed in my bathroom, it works well for me but not easy to take anywhere else.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Bought two of these, one for each bathroom.  I like the controls on the handle and the ability to adjust the temperature and the power while you're using it.  My husband, however, doesn't particularly like that feature -- I guess with larger hands he finds himself inadvertently changing the settings while he's gripping the dryer.  I also like three temperature settings, high, medium, and cool.  Too many dryers I've used before just have high or no heat.  I really like it; husband is just OK with it.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: Good  hair dryer, I have to get used to the rectangle shape of it  rather than being round, it's a little bigger than I would like but works great and has 3 heat settings, and 3 comb attachment - Didn't care for the comb too much.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Another successful product.

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: Product showed up on time and close to previous conair product I used. Met all expectations and was very happy.

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body:
it costs too much electricity!!!!
i have to turn off all the lights when i use this product!!!!
it is quite too mass

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: I had always wanted a Ceramic Blow Dryer.  Leaves my hair smoother and less flyaways.  Great product for the money.

product_title: conair bb075w pro blackbird 2000-watt hair dryer
review_body: The 2000 watts gives it the blowing power needed as well as generous air intake that doesn't stifle it's power.  The heating element is placed far enough back so the hair doesn't get burnt.  Tough - I've dropped mine several times and it's still up 40 blow dries a week. This one has been in daily service for a year and probably won't break on it's own ... leave that up to me - my favorite dryer for the past 12 years.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: It's a Hair Dryer.  It Works.  What More Could a Guy Want?
review_body:
Let's face it, I'm a guy. I use a hair dryer about 3 minutes every morning when I get out of the shower. I don't need tourmaline gemstone coated heating elements, I don't need salon-duty roller bearings, I don't need a pink gemstone-encrusted handle.

I need something that blows hot air out the front when you press the switch, and this model does it. Works fine, without all the bells, whistles, and gee-gaws, and without breaking the bank. Oh and it's blue. A good guy color.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Great heat and strength controls.  Great handling to style hair.  I have had numerous Conair hair dryers over my lifetime and will continue to purchase them due to ther great quality.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Spend less time drying more time beautiful
review_body: My wife used this hair dryer at the Heathman Hotel in Portland and had to buy them for our VRBO  in Bend Or. Our VRBO 304450 incase you want to try the hair dryers!!!

product_title: conair 1875 watt ergonomic handle hair dryer
review_body: Dryer is light weight but powerful. A lot of hair dryer for the price. I'm 6 ft tall and it would be nice if the cord was just a little longer.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: This is the second one I have purchased and will continue to buy product as long as they make it.  Love that it hangs on the wall, the shape of it makes it easy to hold.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: thanks to this hairdryer. Lots of air, variable temperature, light weight too. Every feature I want and need. Great price too.

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: this is a quality hair dryer, no doubt about that. But in my search to replace an old and cheap one, i didn't consider the size and weight of these newer, salon quality ones. Very impressed when i received it, but found it quite heavy and loud, due to a more powerful motor w/ multiple features. The mid-heat setting, which i was really looking forward to ( having only 'unbearably hot' on my prior dryer) was actually pretty cool and the warm setting not really that warm. maybe that's something to get used to, but didn't seem to dry my hair that fast. the other issue for me was simply that the dryer was so much larger that it wouldn't fit in my vanity drawer, and with no other storage option, had to find a model that fit.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I like Andis hair dryers a lot.  This version has a retractable chord and a folding handle.  Great for my daughter's college dorm room with limited space.  Great for travel.  I would give it 5 stars, but it has limited heated selection.  Wish it had a warm setting...instead of just the hot.  Other than that, it is a nice, powerful, convenient dryer.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_headline: Extremely good for use in homes
review_body: I installed these in the bathrooms of our house.  No more hairdryers on the counters, tangled cords, etc.  No replacing the portable units every year.  Only wish is I had done this 10 years ago.

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body:
This thing really pack a punch. Perhaps they have to make the outlet diameter larger than others so the wind pressure isn't too great on the head and hair. This thing isn't slim but not too big nor too heavy. My just turn teen daughter like it and find it not too big or heavy.

From out many broken hair dryers ceramic is certainly heat more even than non-ceramic ones. But since we mainly use it to dry rather than style, I'm not sure fancy ceramic is really better than ceramic. There is only one rocker button for cool / turbo. The other buttons are large slide buttons so you can't accidentally change the settings. The finish is quality hard glossy plastic. I will not buy non-slip rubbery finishes again as they degenerate in no time.

So far so good for a couple of months. But I think they realized that they made a big mistake by not marketing it only to salons, with a price to match. I would love to have another one to replace my daughter's broken one but now it sells for 10 times the price I paid.

product_title: bed head hot head 1875w hair dryer for massive shine
review_body: Great Product! I would recommend for anyone. I had no issues with it, and it does it does fight the frizz! have been through so many blowdryers and I have to say this is the best blowdryer I have ever owned.

product_title: remington d3015 ionic ceramic dryer, ionic hair dryer, hair dryer
review_body: Inexpensive and does exactly what you need it to...my hair is about shoulder length and it dries it within about five minutes which is great! It can be loud on the higher setting but most hair dryers are. I recommend it!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: My old ionic dryer was dying- I liked that this one featured an "on demand" ion option, and other reviewers vouched for its quiet. I am using it now for a few months, and it is really a great dryer.  It is light, balanced, and easy to handle.  I like that you can switch the ion on/off, and that heat/air settings are completely adjustable.  And it really, really is quiet. It does what is says it does, and it is worth the $$.  Also shipped quickly. Makes you hair shiny and fires very quickly.

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_headline: Missing a button, but I didn't need it after all
review_body: This drier is perfect for what I need.  I can now dry my hair in 10 minutes by just sitting there, instead of 40 minutes with a hand held drier.  It has a temperature control and a timer, but it does not have a switch to control the wind speed, as was listed in the description.  The speed control switch was even on the diagram that came packaged with it, but it was not on the drier.  Despite this, I am keeping the product and am very happy with the results I am getting.  One thing to note is that there is some assembly required for the stand, and there were no instructions included.  I managed to put it together just using the diagram, but if this is not your strong point, enlist help.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I bought this for my family and we all just love it!  The cord is a little on the shorter side, but the dryer itself works great and dries the hair very fast! Worth the $.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Love the hair dryer--easy to carry and take with me on the go. Great so far. Really like it a lot.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: Use it at home as your "go to" hairdryer or bring it with you on trips.  So light & easy with lots of power.  Love the color too!

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: This Blow dryer is SUPER  I would really recommend it to anybody looking for a blow dryer,  Thank YOU  Diane Heuring

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: This is a very nice dryer.  I had one and when my daughter in law used it, she wanted one too.  We are both very satisfied.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body:
Got this for my wife -- so I'm not the end-user. But from my observation, this hair dryer was much quieter than her old one. It also did the job much faster. The only reason I can't give it five stars was that the documentation was very sparse. There are a couple of features that would benefit greatly if it came with a manual to explain it. I ended up having to Google to find out what they do.

Overall, a very good product. My wife would recommend it!

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: Its good but its heavy and it will tired you out really fast so be quick and efficient. Also it gets kinda hot too so you wanna be double quick! Or just stop, and wait a few if you're heat conscious like me.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_headline: very powerful, dries hair much quicker
review_body: Great product.  Dries hair much faster than previous less expensive dryers which stop working after a year.  Attachments weren't in box and merchant had excellent customer service.  Would buy again product from merchant again.  Very happy.  Healthier hair.

product_title: t3 tourmaline 83808 professional featherweight ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body:
The cool air button doesn't work at all.
Other buttons are all right but I am not satisfied with the product.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: This thing is junk.  Got it for my wife after her other wall mounted hair dryer died.  She hates it.  Not enough power.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: This is a very nice dryer and actually the second one we have had.  We wore out the first one after many years of daily use.  My only complaint, and it is a small one, is the night light is too bright.  It needs to be toned down a little.  Other that that this is a great hair dryer.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Love this dryer! Pretty color and I am absolutely digging the retractable cord! Works perfectly! I read that some folks were not happy with the length of the cord but I found it to be more than long enough for me. Im not sure why you would need it any longer. Very satisfied customer!

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing turbo hair dryer
review_body: This is my favorite hair dryer by far. I have thick hair and it takes a while for it to dry this blow dryer cuts that time in half. When I'm done the finished look is amazing my hair is shiny and healthy looking I have received many compliments on how shiny my hair is. I defiantly recommend this! I am a product guru I'v tried many different straightener blows, curling irons and of-course blow dryers and I am very satisfied with the results

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: I would definitely recommend I am African American and my hair is natural. This blow dryer gets my hair straight without the extra hassle plus the comb attachment makes it super easy.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I buy cheap. I don't need anything fancy, just something that gets the job done. This works great! Gets at right temperature comes with attachments. It's better than a $30 one my sister bought.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I bought it to use in Italy. It worked for a day, then the motor burned out. I don't think the adapter is up to the job, the description is wrong.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This dryer has plenty of power and is not too loud. Haven't used it alot yet but so far I really like it.

product_title: bed head hot head 1875w hair dryer for massive shine
review_body: I love my bed head !!!!!!! This hair dryer does what it says,works great. Gets hot. I did notice that it does make my hair shiny. Great find at an awesome price.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body:
I ordered this dryer to replace a "Vidal Sassoon" branded hot comb/dryer that had served me well for many years. I wanted it because I really like the "hot comb" style. After receiving it and noting the similarities with my old unit I would bet that Andis manufactured the dryer for Vidal Sassoon. Not only was the design almost identical, but the comb and brush attachments were identical and, in fact, would interchange perfectly with my old unit. If that is the case, this one should also last for many trouble free years. It does have one design feature that caused some initial confusion. The unit has three heat settings but there are only two fan speeds. The fan operates at the same speed on both medium and high heat settings which makes it appear that the switch is not doing anything. A check with my ammeter revealed, however, that the electrical load does increase a few amps and the air does get hotter in the high position. I am not saying that this is any kind of a problem, but I just thought it unusual since my old one had three fan speeds.

I would personally question the part about the "ionic" feature "breaking up water molecules" to accelerate drying but the ad writers gotta have something to do.

At any rate, it was just what I was looking for and does a great job.

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_headline: Good product, but not thrilled with the new version
review_body: I purchased this blow dryer to replace one that had gone out on me...The dryer that was sent to me must be a new version of the same product...It is now a black/purple dryer versus the red one pictured.  Although I got a little excited when I opened the box (black and purple are my favorite colors,) once I turned on the dryer, I felt the difference.  It doesn't have as much power as my old dryer.  The "turbo" on the old one felt like I was in a wind storm, which is exactly what it takes to dry my long hair.  On the new version, there is hardly any "blow" on the regular setting, and the "turbo" setting only increases it a little.  My quest for a fast dry time blow dryer continues....

product_title: pibbs ttec8012 twin turbo 3800 professional ionic and ceramic hair dryer, black, 2100 watt
review_body: Like all the twin turbo dryers, this one is built to last. The dryer feels solid and the materials are high quality, it's also much lighter than my 3200 (and smaller). I'm an editorial stylist and I'm hard on my tools but my twin turbos always last for years (and they're repairable). A few things to mention, the nozzles on my dryer are very hard to get on and hard to rotate when in place (perhaps they just need to break in?) Also this dryer has a shorter "snout" much like the 3500, so if you're used to having a more traditional dryer like the 2700 or 3200 it will take a bit of getting used to. Very nice dryer with great hot air output, the best as far as i'm concerned.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer is light, but powerful.  It dries my hair quickly but doesn't dry it out.  I'm very happy with it.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Great blow dryer for natural curly hair
review_body: I don't use a blow dryer often, but with a new short cut I found I needed to- this blow dryer does wonders in a short time with my curls.... I use the diffuser attachment that came with it.  Super.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_headline: Exactly what I was looking for
review_body: Love the weight and size - but mainly I have naturally curly hair so was very happy w the diffuser.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: I would highly recommend this dryer. It frees up space on my counter since it is a hang-up, and yet has great blowing power. And the night light is a great plus! No need to have a separate night light to take up valuable outlet space (there is never enough outlets in a bathroom).

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This worked great, while it worked. I only had it four months before it stopped working. The two speeds became one which was slower than the low setting. Of course, I was past the date to return or exchange, so I am back to buying a new one. Not worth it, unless you  only need a hairdryer for 4 months.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body:
Even though this is a "professional" style pistol hair dryer it's not full sized (it's medium sized).
It's best suited for shorter hair styles, otherwise it may take longer hair longer to dry due to less air flow and it's 1600 wattage (but it's still pretty powerful for a medium dryer).
It's light weigh and has a matte finish.

product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_body:
After only 2 weeks of once-a-day use the cord will not stay extended. Solution was to pull it all the way out and tie a knot in the cord.
Conair products are now on my personal black list.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: This is the first hair dryer I have ever owned that did not leave my hair smelling like smoke.  I am a black woman with natural hair (absolutely no chemicals nor weave) and my hair is more susceptible to dryness and breakage.  Therefore, it is extremely important for me to be extra sensitive and mindful to the type of products I use on my hair. This dryer did not pull my hair out, no burnt smell and I didn't mind the sound quality, afterall it is a hair dryer not a fan. The only negative I have is that the buttons can easily be depressed while blow drying your hair.  So you may have to double check a few times as I did to make certain you are using the right temperature on your hair.  Here is a tip I learned, when planning on using hot curlers, flat irons etc. please cool your hair down first (the cool shot button truly does help)and use a non-buildup non-oily heat treatment.  The more natural and/or organic the better. Wait at least 10 minutes or longer before proceeding to styling. Heat from the dryer with immediate usage of other heat sources can cause stress and unnecessary damage (or more damage) to your scalp and hair. Also, when using the pik, if you come in contact with a tangle, PLEASE do not force the pik thru.  You will tear your hair apart.  Use your fingers or a detangler comb to separate the tangle, then proceed in continuing drying.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: I probably do not need all this power, but there is a low setting so that makes it better.  It fits my space very well

product_title: conair 1875 watt ionic conditioning cord-keeper folding handle hair dryer
review_body: it does everything a good dryer should do.  The retractable cord doesn't work as well as it should unfortunately but can be managed.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Fast drying with lots of shine - I was first introduced to this hair dryer at a 5-star hotel I stayed at - it dries hair fast with lots of shine.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Good, Handy. Easy to use. Small enough to put in suitcase when traveling. Takes up very little space when storing..

product_title: br beauty meredith 880w salon hair dryer with casters
review_body: This was easy to assemble. It feels sturdy. Everything works as it should. The only drawback is that all the air blows from the top, not the sides, so my hair dries unevenly. Also, the hood is rather long and skinny, so there isn't much room to move or use curlers, if you ever wanted to.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This just arrived and I've used it only once but my first impression was good.  It dried my hair (which has natural waves and can be difficult to dry/style) quickly and seemed more powerful than my last one.

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: It is really powerful, my wife love it! It dries real fast your hair and the price is excellent! Recommended!

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: Had surgery on my hand so I needed something light weight, yet powerful enough to dry my very long thick hair. Took a chance and was surprised that the dryer was both ! Excellent price as well. I am buying another one for my daughter in law.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing turbo hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer is everything that I could have expected. The diffuser is perfect for my curly hair. It dries quickly and efficiently. Plus, I love the controls. I'm 61, and my hair has become quite thin. This dryer really volumizes and gives my hair the perfect curl. A MUST buy.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Pretty good hair dryer my dad inlaw sometimes  uses it to dry his clothes if that means anything and it hasn't burnt out yet.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_headline: Performs like a more expensive product
review_body: Lots of settings, strong air flow, there's not much to dislike about this. The nozzle (?) is a bit long, making it slightly unwieldy, but other than that it's fantastic.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: It is exactly what I needed! It dries and smooths my long, wavy, curly hair. Also very easy to handle.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Other than the retracting cord - which is cool - this is a pretty basic dryer. But I returned it because the retracting mechanism feels and sounds like it won't last long, and it just looks a little too cheap. I'm happy with the replacement - the Babylisspro TT for only a little more $ - looks nicer, feels nicer, works nicer, and is lighter.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body: I didn't fully appreciate this dryer until I broke it and I was without it for a few days.  It dries fast and gets really hot. Extra help is its long cord. I don't have the frizz like I had before. Watch Carley Babel on YouTube on how to blow out your hair, she is such a help.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I have spent lots of money on expensive hair dryers, and this one is by far the best I've ever used.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This is my second one of these each of my daughters wanted one.  My daughters and their mother say they get great results everytime.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: This was a gift to my Daughter. Loves the pink color, works great she has used the hair dryer everyday since she has received it.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
Other reviews stated it was to hot. Not for me. Gets warm but I could not call it hot.

Recommend

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline hair dryer, silky black
review_body: I am able to dry my hair faster, this dryer is simple, powerful and it's easy to handle! Love it!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I just got me new blow dryer and I LOVE it. It is so quite and it dry's my hair in half the time of my old one, I also love that the cord winds right up.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: A blow dyrer that gets the job done. I have very thick hair that requires a lot of heat. The Andis 1875 Watt provided that and what would normally take about 30 minutes only took 15.  The comb attachment is heavy duty and durable. I dropped it on the floor twice before using it and it remained intact.  I will say the dryer is on the heavy side but I didn't care because I'd finally found a PROFESSIONAL grade, affordable, and durable hair dryer.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: Similar to some reviewers, initially I became fond of this specific type of hair dryer when I was lodging in a hotel. The hair dryer has several combinations of blowing temperature and speed. I like the fact that its lowest wind level is low enough, unlike some of the hair dryers on the market which are way too power even set on the lowest switch. I found this item on amazon and the price is unbeatable. Recommend.

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I think this blow dryer is stronger than my full size blow dryer.  It is just the perfect size and the folding handle is great.  I looked a long time for a good brand, reliable compact dryer with a folding handle.  So glad I spotted this one on Amazon.  This dryer and a compact flat iron are the perfect pair.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I purchased this hairdryer after the last one (which was just like this one died.)  I love that it is a wall mount and is out of the way and not a hairdryer laying on the counter.  I also like that it is quieter than most hairdryers.  It is not a "Turbo" type dryer.  I have shorter hair so it is works well but if I had really long hair I might would consider a stronger one.  I also like the night light on it.  It is not a really bright light, but just enough to shed light to walk into the bathroom without bumping into things and not have to turn a light on.

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: Great Dryer with a lot of power.  Quick drying hair.  I love it and would recommend to anyone.  Very satisfied.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This is a great hair blower and I can't believe how good it is for the price!  Don't know why one would get a more expensive one.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: This hair dryer is not very big which is just fine with me. I am a short person with small hands so it fits comfortably in my hand and it is also light weight.  Vivid dark pink with 2 attachments that I use a lot. The auto cord reel is genius!!! A bonus.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Best hair dryer I've ever used
review_body: This thing is SO fantastic, seriously. I'm tempted to buy another and just stash it in the closet in case it discontinues before I need a new one. It dries my hair so quickly and leaves it smoother than I've ever experienced from a dryer. I'm notorious for showering at night simply so that I don't have to bother with drying my hair because it takes too much time in the mornings, but this dryer makes what is generally a lengthy and annoying process a quick, simple thing. The retractable cord is a huge plus, the folding neck is a plus, I really just can't say enough good things about this dryer. Especially for the price! BUY IT.

product_title: andis 1600-watt quiet wall mounted hangup hair dryer, white (30135)
review_body: I purchased this dryer in August 2013. February 14th the heater element burnt out. Very short life but great when it worked. Wondering how to return or replace?

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: This dryer is average size nothing compact about it.. And it's not as warm as my normal one but it does fold up and I love the cord I usually turn it on high for a few seconds just so it will warm up a bit but the high is to strong to dry my bangs and hair so I turn it down to med.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: I was pleased when I first received this dryer.  But after struggling with it I now realize it is a bust.  The flexible tube fits into the bonnet with such a tiny turn that it is impossible to keep the tube there.  You must hold onto the tube or it falls out.  And it gets so hot it is difficult to hold.  I thought it  would get easier to use after a few tries but it is hopeless.  I hope no one else gets conned into buying this.  If it hadn't been for struggling with some surgery I would have returned this long ago.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Great power and portability! Size is not too small or too large.  I would recommend if you want a powerful travel dryer.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I was very impressed with the color black and the  nightlight will come in handy at night time. It was easy to install.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: After going on vacation and this blow dryer being in my hotel room, I found out which model it was and immediately bought it online! It is the best hair blow dryer I have ever owned, I love it still going strong 2 years later. I am Samoan, I have a lot of hair and it gets done in less than 10 minutes. Thank you!!

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: works well, priced right, but the attachment bracket almost makes it is "permanent" attachment to your wall.  Try to remove it and something will break.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: I was looking for a hair dryer that was cheaper, but made well. This has fit the bill. I'm a guy and decided I could manage my hair a few ways with a hairdryer, if I chose. I didn't want to burn my hair out or have something too feminine or fancy sitting in my bathroom closet. This is simple and sleek. It sounds like a hair dryer.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This particular dryer is very powerful, yet lighter weight than others I've owned.  It's very easy to handle, has several settings available, and the accessories are easy to attach.  My only criticism is that the concentrator is remains stationary which means I must turn the dryer to direct the flow of air, but it's not a big issue.  Am making a recommendation to the company to make the change.

product_title: babyliss pro babfv2 volare ferrari designed professional luxury mid sized hair dryer, 2000 watts, black
review_body:
this is a super blow dry I ever see,
its fast and strong,save a lot of time to dry my client hair
I wish they could made this blow dry a featherweight in the fulture
thanks

product_title: conair 207p infinity tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This is an ok hair dryer. I had a previous model and it lasted for a very long time. My only real complaint is that I think it should get hotter on the high setting.

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_headline: Great for drying and deep conditioning
review_body: I have very curly, color treated hair that gets too curly and frizzy when dried with a diffuser. This dryer is perfect to dry my hair and do deep conditioning treatments. I usually let my hair air dry, which can take 2 hours! With the dryer, I put it on cool for about 25-30 minutes while I return emails, and I'm good to go! I like the ability to roll it around as well as the temp and timer dials. Shipping was very fast! I've used it about 3 times per week for a couple of weeks, and so far so good!

product_title: extracompact twinturbo 3500 2000 watt compact professional hair dryer
review_body: Works really good.. Thought it was bigger though.. It has a small nozzle. But it definitely gets the job done.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: Very good! I use it everyday, and it has worked very well for 5 months. The price is attractive! The protective switch is convenient.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_headline: Don't Let The Cheap Price Fool Ya
review_body: I was in need of a new hair dryer after mine broke and I discovered that they don't make it anymore. I purchased a hairdryer at a local beauty supply chain, thinking that it would work about as well as my dearly departed one. Wrong! It left my hair feeling very dry, in spite of the product I use on my hair prior to blowing it dry. I was going to invest in a CHI, but after reading mostly negative reviews on that model, I decided to save my money and get this Andis hair dryer. I have very thick, coarse, long hair (4 inches past my shoulders), and I'm transitioning from relaxer to natural. I have about 3-4 inches of new growth, and the rest is still relaxed, so straighter styles work for the time being. This hair dryer is EVERYTHING! Not only was it easy on the wallet, it gets my hair dry super quickly, while not sucking all of the moisture out of my hair. It takes less than 20 minutes to dry my hair, which is quicker than even my original blow dryer, and gets my roots pretty straight (I use the small tooth comb attachment). It's easy to hold and gets hot without burning my scalp. Coupled with my Sedu flat iron, my hair is almost salon quality, super soft and shiny! I would recommend this to anyone with the same hair texture as me. I am VERY pleased!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Yes, it was dirt cheap, but my wife reports it's not that great.  Apparently it doesn't get as hot as other models, and the air it pushes is just so-so, so it takes longer to work.

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Conair 124TL Folding Handle 1875-Watt Dryer great item, Fast drying. great colors. I do have several other dryers that I end up giving away or trash them they are way to big and heavy, so this is just right

product_title: revlon 1875w rectractable cord, fold & go hair dryer
review_headline: Most annoying dryer I've ever had.
review_body:
I bought this at Target without looking up reviews... mistakes were made.

By far, this has been the most annoying hair dryer I've owned. And trust me, when it comes to a product you're going to be using almost everyday, you do not want it to be annoying.

1) STIFF BUTTONS -- The buttons are flush with the surface of the handle, and they're intended to be slid up and down. Unfortunately, they're incredibly stiff and difficult to move. I have to use my fingernail every time (which is irritating and uncomfortable), and even then I often have to fidget/wiggle it around. Sometimes it takes a couple of tries.

2) ATTACHMENT FALLS OFF -- Oh man. Ugh. I use the concentrator attachment, and seriously, the touch of a feather is enough to knock that thing off the dryer. Literally every time it falls off in the middle of use. If not once, then twice, sometimes even three times. The worst part is that, once it falls off, it then bounces around the bathroom, making a HUGE clattering ruckus, before finally landing somewhere. This seems to happen most often when other people are still asleep and I'm trying to be quiet. My boyfriend is always highly amused at the #*$& that comes out of my mouth when this happens.

And now, after about a year of frequent use, the dryer has begun to make loud sparking noises. No visible sparks, just the sound... but I'm not about to wait for actual fire before I toss this. I'd like to keep my hair, thanks. I'm already shopping for another one. Honestly, I'm not even that put out. It's a relief.

The ONE thing I liked about the dryer was its compactness -- because of the retracting cord and folding handle, it took up little space in my bathroom.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_headline: Not As Powerful As I thought
review_body: This hairdryer isn't as powerful as I thought it would be. I have cheaper ones from Target that blow more air. I got it for the cool air switch and it does work fine.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body: Using for personal use; recommended by my hairstylist. Worth the price! Dries quickly but doesn't dry out your hair. Noticable difference from any other hair dryer. I like to get my hair dried fast!

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: Just what we were looking for . Compact light and functional. Haven't used it yet but seems to be what I wanted.  Good quality of manufacture, just what the Dr. ordered.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: This dryer has good air velocity, but the air isn't as warm as I would like it to be. Also it has a higher pitch whine than I would have expected for a dryer of this size. I have a little portable dryer and this one sounds almost identical. I do love the retractable cord. It's nice not having a bunch of loose cord everywhere. I also like that it folds down to a smaller size for packing away.

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body:
Lets just say...I no longer need to go to the hair salon to get my hair done. It dries your hair super fast and its not heavy to use.
In the beginning I had to get use to using it but after a few tries I mastered blowing out my hair just like they do in the hair salon. I highly recommended!!!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
It's a powerful little dry and it comes with a lot of attachable heads if your the type to use it.
It gets pretty hot on the hottest setting and in fact will turn off by itself if it overheats, turning itself back on later once it's cooled.
Dries well and is definitely better than my old lower watt Conair.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I defrost my freezer with it, I thawed out my car doors with itr.  I live in a humid part of the country where a towel doesn't quite get the job done so I use it for that.  I even dey my hair with it

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I would have given it 5 stars, but the toggle switches for speed and heat are located where you grip the handle, as you can see from the picture, and I'm constantly turning the heat back up because I've hit the switch while drying my hair.  Lots of cool attachments I haven't tried yet.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: Mid heat setting is too cool
review_body:
I have curly hair and in order to dry it without frying it, I like to use a diffuser, a low fan setting and a mid heat setting. This hair dryer claims to have all of that, but the "warm" heat setting is so cool that I have to use "hot" if I ever want my hair to actually dry. The "hot" setting is what it claims to be and can be downright scalp scalding. I have no problem with the hot setting being that hot, I appreciate it when I'm straightening my hair, but the "warm" setting is insufficient for my needs.

Other than that, the hair dryer is great, the attachments work well (the condenser doesn't spin like I've had happen on other hair dryers) the retractable cord doesn't have any problems, the air intake never sucks my long hair in and the color is even a nice midway point between red and pink.

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body:
Love this full hair dryer that isn't compact while retracted -and has the full power of a normal hair dryer.
Love the color
I do wish it had a hot or hotter setting though like the Infinity Pro by Conair 1875 watt Hair Dryer - Purple, which I also have
all in all a very good compact hair dryer that drys hair fast.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: I wanted to have something that helped keep counters clear.  This is inexpensive and serves the purpose. Cords don't stretch out and looks organized.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body:
It's is awesome, made my life easier and I don't have to go to the parlor every week as I was doing before. I have curly hair, with this product Im able to blow dryer well and style with my flat iron. The only negative about it is the little attachable brush, not good quality, I used once and its gone, needs a replacement. The combs are fine!
Overall I recommend the product, It was a great addition.
Rose Rosa

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer works great for me and the price is very reasonable. It also More than met my expectations.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: Just what I was looking for.
review_body: The dryer is light weight and full of options.  I am quite pleased with it and will buy the same brand again..

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: makes hair straight but oh my god. it plugs out every 5 seconds.

product_title: conair pro styler ionic conditioning hair dryer
review_body:
I am perfectly satisfied with this blow-dryer. Although it is fairly small, it is quite powerful and dries my hair in no time.
Very happy with my purchase.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I have been happily using this dryer for 8 years - best dryer I have ever purchased and no indication that it won't be going strong 8 years from now

product_title: panasonic nano-e nano care hair dryer eh-na95 | ac100v 50-60hz (japan model)
review_body: I've using this dryer for 2 months and decided to get one for my sis and my mom too. It's different than the regular dryer cuz it comes w/ multi-functions. You can choose "scalp mode" for sensitive scalp and "skin mode" when applying face mask. Its a bit pricey but the money is all worth it!!

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I didn't realize it included the retractable cord. It works great. The folding handle is also a plus. Also good power

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body: I was very happy with it for the first 5 months, but was shocked this morning when it made a loud bang and tripped the circuit breaker.  I have never had a hair dryer break in this short amount of time.  Buyer beware.  I can't return it, but I'll write Remington and let them know what I think of their product.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body: The hair dryer itself is OK, not great (doesn't seem to get very hot), but OK.  However, my biggest issue is the location of the buttons. Every.Single.Time. I blowdry my hair, my hand either automatically switches the settings to cold or a low setting.. they are located exactly where I'm holding the dryer! I can't stand it!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I bought this well over a year ago but wanted to write a review since I enjoy this hair dryer so much. What I love about it most is the retractable cord--awesome invention. I also like that you can remove and clean the filter. Noise level is standard for a hair dryer, maybe even slightly quieter than average. My only criticism is that it is the heaviest hair dryer I have owned. So glad I bought this and not a super cheap one.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Bang for the buck. Bought this for my wife, since she was struggling with a spaced out hair dryer that she's been using for many years. This worked perfectly, would recommend for anyone who doesn't like a change, although it long overdue. Lives up to the expectations

product_title: pro beauty tools professional turbo hair dryer
review_body: The dryer was, dare I say it, GREASY. I thought as long as it works, fine. Nope, does not work. The seller, hottest deals, should be ashamed of what they sent for the price I paid.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body:
I first bought this hair dryer because of the positive reviews left by other reviewers with thick hair. In the morning, I don't want to spend 20 minutes just making sure my hair is dry before I leave. I want some time to style, too.

This hair dryer has a professional quality motor (1875 watt AC motor) which translates to stronger air flow, hotter air, and less drying time. That's exactly what I wanted and that's what I got. This hairdryer, with the airflow concentrator attachment, dried my hair in under 7 minutes, which is unheard of for me. It has 3 heat settings, 2 fan speeds, and a cool air shot button.

BONUS: This hair dryer is quieter than a lot of others I've owned. It's still a hair dryer, so it'll make noise, but this one's noises are hushed.

Besides its speedy drying, it's just a really pretty hair dryer. It's got an attractive black matte finish that's soft to the touch. It also features pretty pink pearlescent buttons and accents.

CONCLUSION: I recommend this hair dryer to those who are looking for a quiet, yet powerful hair dryer to streamline their morning routine.

product_title: bed head hot head 1875w hair dryer for massive shine
review_body:
I had a bed head dryer which i used for six + years. I wore out the plug on it and replaced the 3 years ago. One day, the replaced plug arc'd electricity and ruined the dryer. :( Because the bed head dryer I purchased was so great, I found this one with similar features as the previous one and purchased. I used this one for six months and it was awful. The dryer would over heat the exterior of my hair and not get the hair closer to my head dry. Tried all different combination settings and it caused horrible frizziness and breakage in my hair - no matter the setting used.

In January, I purchased a Hot Tools blow dryer and immediately frizziness went away.

Do not purchase this dryer because it causes hair damage quickly. My hair is extremely thick and curly with highlights and length is midway down my back..

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I had to return this dryer because it was too heavy for me.  I thought my strong, volleyball playing daughter might want it, but she also said it was too heavy. Powerful enough but too heavy.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I had this same hair dryer for over ten years before it stopped working, so I replaced it with the same model!  I only wish there were more color options, but for the quality the price can't be beat!

product_title: conair bb075w pro blackbird 2000-watt hair dryer
review_body:
Best Hairdryer going. Big powerfull, lasts yaears and years.

This is about teh third one I have purchased and I hope they keep making them..

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body:
Easy to install and use. Did whish they came in diferent colors.Would reccomend to use in any bathroom. I think I might get one for my shop. to heat materials prior to gluing.
Skip Kempf

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Loved this.  Big enough for the rollers and I have long, thick hair.  Hot enough to dry my hair in a reasonable time.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Own this for a while. No problems so far. Worked as well as it did on the first day I purchased it. Some nice features for the money

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Wife loves it, and holds up very well after several bashes on my head with it.
review_body: This hair dryer will take the abuse of flying 20' through the air and smashing me in the head! Very durable and she likes the retracting cord!

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: This item is a little smaller than my last hair dryer, but the power makes up for any shortness in the top.  My hair dries in less time.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: it is a good dryer, for the size of it, it has good drying power. It is easy to pack for trips.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I tried this at a beautiful, luxury hotel in Newport, RI. and it was love for my naturally thick, somewhat frizzy hair.  It came out straight and smooth and oh so shiny.  I knew I wanted one.  Told the BF how much I loved it and he ended up going to the hotel on one of his next trips and they sold him a new one from housekeeping right from the hotel.  That was almost two years ago and it's still 'all that' in my book.  Retractable cord still retracts like a champ.  My hair dries nicely, easily, no fuss.  The weight seems fine to me.  I've had high end $200 hair dryers and have no recollection of them being even remotely better than this little baby.  For the price, this is a steal.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:

Tommy Hilfiger

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: Bought this as stocking stuffer and daughters luv luv it.  Great gift and actually has removable lint screen which a lot of blow dryers don't have.  Will buy another one soon because 1 blow dryer for 2 girls doesn't quite do it!!!  Lol

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: Powerful dryer and easy to install, at a good price.  Keeps the cord off the counter and frees up counter space.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body: This is the first time that I've spent over $30 for a hair dryer. I was really looking forward to using this. I have had this hair dryer for 1 month, and I have to say that my biggest complaint is the nozzle attachment keeps falling off which is very aggravating.  Other than that I love how quick it dries my hair, and it does make my hair look more smoother.  I have thick wavy curly frizzy hair.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: The price on this was about 30% lower than the same model in the store, so considering the price it was a great choice. My only "complaint" is that the Low setting is a little too low, and the High setting is a little too high for my preference. A speed right between the two would be ideal, but that is a minor issue. It works well for what I need.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: This replaced my previous hair dryer, same brand and model, that had lasted many years.  My wife couldn't live without it.

product_title: remington silk ceramic professional hair dryer
review_headline: It's fine if you don't need precision drying
review_body:
The good: powerful, fast drying that leaves hair feeling good.

The bad: too much power on the low speed leaves lots of flyaways and substantially reduces control over the finished style.

This hairdryer has a lot of power, which is great for getting your hair from wet to damp quickly. The problem is that this hairdryer has too much power on the low speed for a polished set and style.

I wanted a hairdryer that would complete the first 50% of hair drying quickly, but then allow me to use a lower speed with my round brush to get a smooth finish. This dryer just has too much power going to it at the low speed setting, which means I get lots of flyaways. If you always flat iron or curl after drying, or if you don't care about style and just want to get your hair dry fast, or (maybe) if you have really thick strands, this could be a great dryer. With my medium-fine hair, I just can't get that polished set that I'm looking for. My hair does feel nice after I dry it, and if I'm planning to curl or flat iron after drying then I really appreciate how fast I can get my hair dry. However, I don't like that I MUST flat iron or curl my hair to get it to look finished. If this dryer had a third, lower speed setting, or if the low speed setting had 30% less power, this would be a GREAT hairdryer. As it is, I break out my old Vidal Sassoon 1875 to finish the style (I got the Remington when my Vidal Sassoon stopped working on "high" and would only work on "low").

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: Will never live without one of these again!
review_body: So convenient, seems to work just fine, had it for a month so far. Easy to install and looks great too.

product_title: remington d3015 ionic ceramic dryer, ionic hair dryer, hair dryer
review_headline: It does harm to long hair!
review_body: I bought it because of the low price and beautiful color, but tne item's color is so different from the picture. The most feature that diappointed me is my hair always roll into the back of it and the dryer broke my hair a lot, I strongly recommended people do not buy this product. I just don't want bother to return it, this is the only reason I keep it.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Replaced it because there was no difference between the heat settings.  The dryer didn't get hot enough to dry my short hair in less than 10 minutes.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
it's a little heavy but it's well made and easy to use.
I like the smooth feeling of the surface.
wish it was a little bit smaller/lighter.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: bought this on a whim shopping at costco, I was in desperate need of a blow dryer, so anything would do. I just spent a ton of money on a vacuum, so a high end blow dryer was going to have to wait. I have to say after one use, I am very impressed. My other blow dryer was still working, but was causing my hair to frizz up horribly. I really wasn't expecting this blow dryer to work so quickly and efficiently. My hair is smoother and more manageable. Note, I am also using salon quality shampoo and conditioner, so that helps a lot.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: Bought this for my elderly mother, whose old hairdryer was heavy and bulky. She loves this one, it's light and much easier for a handicapped person to use.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: This dryer dries my long hair quickly and efficiently.  I even notice less frizz than I used to, which is fantastic.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: My wife and I bought this for our travels in Europe.  It works well here in the U.S., but much louder and hotter in Europe.  So far, it worked, though.

product_title: proversa micro turbo dual voltage portable hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: The hair dryer is tiny, yet powerful. It has two speeds and and attachment to extend the dryer. Build quality appears to be similar to big brand name hair dryers.

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: Very convenient and easy to setup. Everything was in the box and the directions were easy to follow. I would definitely recommend especially as an investment to save money.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: No sales puffing with this product.  It performs exactly as marketed and fits into small spaces.  The retractable cord was a selling point for me, and it drys my hair quickly and thoroughly.  I would have no reservation recommending this unit.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I don't know what I'll think in six months if the dryer konks out on me.  But for now, I couldn't be happier.  I use the warm, low setting for my hair, and the results are great--smooth, non frizzy hair.  My hair is fairly straight, but some dryers manage to make it look a little frizzy, which is a mystery to me.  Anyway, I'm very pleased, and the price was excellent.

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_headline: Great for a Eurotrip, not regular use
review_body:
I bought this for my most recent Eurotrip. I used it in France, Italy and Spain with no problems (on the higher voltage setting). It is compact but not as light as I was expecting. Using this higher setting gives you only one setting option - low. But the power over there is so strong that it feels more like high. Even high though isn't that powerful, but gets the job done for basic drying purposes - probably not any fancy styles. Make sure to set it to high with a screwdriver before you go- I had a heck of a time finding an object equivalent to a flat head screwdriver.

In the States, this hair dryer isn't really worth using. "Low" is like someone blowing out their birthday cake candles and high is like...well...not much more than that. I will use this as my travel blow dryer only.

product_title: br beauty meredith 880w salon hair dryer with casters
review_body:
I bought this dryer because I wanted to deep condition my hair and also do roller sets (for reference I have hair to my tail bone with curly 3c type texture). Anyways… This dryer didnt even work!! I opened the package and all the parts were there. I put it together according to the instructions…. but then when I plugged it in and turned it on, NOTHING happened. The timer worked (it sounds like a cooking timer), but nothing else did. There was no air flow, no power light- NOTHING!!!

I will be returning this, but I am yet to hear from the seller (this just happened today). I will come back on here to write an update and let you ladies know how/if they resolve the issue. I expect I will have to pay return shipping- but thats not fair given that I was shipped a defective item! (If I do- I will leave negative feedback).

Overall the appearance of this dryer was "cheap". The stickers surrounding the dials were peeling off once I opened the box, and the dryer hood wasn't very sturdy on the pole. Don't get me wrong- I wasn't expecting this to be a "Mr. Pibbs" by any means, but good grief- I at least expected it to turn on!! I must've gotten a bad dryer b/c the other reviews on here are decent (hence my deciding to purchase one). But ladies take my advice…. if you want a "risk free" piece of equipment then just save up and get a Mr. Pibbs. Otherwise you run the risk of being in my situation with a bum dryer and the possibility of having to pay return.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Andis RC-2 Ionic1875W Ceramic Hair Dryer with Folding Handle and...
review_body: This hair dryer is a little heavier than the one I replaced; however, it drys quickly, not hot to the touch, and the retractable cord is nice even though it needs a little help retracting at times.  That said, would recommend.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body:
I was unable to find a comparable product at the local big box stores.

I was pleased to find this at a price that was approximately 50% less than other retailers and websites.

Works great and does not take up additional counter top in bathroom.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: Compact, easy to hang and reliable. Very powerful for the size. Would recommend this to anyone needing a small hair dryer.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_headline: Quiet and hot, but not powerful
review_body: I read the previous reviews commenting on how quiet it is, but I was disappointed to see that it also meant it was lacking power to dry hair quickly. I don't understand the negative ion feature but it doesn't seem to make a difference. The hair dryer is ok, but I wouldn't have bought it knowing what I know now.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: Does the job, but going to keep looking
review_body:
I was in the market for a new hair dryer after my previous one gave out after a few years. I did considerable research, and was drawn to this one by the great reviews and the low price.

This one is suitable, but I'm going to keep looking for a new one.

Cons:
- It increased my drying time (I previously had an inexpensive Revlon)
- Even on the highest setting, the temperature does not get that hot
- It is a bit on the heavy side

Pros:
- The retractable cord is great for storage

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I love this hair dryer. It's fast at drying and quiet. It's a great tool for everyday drying and worth the money. I also bought the hair straightner and it's just as good. I hope Onei keeps making great products like Chi use too!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Works well, temperatures are a little different than what I used to.
review_body: I bought this after my brand new Revlon hair dryer stopped working inexplicably.  I was looking for a cheap hair dryer that i could use every few days when I need my hair dry faster than usual and that wouldn't crap out on me right after I bought it.  It's 3 months later and it still works great! I don't really have many gripes about it.  They only thing I'll mention is the "warm" setting seems a bit too cool for warm.  I've always used the warm setting in the past because I don't want to fry my hair with the "hot" setting and "cool" doesn't dry fast enough. With this hair dryer, I use "hot" more as the "warm" setting just doesn't cut it.  Other than that, great!

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body: I love the power this dryer has.  Cuts drying time by a third.  Nice folding handle if traveling is required as well as the short barrell.  Does not perform like a travel dryer - excellent.

product_title: br beauty meredith 880w salon hair dryer with casters
review_body: I recommend it ,is a very good product.i only work with the best ,it worth the money ,I'm going to buy three more.

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_headline: Too Expensive to Break So Soon
review_body: Purchased this blow dryer hoping that by spending more I would get a better product. Afterall, it is supposed to be a "pro" dryer. Totally disappointed when it simply quit working. Just. Like. The. Cheap. Ones!  Also, as noted by other reviewers this dryer does get very hot and if you are not careful it will dry your hair out.

product_title: t3 tourmaline 83808 professional featherweight ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: I purchased this dryer because of a recommendations from a stylist. She commented that she loved it. Before purchasing it, I read the reviews. Some were happy ,some complained about the dryer lasting a few days. Well, that is what happened to me. Upon receiving the dryer I noticed that it did not had temperature control. So I decided to return it since I did not like the lack of that feature. The company was eager to collaborate and refund the money to me even without asking me to return it. I was surprised and said to myself, wow this company is really different  from others, in terms of customer service. However, I used it one more time and the breakers blew and the dryer stopped working all together. The dryer lasted exactly three days. From the moment I received it to the moment  it stopped working. I was happy that I initiated the return earlier without me than knowing this unfortunate circumstance  might happened. I believed this product does not have a good quality control from the manufacturer, since more of one review complained about the same. From the reviews it would appear that the product used to be good and some  customers were happy with it like the stylist that recommended the dryer to me but  now it looks that quality fell very very low.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: It was great, until the fireworks
review_body: I've had this hairdryer for a year and a half.  I love the settings and how quickly it dries my hair.  It didn't last as long as I'd hoped, however.  It just started popping and shooting fire out of the end.

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_headline: Did I get the right one?
review_body: Just got this delivered today, fast service. Put it together, but the directions and picture show a power on/off switch, mine doesn't have one, and instead of Fahrenheit it is Celsius. The dryer goes on when you set the timer. The picture on the box also shows a on/off button. Other than turning it on, I haven't used it. Tomorrow I will try it out.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: This is light, quiet, effective, several options for heat and speed settings.  Everything you need. Top rated by consumer reports.

product_title: farouk deep brilliance professional hair dryer
review_body: It is lightweight however it is very loud and it is not as powerful as i thought. I ended up buying another one a few months later.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Good Hair dryer but does not really blow hot air
review_body: It does the trick however High is not as high as most hair dryers and when you put it to blow Hot air it's not Hot at all more like warm very light warm....

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_headline: conair 14R 1600 Watt Wallmount Dryer with Led Night light
review_body: I oove it!  Works great, plenty of blow power and love the added bonus of the night light. I would recommend this product for purchase.

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_headline: I love It, Worked in Cuba
review_body:
I used this powerful, 1875 Watts, Dual Voltage 125/250 blower in Cuba last week, along with a separate plug adaptor. It worked perfectly, just turn the button on the handle with maybe a knife (or other instrument) to 250V setting, and use on high or low settings.
This is a great product for me, I don't like the blow dryers usually found in hotels outside the US (you need to continuously press on the power button to keep it on) because it's awkward scrunching my hair into the diffuser with my other hand. Also, the diffuser is high quality with twelve prongs.
It's not exactly tiny in size once it's open, but is slightly smaller than my regular blower, and it's great the handle folds.

When travelling, it's the small conveniences that make me happy, and this blower did just that!

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body: Bought this hair dryer in May, 2013.  After about 9 mos. of use, I noticed that the fan speed suddenly dropped to its slowest speed eventhough the setting was for the highest.  Then, I saw tiny little sparks inside the hair dryer at which point I immediately turned it off!  I've never liked the hair dryer, in part because it's positioned in such an awkward upward angle, causing me to twist my wrist to force the angle down.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This does not hurt your hair. Very well suited for daily use, If you are looking for any specific style dryiers, this is the best one for everyday use.

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: I bought this Conair to replace an older model that I had had for over 10 years! The is slightly smaller than the older 1875 model but I prefer that. The folding arm functions well and the high setting is perfect for those fast blow dry mornings.

product_title: helen of troy revlon rv473 hair dryer - 1875 w - handheld
review_body: My wife requested it because she already had one at our 1st home and wanted one just like it for our 2nd home.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_body:
The first time I used it I saw the difference with my hair. My hair was softer and less frizzy.
But I still find it expensive.

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: It drys your hair fast and its not too laud.  Easy to move around if you need to use it anywhere in the house.

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: I have purchased two of these blow dryers, one for myself and the other as a gift. The HSI works well, dries hair quickly, the controls are easy to use and the cord is longer than any other I have purchased. I have noticed that my hair is smoother than when dried with my last dryer, a Babyliss Pro. Both of us are happy with the HSI. I would purchase again.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: i have only had this for alittle over a month and it broke today. will never buy another one from here.

product_title: hot tools ionic anti-static professional dryer - model # 1035 - black/purple hair dryer for unisex
review_body: This dryer is lightweight by very powerful.  It dries my hair very fast on a low setting so I have less breakage.

product_title: panasonic kurukuru hair dryer eh-ka25-p pink | ac100v 50/60hz (japan model)
review_body: Best hair dryer ever! My hair has been so easy to manage with it especially with my very very thick hair.  I would definitely recommend this hair dryer to anyone.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This hairdryer is working out well for me. It is hard for me to believe that the ionic conditioning feature really works but it really seems to!  My hair has less static in it after I use this dryer on it. This winter has seemed unusually static filled so this is a welcome relief.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer is awesome!! It doesn't get too hot and dries my hair very nicely and was exactly what I was looking for!! Very pleased!!!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I like it because it is not a noisy hair dryer. It works fine and does have a comfort touch.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
