product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_headline: Old one worked great, new replacement keeps shorting out fuse
review_body: We had our old Conair for years and loved it, so I got a replacement.  The new one keeps flipping the fuse switch in the switch box, so all the lights and electric go off in the bathroom, so I've had to stop using our master bathroom to dry my hair, which is ridiculous.  I'm getting rid of it and getting something that doesn't cause this many problems.  I tried to be a loyal customer, but this is how I'm repaid, by a crummy product.  We're done with Conair.

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: This dryer rocks.  My daughter bought one for me last year and all of a sudden the heating element stopped working.  I had to buy another, this brand is different.  Hopefully wont have the same fate.  My hair dries in 15 minutes.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_headline: too bad they don't last - they work great when they work
review_body: I have gone through too many of these dryers. It is my favorite in terms of how great it blows hair straight. But they break too easily and for that price, I had to go with something that i don't like as much but that lasts. Mine burnt out within 2 months and I could not return it by the time I got back into the country from my travels.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I turned it on and it only blew cold air, even when adjusting the settings. I didn't save my receipt or box. Be warned!!

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body: I wasn't sure about spending so much on a hair dryer. I normally just buy the ones at the drug store. This one was recommended to me since my hair is fluffy. It has an extra long cord and a cold shot too. It dries my hair without burning it, and keeps the frizz down without having to use a ton of silicone oil finishing product. I would highly recommend.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I thought it should come with more separate low heat styling controls. The cord did not retract well into the base. Maybe should of been a little lighter in weight. still all in all worked well enough for the price.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: This is a great product, works better than my full size blow dryer. And the carrying bag just makes it that much better.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: Wattage not too high and just the right size.  It's small enough to tote to the pool in my gym bag, but large enough to do a great job at home, too.  I have had it a couple of years now.  It looks like it might continue to work--unlike so many other electrical products in this day and age of globalized manufacturing.  I cannot tell you hiow much money I spend just trying to get away from products made by slave labor!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I bought this for my lady as one of her Christmas gifts. She had her last hair dryer for 7 years or so. This one drys her hair in half the time and is about 20 times quieter. I can't write much about the features, but I do know that she loves it.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: I bought the dryer to dry my pets after washing them. It works well, dries quickly, has the ceramic heating element and and ion drying feature as the more expensive models. Durabilty is another variable that I can't access.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body:
The bearing in my wife's blow dryer was getting pretty loud (enough to wake me up in the morning - she gets up before me). Got this one based on the reviews here and elsewhere. It looks good as far as blow dryers go I guess (I don't use them), It's actually fairly quiet, considering.

I asked my wife about the 'frizz' claim the other day, as I was skeptical about that part of the claim - and she said it really does work (she normally has a 'frizz' problem). Not sure if it's a placebo affect, but she's happy, so I'm happy. She likes it better than her previous one, so that was already a plus.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body:
My wife was looking for a new hair dryer for quite some time. She has gone through a few with her longer hair and she was sick of them constantly burning out or having issues. The last one she has dims the lights when she would start it up and the transformer would get ridiculously hot.

After reading many reviews of many different products, I chose this one and she absolutely loves it. Thus far, it is a champ and does exactly what it is supposed to do.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Bought this to use on a recent trip to Africa. Worked perfectly and was the solution to managing my hair in the third world. I left it there with a young lady who couldn't afford to buy one for herself.  Two happy girls.

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: great small hair dryer that I'm able to keep in the camper for when we travel about. takes up nearly zero space & works quite well

product_title: remington compact ionic travel hair dryer, (colors vary) d5000
review_body: I purchased this dryer many years ago from a retail store.  As stated "many years ago".  Easy to handle , great choices of temperatures and speed .  It finally gave out.  I tried a few other dryers,---full sized and small. and none could  compared to this mighty dryer.  Returned the other and then purchased this through Amazon.  Five stars..... !!!!!!!

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: Hair gets dry fast! I have long hair, below my shoulders but above waist.  It takes me 35-40 minutes (I have fine textured hair).  The temperature never feels too hot but it does the job, even at its highest level; and there is barely any sound coming out of this hair dryer!  One can literally talk on the phone or what TV while under this dryer.  One of the pieces, the hinged hood, broke during shipping, but the company responded quickly and promised to ship it.  But I did not wait, I used super glue so that i could go ahead and start using it.  It works just fine!

product_title: remington silk ceramic professional hair dryer
review_body: This blow dryer works better than other blow dryers in the past, in that it is quieter. In addtion, there are 3 heat settings so if your scalp is sensitive to heat, you have the option of lower heat.

product_title: revlon 1875w rectractable cord, fold & go hair dryer
review_headline: It's better than the new Andis I bought!
review_body:
I researched dryers extensively, bought the Andis (retractable, etc), liked it
for size, worked well. The switches weren't ideal, but... Then after a year it stopped clicking
into full position (& I didn't fold & retract regularly), then a piece that fell out of
the mechanism got into the motor= into the trash, not even worth salvaging. I bought the 18575W at Goodwill for
.99 & Love it, better than the Andis. Unlike many other reviewers, I find the switch
to be zero problem, actually prefer it, plus nothing is in the way of ones hand while drying.
There you go; there's no telling & opinions are anecdotal!

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Three Conair dryers.  First one went on fire during use.  Second one didn't make it a year before the button broke off to retract the cord.  E-mailed Conair and they responded with lengthy instructions on how I can fix it.  Instead, I threw it away and bought the 260PX.  Although it worked well, it stopped working after 13 months.  I contacted Conair and was given instructions on how to get a new one under the limited warranty.  With the cost of shipping both ways, it would cost me the same to buy a new dryer.  So that's what I'm doing...just not from Conair.  Will never buy another Conair product!!

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: My mom travels a lot and this small size and ability to change electrical current for overseas a plus....no additional adaptor needed. 1875 watts is quite powerful. All you need for on the go or at home is storage is an issue.

product_title: pro beauty tools professional turbo hair dryer
review_headline: The Perfect Hair Dryer! Super Quiet!
review_body: After reading all the positive reviews on this hair dryer everywhere I decided to buy it & I love it! This hair dryer really is SUPER QUIET! This dryer runs so quiet you won't believe it, seriously!  If your like me & can't stand the dryers that have that high pitched loud noise then this is the dryer for you. I also needed a dryer with a long cord, the 9ft cord on this one is perfect. I have long thick hair & this dries my hair pretty fast & gets nice & hot on the highest heat setting. It is also a little lighter than my old hair dryer which is nice. I love this hair dryer so much that I'm buying a second one for my Mom.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: My wife loves it, it's so quiet we can talk while she does her hair without her turning off the blow dryer to here what I said.

product_title: remington silk ceramic professional hair dryer
review_body:
I like this unit after reading product description. I ordered it. I have to travel to countries where we have 220Volt power supply and I purchased a special voltage converter for hair dryers only.

When I received it and read the safety guidlines in the note inside the package, I came to know I can not use this product with extension wires or with voltage converters. So this beautiful looking piece is no more good for me :(

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body: This was a gift for my daughter for Christmas. She couldn't wait to use it and she LOVES it, says its the best hair dryer out there.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: Well, I cannot say enough about this product.  As other customers have also stated, I bought it for travel and now use it every day.  You will not be disappointed.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body:
This dryer leaves all the shine and body in fine hair without sacrificing drying time. It's evident now that the previous expensive, super powerful, tourmaline dryer was blowing the body and shine out of the hairstyle. Many bad hair days blamed on aging/change of life that were actually caused by the too powerful dryer.
With absolutely no changes to hair drying routine or styling products all hair drying sessions have produced good hair days. A most pleasant surprise to recapture more youthful hair.
This dryer is much quieter than the previous one. The brushed finish and brown body/pink accents feel good to the touch and pleasing to the eye.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: I had a previous version of this hair dryer that lasted several years, then shut off and sparked twice to die! This slid onto the attachment I had on my wall, so it was a seamless transition.  It is very loud, hence the start deduction, but I have fine hair that dries quickly, so don't have to hear it for very long. Does the job just fine.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_body: I purchased one for each person of my family and my sister has four bathrooms in her house.  She was so impressed with it, she wanted to order three more, so I surprised her and got them for her.  They are the best on the market :-)  I would purchase again.  We did put one in our 5th wheel bathroom also.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Bought this for my daughters.  They both say it works really well.  It comes with a diffuser and my youngest (late teens) has been using that and likes it.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: I love the wall mount hair dryers.  You always know where it is and it is never in the way. Click and it is ready to use and click it is put away.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: i have fine thin hair and dont need much in the way of a dryer,this one is perfect, love the attachments, dont even need a straightner when  I use this.

product_title: bed head hot head 1875w hair dryer for massive shine
review_body: This is a good hairdryer, and I particularly like the cold shot of air.  It's very powerful -- too powerful for my short curly hair, because it leaves it 'frizzy.' That's where the cold shot of air comes in handy.  Would be ideal for long hair, though.  Well worth the money.  Arrived early, but Amazon always does a great job with delivery.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: The conair hairdryer arrived promptly and works perfectly.  The price was acceptable and I was pleased to have my old non-working appliance replaced so easily.

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body: I am in hair school and his dryer is perfect! Works perfectly, the best dryer out there for sure. I love it.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Bought this dryer to help with my dense wavy hair frizzing when I blow dried it. This seem to do the job well. It has lots of options for heat and speed, and gets my hair dry faster than my old "cheapy" dryer. I have noticed less frizzing and my hair is smoother and shiner than before. I would give it good marks for value for money, it appears to do the job as well as more expensive ceramic dryers I looked at.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: I love this blow dryer but after 6 months it stop blowing hot air! I did buy a new yellow bird but this time I got the warranty!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I purchased it hoping to get that salon blowout look. I was disappointed when it worked the exact same a my old $15 dollar hair dryer.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Less than 1 year later, blows great, no heat!
review_body: Weak blower as well. Why is it the old school Conair dryers would last for YEARS through the worst abuse, but these POS can't last 12 MONTHS under once per week use?  Supposed to be a one year warranty parts and labor. At $11 for a new unit, will cost more to ship to repair center than to buy a new one. Conair knows this unit is junk, hence the $11 price tag. What else is new?

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: For the price, I don't think you can beat this. It's very similar to professional hair dryers. The diffuser is a little big, but still does the trick. Highly recommended.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This is the best hairdryer I've ever owned!  Puts Conair and Revlon hairdryers to shame.  Time to look at other Remington products.  Finding quality these days is rare.  Happy with my purchase.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: Very flimsy, feels cheap. switch almost broken on first use
review_body: I really don't understand the good reviews. This dryer feels so cheap and flimsy. Almost break the switch on first use. You have to see it to understand what I am talking about. Don't buy it.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: My daughter was thrilled with this blow dryer. It is so compact, that it makes packing it a breeze. It is a little heavier than you would think it would be though.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Easy to use.  It does everything that a hair dryer should. I would recommend it to anyone that needs one.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body:
I used this dryer maybe 10 times tops.
It burned out on me.
Purchased for the price. will get a bit more expensive one this time.
Happy with products sad that it didn't last

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: Make your hair soft, frizz free. My daughter has very thick fine hair. It does a wonderful job. Highly recommend.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I love this hair dryer - ergonimically balanced and dries hair fast. No high pitched whining noise like my old hair dryer.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
I've used this for the last month now, and it is perfect. It does not get overheated, or bring the house down with noise when we use it. It is nice and handy. Blows warm air in the right proportion. I love the multiple speed and heat options Conair provided on this.

I think this is the best product out there for around $10. I strongly recommend this purchase. :)

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body:
I don't know how it does it, but it makes my hair look like a wig. LIKE A BEAUTIFUL, BEAUTIFUL WIG. It's smooth and shiny and requires no flat ironing, it's just perfect. Totally crazy.

Buy it.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Heavier and clumsy to use, but the ion as well as defusier does work well with short hair.....well made and sturdy.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I purchased this hair dryer as a Christmas present and she loves it. The dryer warms instantly, looks great (the matte black....although the pink accent isn't my color), does a great job, and even has little rubber spots on the side, so that it doesn't slip (nice touch). It also has a removable filter that can be cleaned. For the price, I can't complain. I would definitely recommend this to others, as it does a great job at a reasonable price.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: The Handle is too big for me also heavy but I like folding handle ,retractable  code and affordable price! So I gotta  say it's ok !

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I've had this hair dryer for about twelve years now and my sister always uses it when she's here, so I got her one for Christmas.  It has so much power for such a compact dryer.  When mine dies, I'm going to order another one.  Love it!

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: Love this dryer. Have one in every bathroom and gifted one to my daughter. So easy and so reliable. Has never let me down.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Blows cold and hot air. The paint eventually cracks after a couple months, but it's for blowing hair not looking nice. Works great for me!

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: excellant hair dryer that mounts on wall to save counter space. Excellant hot air to dry hair quickly . Nice nightlight that works automaticlly.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Great with great value.It came with instructions for use and gave us real value for our money.It is well recommended.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer works well, however, after about a year or so of use, the clear plastic coating around it, has started to peel off. This speaks to the quality of the materials used. It still works and I still use it but just wanted to mention that. It is pretty light, which is a good thing when you have a lot of hair to dry! The main reason I purchased this one was because it was more affordable than the salon brands.

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: It was a gift my daughter requested. I purchased it for her for her birthday which happens to be on Christmas!

product_title: sunbeam 1632-040 global economizer hair dryer
review_body: Love this dryer. I've been using wall mount hair dryers for years. Actually only one before this one which was also a Sunbeam. Nothing lasts forever. Loved the Sunbeam before this one and this one is really good too. Slender look, night light, two speeds, doesn't seem to get hot. Looks nice on the wall. Have only had this one for a month, but if it's anything like the old one it will last for years.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body:
I used to always buy expensive dryers that ended up not being powerful enough / produced boiling lava hot air that damaged my hair unless I held down the "cool" button almost the entire time.
At a hotel, I used this blow dryer and was amazed at how powerful it was. My hair was completely dry in under 10 minutes, and the air was not painfully hot. This fabulous little dryer is also a great size for travel, or simply taking up less space in your bathroom.
Ditch the fancy dryers and go for this one. I can't speak to the longevity since I've only had it for a month, but I am confident it will last long enough to fulfill it's mere $20 price tag.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
Twin switches for dual heat settings and dual speed settings - plus the blue "no heat" button. Reasonably lightweight, comfortable grip, priced less than almost any other dryer you'll find at a store and yet works just as well, I think.

Be a good steward and get this one.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: We just received the package and opened it. My husband tried out the retractable cord and it doesn't retract. Waste of time and money, and shipping costs as well.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer

However, if you are looking for a nice dryer on a budget, this is a great choice. I love the fact that the cord winds up.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_headline: Heating element stopped working after 6 months
review_body: I loved this hairdryer while it lasted, it had a lot of power, was not terribly loud, and dried my long hair quickly. However, with no warning one recent day it just stopped blowing hot air. Only cold air blows out of the unit now.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: Handheld Hairdryer Issue FIXED by Conair!
review_body:
I've used Conair dryers for years, but they share the same issue with other brands......the little mesh screen filter in the back gets easily clogged with dust, lint, and hair....causing the unit to overheat and eventually die. I've tried everything to keep that little screen clean, including carefully brushing it with a small stiff brush....but then the particulates fall into the motor causing more problems or the lint and stuff just plain won't come off the filter.

I just received this new dryer, to replace a Conair model from several years ago. Conair FINALLY hired someone with some common sense! I was surprised.....this unit has a REMOVABLE screen filter! Which means I can take it off and WASH it (being very careful to insure it's totally dry before replacing on the unit, of course), extending the life of my unit.

Big selling point in my opinion....removable filter info should be in the description. Bravo, Conair, well done!

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body: Is really good, I like it so much, my hair is healthy and look natural, You need to try! .

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: I have used many many less expensive hair dryers over the course of 30+ years and they often break within a year.  I have had this dryer about two years now and it is still going strong.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_headline: Best Hair Dryer I've Ever Used
review_body: I'm not a professional but have naturally wavy hair which is prone to frizz and fly-away action.  This hair dryer is amazing.  It is heat controlled and not air controlled.  Instead of blowing my hair to dry it out, it gently blows heat at target area and dries hair faster, without wildness and frizz. My hair feels soft, is shiny and dries evenly.  It was worth the money and the time to wait for it to arrive.  But with Prime you'll get it pretty quick!

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_headline: Super duper dryer but has varied heat settings for those worried about it being too hot
review_body: Used on my 5 yr old with African American natural hair. Does a super job especially when used in combination with a smoothing serum. When I use this dryer I'm cool with delaying flat ironing. Just ponytail her up.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: This is all I had hoped it would be. It has great power and it is the nice compact small size I desired.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Pleased with new blow dryer.  Dries hair, just as advertised.  Love the retractable cord.  Keeps my gym bag a little less messy.  Love the red.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: Edited after 60 days of this junk
review_body:
Hot setting should be changed to almost warm. Warm setting should be renamed cool. Same for blower settings. By the time this generates heat and air your hair will already be dry.

Edit: After 60 days it has started making a grinding noise for about 15-20 seconds when first turned on. What next sparks?

Into the trash.

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: Product gets way too hot.  The attachment that comes with it does not fit snuggly.  Have used it 3 times since buying it and I am not pleased.  Seriously considering returning it.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: good product but not great, air flow not so great and brush attachment too soft but worth the price nnn

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: Superfast Hair Dryer - Save Time and Money
review_body:
The matte finish was the first thing we noticed when we opened the hair dryer. It is great - looks good and has a great - soft texture. The temperature settings are low, med and high and it has a cool button for when you need a blast of cold air. The fan can be set to low and high. The fan moves lots of air.

Even an 80's era, big hair band could save time with this product. That kind of hair needs to be washed, rinsed, washed again and then heavily conditioned. The conditioner softens the hair and forces it to accept massive amounts of water. This increased water volume must be removed prior to styling or the hair will just sit there flat - like a poorly tuned guitar. Pull the Conair 225NP from the holster, point it at the hair and get started. The powerful DC fan moves lots of air to force its way into that mop head of hair and push the water out. The three heat settings provide complete control over the speed of the drying process. The entire band can share one 225NP and still be on the stage in time to rock the house!

Medium heat and high speed fan gets hair dry fast with no friz.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: I have had numerous wall dryers and this is by far the best.
review_body: This dryer is every thing that it says it is! Quiet, professional looking comfortable to use and attractive on the wall. It is certainly a quality item and I would recommend it to anyone

product_title: babyliss nano titanium portofino 6600 hair dryer, leopard
review_body: This is my second Portofino 6600.  My daughter and I have thick, long, curly hair.  This dryer cuts down the drying time by more than half.  The first is still going strong after two years of daily heavy use.  Also very pleased  with the diffusser and concentrating attachments.  This dryer has by FAR outperformed other well known brands costing two or more times the price.  I would do commercials for this dryer!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I have one of these already and love it. Will make a great gift. It is powerful & the reel cord makes this blow dryer even better!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: After one month of use when I turned it on it made a terrible noise and plastic parts starting flying across the room. Vety dangerous. Piece of junk. Price should have been my first clue.

review_body: I was trying to find a hair dryer that had 3 speed and 3 heat settings and was reasonable priced.  This fit 3 requirements.  It doesn't get quit as hot as I expected, but I am still pleased with it.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: i like the color and it's worked great...love all the heat and power settings...so far so good with this blowdryer

review_body: The Onei-II Ionique Hair Dryer does a really good job drying my hair.  The hair dryer is lightweight and powerful.  My only question that was not in with instructions, when would I use the "Negative Ion" setting or the "Regular Ion" setting.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: Extremely long cord which can be a pain but dryer is very good. Light weight. Reasonable price. I would recommend.

review_body: Got this for my wife. She really likes it, it is powerful, not too heavy, had great attachments for directing the air just where and how hot she wants it. Her only complaint is the control is done with a slide on the handle. She has a problem with hand strength and she has to struggle a bit to move the slide. Average person would probably not have an issue with this.

product_title: hot tools professional 1600 watt super quiet turbo lightweight hair dryer
review_body:
My wife swears by this hair dryer and she is on her third unit. That may sound bad, but each one has lasted 5 years, so definitely seems okay for the price.
Lightweight, nice rubber grip, and not too loud.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
Mom was desperate for a new dryer even though she doesnt use the old one she has now.
But besides that this was a perfect upgrade.

product_title: conair 207p infinity tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
My current hair dyer was very old and did a horrible job of actually drying my hair. After much research I picked this one. It was a little heavier then I thought it would be but otherwise I love it. I have just longer then shoulder length hair that is fine but looks really thick. It is also very prone to the frizz.

I do also use Bumble and Bumble Prep and Straight Blow dry which I am sure also helps.

This dryer is fast and I like the cool shot button a lot.

It is a little hard to slide the controls in place so I sometimes use a towel.

Overall, I'm pretty happy with it.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I got this dryer a couple years ago and use it quite frequently and it is still working great. I love the way the cord retracts and how the unit folds. It is great for travel but I use it as my main dryer at my boyfriend's house since it works so well. My hair is long and thick and this thing still gets the job done just as well as my full-sized hair dryer that I keep at home.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_headline: Finally, A blow dryer that I can work with - Just Excellent
review_body:
I am natural with thick thick African American hair. My hair goal is to get to waist length and don't like flat ironing my hair. The last time I went to a salon, I came out smelling my hair like it was burned. So I started looking for a blowdryer that will make my hair straight but not flat ironed.

I did research and decided to try this. God... I loveeeeeeeeeeeeee it. I just finished blowdrying my hair and it looks just the way I wanted it. Not too straight with some volume to it. Ughhh.. Why didn't I buy this a log time ago?

NOTE TO SELF: AFTER DOING RESEARCH, READ REVIEWS, QUICKLY BUY PRODUCT..

Try this if you want to... you won't be disappointed...

XoXo

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Have only used in this country so far but it is small but does good job drying hair.  It has optional conversion to foreign electrical systems.  Just your standard dryer for a pretty fair price and without running around in crowds hunting for model on sale.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I always take my full size blow dryer even to nice hotels where I know they will have a blow dryer.  I decided to try this dryer and it really works.  It is so lightweight and I can't believe it can even dry my hair.  I only take it with me now.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_headline: Conair SB1X Soft Bonnet Hair Dryer
review_body: I thought it would be smaller and more compact.  Much too big for travel.  I was better of with a simple blow dryer.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_headline: It does dry hair, but don't count on a retractable cord
review_body: I've had this dryer about a year, and it does dry hair, and the heat settings seem to be what they say they are: hot, warm and cool. Also High and Low power are accurate. Unlike some other reviewers, I find that its drying power is fine -- but I have fine hair that dries really fast anyway. However, the retractable cord function has never worked well. The button does not seem to depress all the way, and IF it retracts all the way at all (not a guarantee most days), it's because I've had to keep pushing and pulling to engage the retracting mechanism, which is half-hearted at best. Most times I just give up halfway and wind the cord around the unit because it's too big a bother. I have NEVER experienced it retracting so fast that the cord whips around or anything; not anywhere near close to that problem for me!

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: Love this hairdryer.  Not only does it dry my hair quickly, but the three heat settings mean that I don't have to rely on the hottest setting.  And, if you have fine hair,  it does not create static like some other hair dryers can do in cold weather.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: Love this hair dryer.  Cool, medium, high settings great...but the key is that it is LIGHT weight.  An ionic dryer without being my work-out also!  Shiny hair in quick time.  Why did I wait so long to buy a product that works?

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I thought I purchased a child's toy hair dryer. This is very small and doesn't feel very well made, but I have been using it for 6 months and I actually really like it! It works well for me - note that I have very fine hair, so if you have thick hair, it may not work as well. But I really can't complain and I would probably buy it again!

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body: I've been using this dryer as my main hair dryer for the past four months and I love it. It is light weight and worked in both the US and the Middle East. I also like that the dryer came with the two attachments. The handle also folds in to save space on packing.  One thing I would point out to people looking at the reviews is that you will need a screw driver to change the voltage of the hair dryer. Just something to keep in mind depending on your use of the hair dryer. But I would definitely recommend this hair dryer to anyone needing a dual voltage or travel hair dryer.

product_title: elevate by andis 80405 professional lightweight tourmaline ceramic ionic 1875 watts hair dryer
review_body: Some ppl have complained it's loud. It's a hair dryer... they tend to not be quiet :) Maybe it's a little louder than my old one, but it doesn't bother me. This seems to dry my hair faster than my old one too. I like that. Plus my hair didn't seem as frizzy as usual.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I love the folding handle & retractable cord. Compact & light. Still strong enough for blow drying a long hair.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I love love love this hair dryer. Its fast and powerful. Gets the job done within 10 minutes for me.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: Good, light weight dryer. Would be perfect if the attachment would stay in place. Dryer needs a place where you can secure the attachments in place

product_title: conair 1875 watt ergonomic handle hair dryer
review_body:
Just great. . And compacted. A lot of power
Doesn't over heat... great for the price and for first time users

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body:
Bought this unit for traveling to Europe, very compact for travel and with the dual voltage it's a plus.
But you'll still need an adapter for the European receptacles, from the flat blade to the round one.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body:
This a great dryer, dries hair fast, no frizz main reason I bought., yes I would recommend this to anyone.
Haven't found anything I dislike.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: Not even one month, it was borken already, and I don't really use it that often. At first I liked it, because It's light weight and fast dry you hair. But it didn't last long.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: The best hair dryer, ever! Always leaves my hair straight with lots of body. I've had my first one for at least 7 years. I was trying to share it with my sister & her daughter. Now, I'm having my own daughter soon, so I gave my sister the first one & I bought another one.

product_title: remington d3015 ionic ceramic dryer, ionic hair dryer, hair dryer
review_body: The product works fine, it just has a broken ring on the end of the drier so if you wanted to use the defuser, you can't.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_headline: Air Velocity probably not that high
review_body:
About ten years ago, hairdryers had AIR velocity that was more powerful, but now its about 20% less.
Is that because of the noise issue?? They shouldn't do that; bring back the high air power!
(I just bought the Andis 1600 regular size hair dryer).

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: THIS PRODUCT IS SO WONDERFUL THAT I HAVE BOUGHT IN MULTIPLES FOR SEVERAL YEARS.  I KEEP ONE IN EACH BATHROOM AND A SPARE IN THE LINEN CLOSET FOR REPLACEMENT USE!  VERY CONVENIENT.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: .....but this was the first Conair blow drier that i purchased with 'Confort Touch'. i was extremely happy with my purchase for 5 months...then i began to notice the comfort touch (rubber) coating was starting to feel a bit tacky. not just when warm...in use. after time it a lot worse. everything began sticking to it...dust bunnies....hair etc. and it also left a stickiness to my hands...that would take two hand washings to remove. after dealing with it for far to long..i threw it in the trash..happy to be rid of it !! buttttt...it didn't stay gone for very long. the following morning as i passed my son's bedroom i saw that horrible...sticky thing on my son's bed. when i asked him why he had taken it out of the trash and what he planned on doing with it? he said...it worked PERFECTLY in picking up years of 'stuff' that had fallen behind his work-station (made on solid wood. it's very big & extremely hard to move). he said he held on to the end of the cord and let the dry drop down to the floor. after dragging it from one end to the other a few times he retrieved a "whole bunch of s%*#". ha! ha! that's my son! brilliant idea!! btw...it works wonders picking up socks...undergarments and sm. rags that fallen behind and on the sides of the dryer too. wellllllllll!?! i paid for it! hehehe! anyway....i'm still in love with conair blow driers though i have gone back to those made with hard plastic casings. we still have and use this blow drier. it's now used as a 'tool' to pick up things in tight spots. and.. it's now called... 'that sticky dryer whatchamacallit thingy'. :) mahalo (thank you) for reading my post. wishing you and those you love a very Merry Christmas and a Happy Always!!  Aloha & God Bless you.

product_title: andis 33295 hangup pro turbo 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: Whenever I buy a house i always install one of these in the master bathroom.  This is my 3rd one.  Very convenient, very strong, very hot,

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: Works fine and the nightlight is nice.
review_body: We used this in a commercial setting and so far it is working great.  I like that is has the nightlight built in.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_body: Love this item.  Easy to install.  Very easy to use.  Its always handy and easy to get too. Heat and air is perfect as far I am concerned.  Would highly recommend.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: Lightweight, inexpensive, and good for home use. Got it quick, was just as described but a little on the noisy side.

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body: I used this hair dryer while traveling this summer. It was used in the US, Canada and Italy. I was very happy with it. It folds up so it is compact and easy to pack but it is still very powerful for such a little hair dryer. I also appreciate the two attachments that come with it. And, the fact that you can switch it between 120V and 220V makes it incredibly convenient.

product_title: extracompact twinturbo 3500 2000 watt compact professional hair dryer
review_body: This was a great purchase for me!  Dryer has great power and drying ability, very efficient!  I would highly recommend!  The item was exactly as described!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I was finally ready to replace my 8-year old travel hairdryer  with something more powerful and quite, and yet just as light-weight. I have fine shoulder length hair with a tendency towards frizz.. I stumbled across the positive reviews for the Onei MKII while researching several other hairdryers (T3 featherweight, Elchim 2001 and BaBlyiss 2800). I chose the Onei based upon the great reviews, the 4-year warranty, and the price. I think this hairdryer is great. It is very quite, dries my hair in half the time, and feels like it will last. My hair feels great - not scorched like with my old dryer. If you are looking for a top-performing dryer, I would highly recommend trying this dryer first! The cool setting actually gets very cold, which is also  a great bonus for locking in curl and reducing frizz.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: Great dryer.  Nice heating controls, average weight.  I have had it for a few months and have been very happy with it.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: This is a great little hair dryer.  I like that it has three heat settings which are useful when wanting my hair to be straighter or have more curl.  I was hesitant about the retractable cord, but it works great and I have not had any issues with this dryer at all, Good purchase.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This is by far the best hair dryer I have purchased.. I have thick long hair (past my waist) and it dries my hair quickly. Lots of airflow.. for the amount of power I feel it has its a plus that its much smaller then the dryers I've had.. I wouldn't say it was quiet but its not very loud.. it kinda hums instead of the high pitch whistling others have..And im in love with beautiful color and texture.. I bought another as a Xmas gift for my mother-in-law I know she will love it... The 4 yr warranty is a very nice bonus!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: Love this dryer, compared it with the SEdu 4000 and ended up returning the Sedu because it was much heavier and louder.  THis dryer is quiet, light, and I don't have to straighten my hair after. My hair is thick, wavy and frizzy. It also cut down my drying time about 5 minutes.  So glad I found it on Amazon after a very extensive search. And it was half the price of the Sedu!

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: This item came fast and as of this writing, she hasn't opened the gift.  Looking forward to seeing her eyes on this item.  Thanks again.

product_title: andis 80345 styler hair dryer
review_body: My only objection is how large it is.  Why can't they make a travel sized dryer with a brush attachment?

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: I bought two of these in March of 2011.  Within 12 months the first one died.  This morning, after 32 months of use, the second one caught fire in my wife's hand.  These are not a quality product and are even dangerous.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: I love the adjustable heat, I love the attachments and works and lasts for years! it was everything i could want in a hairdryer

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_headline: BEST hairdryer I have ever owned!
review_body: This hair dryer is EVERYTHING!! I absolutely love it!! I am African American and have very kinky hair. This dryer gets my hair straight and then I only have to run through my hair with the flat iron one time. I also use it for my daughter. She has loose curly hair and it gets her hair silky straight. LOVE LOVE LOVE this dryer!

product_title: pibbs ttec8012 twin turbo 3800 professional ionic and ceramic hair dryer, black, 2100 watt
review_body: I'm a professional stylist. This dryer is powerful, it works great for any type of hair. The 2 nozzles give me options to how to distribute the air flow according to the density of the hair, I really like it! Great for professionals and personal use too. You can't go wrong with Twin Turbo, they are great dryers. Thank you.

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_headline: An overall great buy at an affordable cost
review_body: Have owned a few hair dryers and this one has definitely been my favorite.  Provides adequate fan power and heat while the overall design seems solid.  The cool setting provides a nice little gush of cooler air and the folding ability has been pretty handy (albeit mainly handy for going on trips).  The attachments it comes with also work pretty nicely and fit pretty snug.  Have had this for more than a year now with no problems as everything is still operating perfectly.  Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a solid and well priced hair dryer.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I am happy with the fact that my hair does feel healthier but dry time which was supposed to be cut in half was not so. For the cost of the dryer I would have like directions to running the dryer. I have no idea what the difference is between Negative ions or neutral ions. This would be helpful since its all about the ions! Overall I feel like it is a good dryer just wish it had done all it was supposed to do for the price!

product_title: hot tools ionic anti-static professional dryer - model # 1035 - black/purple hair dryer for unisex
review_body: Dries my long hair really quickly. Very lightweight. I like that it has several settings so I have choices on strength and heat level.

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body: This dryer is professional quality and, it does work very well if you have the muscles to operate.  It is too heavy to travel with.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: This hairdryer Is similar to a blue Vidal Sassoon hairdryer (that I wrote a review about a few years ago) that seem to Not be available any more which Is easy to repair. This hairdryer Is 3 speed so the wiring Is more complicated than In the Vidal Sassoon. I have taken this hairdryer apart to clean and lubricate It, I take the back part off which has a metal screen Inside run In under the faucet with hot Water then I spray WD-40 In the motor doing that It will probably last forever. It has of get to burn out the fuse which I have bypassed a few times on the Vidal Sassoon but apparently there seems to be a piece  of plastic under to button to the switch which I lost taking It apart I put It back together and It worked right but had to use a small screw driver to turn In on and off with so I tried to modify It so that I did Not have to use a small screw driver now only high setting works. I have taken other hairdryers apart and could Not hardly put them back together this hairdryer goes back together fairly easy but It being 3 speed If You break some wires I do Not even want to think about It. I use hairdryers for many things as thawing out Water lines, defrosting the Freezer, defrosting the windshield on My Truck, pre heating the cab, dry out socks and shoes, putting under blanks when Its very cold this hairdryer has a round back which helps keep stuff from blocking off the Air flow and I have had hairdryers to burn out because of having a flat back and fall In to a chair with a blanket and burn out, and this hairdryer has a good automatic heat switch which prevents It from over heating but do Not ever leave a hairdryer under the blanket while You are sleeping or Not there.

product_title: hot tools salon hair dryer (model: 1059)
review_body: I absolutely love this dryer! It gets really hot on the highest setting which I prefer using because it will dry my hair faster. I like that it is adjustable and you can get a chair and slide it right over. Overall, it did the job of drying my hair and I'm satisfied.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: Yes. I like it. I just wish it was even hotter but it IS hot enough. I like the nightlight too. Mounting can be easy depending....

product_title: andis hangup 1600w hair dryer with cord hanger
review_body: Bought one for our winter home also because its a great space saver and its extremely convenient to have it right at your fingertips.  Very powerful for a little dryer.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: I'm honestly not one to write reviews but do rely heavily on them and this item was rated very high by Amazon customers who purchased it.  I have to admit, I really, really liked it until it just simply stopped working.  It is lightweight and powerful and fairly quiet for a blow dryer.  I was real happy with it until it just recently stopped working...conveniently right outside the 1 year limited warranty.  I didn't misuse or drop it and I kept the filter clean so not sure what happened but I know my last blow dryer lasted for years.  It was working when I gave it away when I got this one.  So, not so thrilled but maybe it was a fluke.  Who knows.

product_title: t3 bespoke labs 83808-se featherweight professional ionic ceramic tourmaline hair dryer
review_body:
Love this hair dryer! 2nd I've owned. First one I got on QVC- Amazon was cheaper to go for this one! T3 is worth it for hair dryer- I know they r much more expensive- but worth the price. Drying time is less- cuts down on frizz.
I'll never go back to store brand!!

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: I have been using this model for the last 10 years, it only been replaced for once.  It is beautiful, space save, powerful and very durable plus it has a night light.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Can't get a much better hair dryer for this price. Have had no problems with it. My wife loves it and uses it all the time!

product_title: hot tools ionic anti-static professional dryer - model # 1035 - black/purple hair dryer for unisex
review_headline: Great dryer if you don't get a defective one
review_body: I liked this hair dryer while it worked. It was light and didn't tire my arm or wrist, it got hot enough to dry my hair, and it wasn't extremely loud like a lot of dryers are. However, after a month and a half of using it once every day for about 15 mins, it stopped blowing hot air. It still blew air and everything perfectly, it just stopped heating the air. So, I had to get rid of it because cold air does not work well to dry my long hair. I think it might have just been a lemon, because I know sometimes there's just going to be defective items in a group. Amazon customer service was quick to help me though, and I was able to get a refund.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: GREAT GIFT IDEA BUT I BOUGHT IT FOR MYSELF
review_body: I LOVE MY HANGING HAIR DRYER, I NEVER HAVE TO DRAG IT OUT OF A DRAWER AND PUT IT BACK IT IS ALWAYS THERE IT HAS A NIGHT  LIGHT BUT I USUALLY UNPLUG IT UNLESS I HAVE COMPANY THE LIGHT COMES IN VERY HANDY THEN IT HAS PLENTY OF AIR FOR BLOWING MY LONG HAIR AND I ALSO LIKE THE WAY I CAN HANG THE CORD UP

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: The hand controls seem very flimsy and there are only two heat setting and when I set it at hot, it give me warm air at most.  I'd return it but I aready threw the box away.

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body: To be fair, I cannot actually review the dryer itself. I received the dryer with the diffuser attachment missing, which renders it pretty much useless for me. I also received a black & purple dryer, which is not a big deal, but receiving an item that does not include attachments included in the description & a different color when it was not stated that colors may vary, makes me wonder whats happening in quality control. Frustrating.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Bought one of these about six months ago from a big-box store.  Worked fine for 6 months, although thought it was pretty noisy and 'high' setting puts out a lot of heat.  Then, it started to apparently overheat when in use, resulting in the blower slowing down and no hot air coming out.  Looks like a thermo sensing switch failed.  You get what you pay for!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: Quiet and drys hair fast!! Love the retractable cord.
review_body: No more tangled cord! Love this dryer. It is also pretty quiet for it's high wattage. I recommend this dryer.

product_title: babyliss pro babfv2 volare ferrari designed professional luxury mid sized hair dryer, 2000 watts, black
review_body: Love this hair dryer.  It takes less time for me to dry my hair. I would highly recommend this product to any one looking for an above average hair dryer

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: After 15 minutes of constant operation the connection betwee. The two parts started melting. Other than that everything else is pretty satisfying.

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body: I like the folding handle but don't feel like the dryer gets hot enough to dry my hair very fast.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: Works like a charm! I love it! It does a great job for the money that I spent on it!

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I used this product at a Marriott Hotel and loved it. It has multiple settings, a directed air flow and seems to add volume to my hair. The retractable cord and folding handle are great for storage and travel. I would highly recommend this product to everyone.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I received this blow dryer today and it is NOT an Infiniti blow dryer. It is just a regular Conair blow dryer.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I like the fact this dryer is light which is great however it is very loud and I have to use earplugs because of the noise level.  It does a great job drying and styling hair.  I have used this dryer in hotels before but never have I experienced a dryer that is this loud.

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: The one thing I do want to give them credit for is fast shipping. Now! on another note, the first bonnet I received came without the cord. I contacted the company and they immediately got back to me stating that they would send me another bonnet. Now the second bonnet really made me upset because it was damaged. The main thing that made me upset is how eager I was to get the purchase and both attempts failed. They replied stating they would send me out another one but I realized that if they couldn't get it together the first two times, I was afraid to see what the third would be. They need to reevaluate their packaging procedure for a more accurate outcome on products. I'm very disappointed and would never purchase from this company ever again. Never had an issue like this throughout my years of purchasing items through amazon!

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body:
Base does not fit flat to the wall because of protruding round head screws on back of base. Remove screws before installation. One of these screws had broken it's plastic receiver anyway and was holding nothing. Mounting hardware (1 screw) missing and too small
to hold securely anyway. No mounting instructions. No drywall mollies. I actually like the dryer itself. Nice thick cord, decent power on high. Low setting on the dryer is totally useless . If your handy like me you can make the installation work for a perfect fit.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: Great deal for the price.  Only drawback is lack of height adjustment.  This requires only that either the platform it's resting on and/or the seating of the user be adjusted instead.  Excellent Winter head warmer and brain circulation stimulator worth upwards of 15 IQ points.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: It was really loud, unnecessarily powerful for drying hair, my daughter was petrified of it and then it suddenly glowed red and started smoking!

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_headline: if not better, than a dryer that blows you through a ...
review_body:
I've been using a John Freida 1875 watt dryer, which is heavy and tiring to use, because of my physical limitations. I ran across this hair dryer, which I stored after buying the Freida. The only reason I replaced it is because I was looking for a dryer with a cold shot.

I used the dryer last night and it dries faster than the Freida 1825 watt dryer! Since it's only 1200 watts, the dryer doesn't blow as hard. It goes to reason that, since the air is not moving as fast, it will heat as well, if not better, than a dryer that blows you through a wall. Since I have a lot of very fine, straight hair, which is shoulder blade length, it doesn't take much blowing air to tangle my hair. Because of the decreased speed of the dryer, I had no problems with tangles, yet the time it took to blow my hair dry decreased by 1/3.

My hair looked shiner last night than after using the Freida, which I attribute to the decreased wattage of the dryer. Also, the dryer is quieter than the Freida dryer.

product_title: sunbeam hd3004-005 tourmaline 1875 watt folding hair dryer with retractable cord
review_headline: Good quality, compact, wish it had separate speed & temperature controls
review_body: The dryer is nicely  compact when it's folded. I like the retractable cord, which makes it even easier to store or travel with. My only complaint is that there's only one switch for "Low, Medium, High". I would prefer if it had separate temperature and speed controls. I went with this rather than another compact dryer with those controls because of the good reviews. I can say that this is really well built.

product_title: hello kitty 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Love this hairdryer it is one of the best hairdryers I have ever used in my life!  I ordered this for a friend who had one already but I should have kept it for myself as a back up incase my ever died but I had it for about 3 years now and nothing went wrong yet!

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I love this blowdryer. It is light-weight and portable. I love how it folds up for when I travel. It is also super powerful and I can dry my long hair in just 5 - 10 min.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Rating for Andis RC-2 tonic 1875W ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Everything I want in a hair dryer.  Used the same model in a hotel I stayed out and had to have one for myself and one for my daughter.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Great traveling Hair Dryer.  I used this when I went to Florida last month and it was so nice how it folds and the retractable cord was great instead of wining it around the Handle.

product_title: conair 1875 watt ergonomic handle hair dryer
review_body: This dryer is a bit larger than I expected but is very lightweight. I have a couple minor issues : there is no 'loop' attached to hang up the dryer and the cord is about a foot too short for my taste. It DOES dry my hair however, so all in all, it does the job.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: My wife bought this, but I'll leave my two cents. This is a very quiet hair dryer. I figured that was something interesting that you should know. The air blows smooth and has a cool air button. The weight is about average and comes with two end pieces that I have no idea what they are for. Its a very nice hair dryer. The quiet factor with our sleeping baby is something I didn't expect.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: It was just what I wanted and worked great for a few months, then one of the fan blades broke off for no apparent reason just after the warranty expired. No way to fix it, so it went into the garbage!

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body: Excellent! Can't believe how smooth my hair is since using this dryer. Dries my hair in half the time. Love it!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Several months later, it is working great.  I'm not sure about "ionic conditioning" but it doesn't cause the split ends my old Conair did so something positive is happening

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_headline: It definitely is Mighty and Mini! I love it!
review_body:
It's little, and it's POWERFUL, what more do you want from something called "Mighty Mini"?

For all the reviewers that complain about the size and how "cheap" if feels, realize that you are buying something made for travel, and that it cost a whopping $20.

This is a great hair dryer and suits my needs perfectly.

If you want a bigger, more expensive one, then go find one elsewhere.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I've only had this for about a week but I'm pretty impressed so far.  I had my old hairdryer for at least 6 years and it finally crapped out on me - it was just a Revlon that I had gotten from Walmart or somewhere.  I considered spending about $30 more on a nicer dryer, but decided I'd try a Conair first since it was cheaper and my mom has one that I love using when I go home.  So I ordered this guy (which came in two days - gotta love Amazon Prime when you don't have a working hair dryer) and was initially kind of bummed when I opened it.  I know you get what you pay for, but this one is much lighter than the dryer my mom has, so I was worried it wouldn't work as well.  Turns out my fears were unfounded - this guy is powerful and quieter than my old dryer, and the tourmaline ceramic technology, which they tout as leaving your hair shinier with less frizz, totally works!  My hair has been amazing every day.  I also really like how light it is now that I know it works.  I don't know how long this guy will last and I can see the matte casing eventually peeling off like the other reviewer mentioned, but it's functionality is fantastic for the price.  Would definitely recommend this.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I like that I can get great results on the medium setting. Found that I only use the hot setting when I am in a rush. But be careful because it's gets really hot.

product_title: sunbeam hd3004-005 tourmaline 1875 watt folding hair dryer with retractable cord
review_body: Used it at a hotel and had to have one. This is the best hair dryer I have ever used. Dries fast cuts drying time in half, and doesn't make my hair frizzy. Highly recommend it!!

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: This was the first product I buy on amazon, the thing is heavy but it works amazing , is big but I won't change it for nothing!! The prize it's awesome comparing with what you can do with this thing, best thing it won't damage ur hair !

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: Don't be fooled by its tiny size...it is so powerful! It dries my hair as fast and my big one! It's cute, convenient and efficient. I love it!

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: I like having a small, but powerful hair dryer that doesn't take up much space in the bathroom or suitcase when needed.  Would have preferred the cord to be white so it wouldn't be as noticeable in the bathroom, but just a minor disappointment.  Also, the on/off/heat setting control is a little hard to move, which is why I gave it 4 stars rather than 5.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Its just what I needed. Its a simple blow dryer but it works just fine for being so cheap. I like how its effective in the mornings after a long shower.

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_headline: I am obsessed with this blowdryer!!!
review_body:
I have thick, curly hair that I blow out every few days. This blow dryer has cut my drying time in half! The air force is STRONG with this one. Put it down on the bathroom counter and watch your hair ties and whatnot go flying. But it gets the job done, and incredibly well. My hair is *less* dry from this dryer, despite the high heat, and looks very healthy and sleek when blown out.

WORTH IT!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Purchased in December 2011. Worked great up until November 2013. It behaves as if there is a short. I suspect it involves the retractable cord. I'll shy away from another retractable cord product.

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body:
All the product I purchased from Blue Novelties thru Amazon were Christmas gifts for my girls. They were delighted and thrilled at the way the products worked. I'll be saving a lot of beauty salon cost from now on. I love shopping at Amazon.com and I have found a friend in Blue Novelties. Please email me a catalog so I can give it to them. Problem NOW is... they fight over the products.
...I can't win, no matter how much I try! Thanx...Mr. Mac

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: This blowdryer is a great product.  It is lightweight and dries your hair fast.  It is a super product for the price.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: VERY LOUD!  I bought this to give to my wife to replace her old hair dryer.  This one is so noisy it sounds like she is drying her hair with a jet engine!

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: I've had this hair dryer for at least 4 years, and although I did not purchase it from Amazon I am still reviewing the product itself.  My dryer is still going strong like the day I took it out of the box.  A few notes of caution:  1) keep the lint filter on the backside cleaned off or the air flow will be cut down.  Using an old toothbrush can help clean this off, 2) do NOT use the hottest setting.  As others have stated, it WILL fry your hair.  I had this problem several years ago and didn't realize my hair had fried because of the setting on the dryer, until my stylist looked at my dryer.  I use it on the medium setting and it works great.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_headline: Great for my home bound mom !
review_body: Seems to be working great. My 86 year old mom can't get to the salon much any more so this works for her hair needs.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: Great hairdryer. Works perfectly fine. It dries my hair in less than 5 minutes! My hais short but a bit thick.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: Small, powerful,easy to take on trips,..,occupies very little space, light weight, works in Europe with no hassle,easy to pack,attractive design

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: Very strong wind produced by this hairdryer.  Dries my hair very fast, the cool setting defrizzes my hair after the wind tunnel dry:)  I have long thick hair and I can dry it in about 6-7 mins.  Great product ordered as a replacement after my old one (same hairdryer) died.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This is a great hair dryer!! It's cooler than most, which is what gives hair its shine and control. Works very well.

product_title: proversa micro turbo dual voltage portable hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: Works great. Compact, portable, powerful. So far so good. Would purchase again. Purchased to replace an older model of same brand.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: Installed in guest room bath; and it's a nice extra that is convenient and out of the way.  Especially liked that the cord is not dangling!

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_headline: NOT legit but still happy with the purchase.
review_body: ANY T3 product purchased on Amazon is NOT recognized by the company (i.e. manufacturer warranty NOT honored). I tried to register my product and found that my serial number was already registered... I contacted the company and was told that neither Amazon nor the reseller are authorized resellers for T3. This could mean a number of things... Nevertheless, I love this dryer, which seems to work extremely well. I decided to take my chances with this "version" of the T3 Micro Featherweight Luxe, which is about half the price of one from the manufacturer or an authorized reseller.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: This is a small powerful hair dryer. It fulfills our needs very well and it has a cute color. Our 5 year old daughter can use it being so lite.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_headline: No more dragging out the hair dryer.
review_body: I use this every day and they are the best hair dryer wall mount you are ever going to buy. Quality dryer that blows hot and hard enough to dry you hair very quickly and hang it back up and you are off and running. Anyone can mount it to the wall near an outlet and a mirror. I am on my 3 one over many many years and will not buy any other dryer when you can have this one to keep your life fast and simple and still looks good mounted on you wall.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: I love this blow dryer,because it get the job done,for less the price. I do a lot of natural hair and it smooth out that cuticle allowing me to Flatiron the hair smooth and straight.this it's the second one I bought.  One For Home And One For word. Love it.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Works even on thick curly hair
review_body: Great high quality hair dryer that works extremely well. Comes with a diffuser and all so it is great for even long, thick curly hair. Dries it quickly and overall it even looks like a very nice product as the handle material is very smooth with a good grip. Great value for purchase, would highly recommend.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: This thing died within a month of purchase. Bought it for the girlfriend to use when she visited. So it wasn't even everyday use for that month.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I have a small bathroom, so putting the hair dryer on the wall is a great solution. It is at my fingertips!

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Works well. Perfect for travel. Compact, light weight, as good as any full size dryer. Pretty sturdy also. I'd recommend it.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body:
Heats up really quickly. Not sure if the ionic thing actually works or not, but it dries my hair fast.

And as a guy, the black and gold design is nice. Not as embarassing as having a bright pink hair dryer.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_headline: Finally a Small Blower With a Diffuser That Works
review_body: Awesome product!  Just what I wanted.  I have medium length, thick, curly hair that takes forever to dry, and was looking for a small blow dryer with a diffuser.  I wanted the blow dryer to double for daily use and travel, so my items can be useful in all ways and save space since I live in a small home.  When I first received the product and removed it from the box, I was skeptical about its ability to dry hair.  It looks like a toy.  However, it has two speeds which are comparable to other blow dryers.  It works great.  I use it every day.  I love the bag which is stylish and easily holds all the accessories plus the dryer without problems.  Finally someone who makes a storage bag where the product actually fits once the consumer uses it. (Unlike tents that you can never stuff back into the bag once you unpack them.) I loved this product so much I bought one for a gift.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: I love that this dryer is compact and really BLOWs the air at your hair.  I found this in a hotel and liked it so I looked it up and bought it from amazon.  Love the price, too!  I have a $150 dryer, which I really like, but it just doesn't blow the hair as strongly as I would like sometimes.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: I expected more, it is a little heavy, but it does the job.
review_body: John Frieda products are always good. I use the shampoo, what is good. Not more to say, just another hairdryer.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: The best blow dryer ever. 23 Afro American female I use with a long hard comb attachment and this makes blow drying so much easier because I have long thick hair and I hate doing it myself but this definitely helps out when I'm tryna save money but skipping the salon

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Bought for a trip to Europe; worked great with an adapter; no troubles. Small and easy to fit into luggage!

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: Good Hair Dryer, No Need for Light
review_body: Great hair dryer....lose the night light. It's quiet and easy to install.  If you keep the light make it any color, except for green.  I thought ET was sleeping in the bathroom.

product_title: t3 featherweight journey travel hair dryer
review_body:
I had the previous model and loved it. This model is larger and heavier, I also runs hotter that the previous one.
I did not return it thinking that I would adapt to the changes which I have. I would hesitate to buy another when
this one stops working.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: When it works its okay, but the hood has a habit of collapsing when it gets too hot. The part that holds up the hood does not keep the hood up.
