review_body: Open box Part missing, Not new as advertised You get what you pay for Wason the verge of returning product Hope I don't regret it

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: Bought for using on small rolled curlers.  The bonnet isn't the easiest to get on and off for that, but it only takes about 25 minutes to dry most of the hair that is 3" long.  Sometimes the hose unhooks from the bonnet.  Need to stay still.  Better than wearing curlers for a few hours.

product_title: remington silk ceramic professional hair dryer
review_body:
Typical hair dryers are loud, not so with this Remington Silk Ceramic Dryer, and my sensitive eared golden retriever is the proof. He literally came running to get his head dried after his bath. So it's a pleasure for humans as well, with no piercing whine.

This is my first ceramic styling tool, and I've found that my hair is silky without frizz and quickly dried every time, so ceramic really does make a difference. This is a sturdy, sleek dryer, with great heat, power, and cool blast button for setting your style.

The only reason I didn't rank this dryer a 5 star, is because of the placement/design of the setting buttons. They are right where your fingers wrap around and hold on, and unfortunately my natural grip keeps changing the settings while drying. However, for the drying performance, it's worth the occasional inconvenience.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: This is a good hair dryer for the money - quick drying time but it's a bit heavy and kind of loud.  I bought it for travel but because of the weight, I wouldn't recommend it for that.  Home use is fine and it's compact because of the retractable cord and folding handle.  I have another Andis dryer and believe Andis makes a good product.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body:
Medium weight, not too heavy like other professional dryers
Easy controls
Dries hair fast!
No tangle or twist power cord

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_body: We now have two of this identical model. The first one worked out well so we bought another for a second bathroom. I can't speak to whether it makes my hair any shinier, but it does a good job of drying my hair and that's all I ask for. It does have different settings -- high, low, warm, cool; my husband uses the lowest settings to blow-dry the dog. I have noticed that the exterior doesn't get as hot as my old dryer so I don't have to be careful where I set it when I'm done. I have no idea what to do with the finger/curly thingy attachment -- maybe I need curly hair to appreciate its use.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This is light weight and has a lot of bells and whistles.  However, for smoothing hair, I thing the Babylis Pro BABTT5585 Tourmaline Titanium 3000 Dryer reg and travel, are much better.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: This model is a little bigger than our older wall mount blow dryer.  I like the smaller size better, but needed to go with something that might last longer.  The on/off switch for this model is on the hanger (the wall mount) and not on the dryer itself.  I prefer the switch to be on the handle of the dryer.  Those details aside, the force and heat of the dryer is excellent for its size.  It dries my hair quickly.  I'm happy with this dryer.  Will have to wait to see what its longevity is.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_body: Perfect size for home use!  We have one in our RV and bought one for our home. This is a Quality product!

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline hair dryer, silky black
review_body: The hair dryer worked very well, until the cool shot button got stuck and now there is only cold air emitted. Next, the hair dryer kept tripping the circuit  and blowing the circuit. It's a shame since the dryer was quick. Don't buy this unless you want to replace your hair dryer in a couple of months.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Loved it and then Kaput after 6 months
review_body:
Exceeded my expectations while it worked. I read the reviews about the hair dryer suddenly dying, but gambled that it wouldn't happen to me. Wrong. Turned it on this morning and nothing happened. Completely dead. I will contact Remington but don't expect the problem will be remedied.

Oh well, the search continues.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: This hair dryer is exactly what I was looking for.  It looks great in our bathroom and I like the way the cord stays on the hook.  No more getting the cord caught in the drawer!  The night light is a soft green and just the right amount of light in the bathroom at night to see where you are going.

product_title: turbo power twin turbo 2600 hair dryer
review_body: My wife loves it. She has evev reconended to familes and friend. The item has meat all expectations. Thank you

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I returned it, no questions asked. Not only was it too heavy for me, it also blew too hot for me on low.

product_title: remington silk ceramic professional hair dryer
review_body: My faithful old hair dryer blew out its last breath and this one has taken its place. The heft is perfect and well balanced. With 3 heat settings (none of which are as hot as my old one)and 2 speeds, this dryer makes short work of drying my  medium length slightly wavy hair. In order to give it a fair trial, we used the diffuser and dried my granddaughter's waist length curly red hair. Also swiftly done, and the curls remained intact. I hope this dryer has as long a life as my old one because I REALLY like it!

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body:
When it comes to hair dryers, I have to be the weirdest person ever. I absolutely HATE spending money on something that blows hot air. I will buy expensive shampoo and hair products, but I just can't spend the money on a dryer. With that being said, I love this hair dryer! I normally keep my hair wrapped in a towel and then blow dry after I've applied my make up. Today I decided to blow dry before applying my make up, and it took me 3 minutes and 28 seconds to go from soaking wet to dry. Obviously not everyone will have the same results. I have fine hair and it is rather long, it hangs about 2 inches past my bra strap in the back. If you have thicker hair, it will probably require a longer dry time. It really does cut down on my hair drying time. I went from around 15-20 minutes to 3 minutes and 28 seconds.

As far as the construction of the actual dryer. Eh. It feels very cheap. I'm curious to see if it will last more than a few months.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: Light weight and very smoothing, still giving my hair body. Great color, too! Dries quickly and easy to hold and turn.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Everything was great for about 6 month, the it stop working, why they keep selling a product that only last 6 months?, Better to take them from the market entirely and replace it with on that works longer even id it is more expensive.  One thing is certain, I will not buy a Remington drier ever!!

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Nice lite and compact design, perfect for traveling in Europe on rail or rental car when you have to pack lite

product_title: proversa micro turbo dual voltage portable hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: I have long fine hair. I very rarely use a hairdryer, but when camping, traveling etc there is a need. Having dual voltage is a plus. This one is simple, reliable, dries my hair nicely on low, and in short does what it should do. Really like the supplied cone for directed drying.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: It works well and dries my hair in a short amount of time...light weight too.  Also like that I can hang it up.

product_title: hot tools salon hair dryer (model: 1059)
review_body: I have only used this Hair Dryer twice.  The dryer gets just as hot as the ones in the salon

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: These are on the wall on our bathrooms- they look great  were easy to install and use.  They really help to clean up the clutter.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: The hose falls off the cap a lot. It is easy to store and travel with. The hose is hard to get to stay on the cap. It keeps falling off.  Took about 5-7 minutes to get it to the point where it stays on the cap. Hose is short too.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: If it's possible to have a love affair with a hair dryer, this would be the one.  The dryer's best feature is how quiet it is compared to the many that I have owned over the past, well let's just say 4 decades.  The other advantages are the multiple heat/cool settings, length of the power cord and the cool shot button.  All controls are arranged conveniently so you don't mistakenly flip the wrong switch while using.  Dries my color treated fine shoulder length hair with little or no frizz and have actually cut back by at least half, the use of anti-frizz and shine boosting products so think of the $ savings there.  Only thing I would change are the lack of detail in the instruction manual, but thanks to this review section it's not really needed.  You won't be disappointed.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_body: Replacing an old one. Works well just not quite as lightweight or as hot as my old one. Would recommend, though.

product_title: elevate by andis 80405 professional lightweight tourmaline ceramic ionic 1875 watts hair dryer
review_body: I had another Andis product that failed after 11 months but it was no longer available.  Returned it to Andis and they replaced it with this model.  Nice features - extra long 9-10' rubber cord which will hold up better than the usual 6' vinyl cords.  I usually avoid these high velocity dryers because they typically have a loud, high-pitched whine that can damage hearing.  This one does not. Very low pitch, acceptable noise level. Nice product - two speeds, 3 heats plus a cool button.

product_title: elevate by andis 30865 professional tourmaline ionic ceramic 1600 watts hair dryer
review_headline: Broke after 3 months of use 1-2 times a week for less than 5 minutes.
review_body: I am really disappointed that I can't return this now. Every time I wanted to use it I had to press the reset button, which was doable. But today, it wouldn't even turn on. I heard a faint buzz sound and smelled a toxic chemical smell as if something was burning though I saw no smoke. Waste of money.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Excellent value.  Item received as advertised.  Compact.  Efficient
review_body: This is a really nice hair dryer.  Handle folds as advertised and cord retract works.  Fits nicely into a travel bag.  Price performance is excellent and recommend as a good value worth the investment.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I needed to replace my dryer quickly as the dog chewed the plug off of the cord of the old one.  Based on reviews, I ordered the Onei dryer.  It is lightweight, quiet (!) and really can get hot so less drying time.  I am quite pleased with it.  And the seller even sent a follow up email to ensure my satisfaction with the product.  I call that excellent customer satisfaction!!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Great price, great product. And I love the retractable cord!! Comes with the two attachments that work great! Buy this one!

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: This product burned out after about 7 months of once a day, short usage. it is not reliable as this is the second (and last) one I have owned.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Not heavy, button placement is fine
review_body: I chose this hair dryer simply because I saw in a news article that it was highly rated and I LOVE IT. Not sure why reviews are about the button placement and weight. I am like such a baby with heavy items and this is fine. As for the buttons, you get used to it after a couple of uses. Great product and it definitely dries faster and is pretty!

product_title: remington silk ceramic professional hair dryer
review_headline: Good, but I'm not blown away
review_body:
Pardon my pun in the title, but I'm not overly impressed by this blow dryer. The first thing I noticed when I took it out of the box was it's weight. It's quite heavy, and much heavier than my last two blow dryers. I don't know if I'll get tired of holding something heavier, but I am hoping that it's an indication of quality.

I do like the three heat settings, two air speeds and the cool shot of air, which can be used while drying. It is quieter than my last dryer, which was a Conair with the same wattage. The dryer is a little awkward to hold, however, and I had trouble changing heat and speed while holding it midair and drying my hair. It did dry my hair faster but not by much. I used both attachments to see how they work and diffuser worked like it should - giving curl without the frizz. I had trouble getting the concentrator attachment on the end, and then it blew off the dryer both times that I used it. I don't know if mine just doesn't fit well, but that was a little annoying.

It may seem like I'm being knitpicky in this review, but I'm just trying to cover all the bases for a blow dryer. After saying all that, it does what it's supposed to do - dry my hair. If it lasts longer than my last two blow dryers, then I'll be really happy.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I purchased this because I wanted a wall-mounted dryer with sufficient power to dry my shoulder-length hair. I liked the cord storage and night light features, as well as the fact that we could use it on 1200 or 1600W settings based on who in the family is using it. It seemed to have the ingredients for a great little wall-mounted dryer. However, the dryer keeps shutting itself off (motor just stops blowing) when I dry my hair for more than 3-4 minutes. Once it cools down for a minute or two it starts again, but I have to tell you, this is a seriously annoying problem. I would not buy this again, and am pretty disappointed.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body:
So the bad news is that it doesn't get as hot as I would prefer. It barely gets the job done and I'm a guy w/ short thinning hair. I am sure ladies w/ thick, long, wet hair will require more time drying w/ this dryer.

The +'s are that it's simple, compact, has a good working retractable cord & has a deeper air flow sound that is easier on the ears than a high pitched blow dryer.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_body: This is a great dryer. It is the second I've put in our home. This one has just the right power and heat!!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
I have used a conair dryer before and liked it. The last one a had lasted about 13 years, so I thought I would go with the conair
again, and I haven't been disappointed.

product_title: babyliss pro babfrv2 volare ferrari designed professional luxury mid sized hair dryer, red, 2000 watts
review_body: I love this blow dryer!!! I have never really put much thought into the types of blow dryers I have used in the past. I thought severe breakage, damage and dry hair were the negatives that came with the territory. Boy, was I wrong!!! This blow dryer dries my hair REALLY fast and the results are great! My hair is much silkier and not dry at all! I can almost skip the flat iron, and I have really course/curly hair!!! I have used the dryer twice so far and my breakage has been reduced dramatically!!! This dryer is lightweight and I love the 2 concentrator nozzles that come with it! The cord is nice and long as well!!! Although it was expensive, I think I have found a winner!!! My old "CHI" can't touch this!!!

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I got exactly what I needed! The product was absolutely perfect and matched the exact description on the product information. Purchased it online and then saw it in the store for almost double the price as it was here - great buying experience.

product_title: remington silk ceramic professional hair dryer
review_body: This dryer is actually and excellent value for what it is being sold for on Amazon (about $28).  The power and heat control is a good as units I have paid over $50 for.  The shape is good and it feels very comfortable in my hand.  I have fairly short hair so I don't need to use the attachments but they come in handy for those with long strands that need to isolate and concentrate the air.  The switches make the heat easy to adjust, making it good for drying a pet (I try to not use heat to dry my dog).  Overall a good unit.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_body: My 20 yr old dryer died :( and I replaced it with this one. It is wonderful. Works well and the heat settings are easy to change.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I bought this to take with me when I travel as the one I had used before did not have the Ionic thing.  I had not even tried it out for myself when my grandson took it and uses it every day.  He raves about it, so I guess if a picky 18 year old likes it, then there is nothing more to be said!  The cord really does retract quickly, so watch out!

product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_body: This is my second Conair Ionic hairdryer. This was exactly what I wanted and was not disappointed. Love the retractable cord, the folding handle and the 120/220 option for traveling.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer is really quiet compared to what I'm used to, which is great.  It dries my hair quickly but hasn't over dried it (I have really fine hair).  It's also pretty light compared to my last hair dryer.  The only issue I have with it is I sometimes accidentally hit the off button or the temperature setting as I'm using it.  These buttons are located on the side of the handle and if you're not careful you can easily switch your settings or shut off your dryer.  Since this is only a minor inconvenience I gave it four stars because other than what I just mentioned, this hair dryer works great!

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body:
Compact and powerful.
This hairdryer works great on 220 V in Europe- it has both "low" and "high" setting available.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_headline: I needed a small dyer and this is perfect
review_body: My 5 year old is taking on more responsibility with her personal care.  My hairdryer was much too big and heavy for her to manage on her own.  I found this dryer and it is absolutely perfect!  It is lightweight and the right size for her little hands.  She loves the color and the zebra storage pouch it comes with.  One minor complaint is that the high setting is loud and quite shrill; a much higher pitch than my blow dryer.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_headline: Just Like the Hotels - Perfect in our Bathrooms.
review_body: Very powerful and works great.  We have these in all bathrooms. I have bought these as gifts and people just love them.  Mounting is easy and just plug it in.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: OK for the price.. nothing special. I wish I would have chose something else.. take too long to dry my hair

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body: Handy, dual voltage good for foreign travel, compact, nice overall design. This is a great product. I bought one first and it stopped working for some reason. Amazon replaced it right away. Excellent service!

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: It works good but overheats and shuts off for a while.  It works well for what I need. I love the night light.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Bought 2 of these hair dryers. The first one lasted a year then the fan blades started to crack and then the blades would rub on the housing. Thinking it was because I dropped it and cracked the fan blades i bought another. This one lasted 3 months same thing. I will never buy conair again!

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: I love it the product works great. it is not loud and it gets really hot. It was definitely worth the buy. Fast shipping too

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I originally purchased this model to take on a trip to Ireland since my luggage space was limited and the Infiniti was lightweight and compact. It quickly became my go-to hairdryer and I now use it everyday. I have short hair and find the lower setting is sufficient to dry my hair without over drying it. Because it is so lightweight I was initially concerned that it might not hold up to daily use but 2 1/2 years later, the hair dryer is still going strong. Because I travel frequently I ordered a second dryer to keep in my traveling bag.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: For drying hair it does work very well and does not give off ozone, which is good if you have asthma or other respiratory sensitivities. Believe it or not, but another ionizing hair dryer caused my eyes to water and wheezing. I could barely sleep until my girlfriend happened across some information that said the ionizing hair dryers can cause this. When she purchased this hair dryer my asthma problems stopped. Unfortunately, I have to knock several stars off this product because the on/off switch has already failed, which was pretty disappointing.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: Dryer works great and it easy to use and the built in night light in really a nice addition.  I really like this item

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: inexpensive, light weight, does the job
review_body:
Came super quick (thanks amazon!) and was a good price! This just was more convenient to me than going to my local Target and looking through their whole selection, the reviews on Amazon can be so helpful!

Its fairly light weight, not too noisy, and seems to work just fine. My previous model was very simliar, a Revalon. I see no difference between the two. I'm sure the 'soft touch' material will eventually peel off like my previous one did but that doesn't really concern me!

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body:
Really Like This Dryer My Cousin Has The Same One But Hers iS Silver

Now I Don't Have To Go To Her House, Just To Blow Dry My HAir Now LOL ;-)

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: Just arrived, although its cheap, it is good value for money, lots of settings to choose from, dried my hair evenly, great buy.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This blow dryer has been really great. The only reason I did not give it the full 5 stars is because the matte film on the dryer has begun to peel off. As far as the function, the blow dryer is really handy and useful.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This blow dryer is amazing for it's price. I wanted to buy an expensive "better" blow dryer, but my finances would not allow that and I settle on this one. I am, however, grateful I chose to buy this blow dryer. It has 3 heat settings, cool, warm and hot which is nice because i can put it on the heat setting which fits my hair the best. It is not ridiculously loud like some of the previous blow dryers i've own and the cord is sufficiently long. I would recommend buying this blow dryer, even over an expensive "better" one because i feel like it works just as well as some of the other more expensive hair dryers i've owned over the years.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: This hair dryer works great!  My hair is dry in half the time and it's much quieter than my old 2500 watt con air.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: This dryer was recommended by my hairstylists. It really does make drying time fast. You won't be disappointed with this blow dryer.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: Very good!! I bought it for my wife and she loves it!! I'v been buying them for a couple of years, great service!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I didn't know there was a difference between cheap dryers and a professional dryer. I have medium length, not thick but not thin blonde hair. It drys quickly, the condition of my hair feels like my hairdresser dried my hair. I am pleasantly surprised by my findings. Love the dryer!

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_headline: Did not have all the functions of reg hand held !
review_body: Dogs to work as well as my hand held  Conair and doesn't have button to stop heat and just blow air .  Disappointed in the functions .  Steve allen

product_title: conair bb075w pro blackbird 2000-watt hair dryer
review_body: i am not picky on my driers, how ever the bigger i have always think the more strengh it has, so it is heavy, but i like it.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body:
That's right - makes blowdrying pre-flat ironing so quick.
Being a curly head, I usually spend a solid hour straightening my hair.

This product (with a keratin spray) cuts the time into half, and leaves my hair feeling soft all day long.

product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_body: Great hairdryer, lots of power, lightweight, retractable cord, the color is great and its the best dryer I've purchased.  I don't know why I have to add more words to my review.  A few words should be sufficient!!

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_headline: What a pleasant surprise - fine product matched with wonderful customer service
review_body:
I have used this product for several years on trips outside the US - mostly in Europe and Israel. This is a very fine product with three important factors:

-- 1600 Watt. At this lower wattage, I have never had a problem with foreign electrical power in any room I have rented.

_-- Dual Voltage. Since its a travel hair dryer - I would suggest you keep voltage at 220. I kept switching it every time I came back to US and apparently the switch broke. See Customer Service below.

-- Customer Service. After 2 years of use, they said no problem and replaced the hair dryer immediately.

I wish every company was as consumer friendly as Andis and stood behind their products as they do.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: So I purchased this hair dryer in March 2013 and I need a new one already.  While it worked it was good but then things went wrong as I dry my hair I see a spark like when you pull a plug out of the wall.  I don't know if it is because I use a metal brush but it snaps and then sparks not so great.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Very good buy is what I was looking for gifts, it is in very good condition and I have no complaints, thanks.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1200 watt folding hair dryer
review_body:
I bought this for travelling (and don't use it at home) and I love it. It is very light weight and small when folded. This is important to me as I have started travelling using only a 21 rolling bag for shorter trips and the 21 bag plus a carry-on for trips longer than a week. When trying to save space and weight, every bit helps.

I have used it for several trips and absolutely love it. I use it on the low setting plus add a diffuser and it dries my hair as well as the large one I use when at home.

Would definitely buy again.

product_title: panasonic kurukuru curling hair dryer eh-ka60-k black | ac100-120v/200-240v (japan model)
review_headline: Panasonic from Japan, product that trust :)
review_body: My wife was looking for a high quality hair dryer for a long time. Finally, we found what she was looking for. Panasonic from Japan, product that trust :)

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: This was a top beauty buy of 2012 and it is a cheap and great buy for a hair dryer works great buy and deal

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I received this little blow dryer for Christmas. My hair is long, thick and layered, and it has to be mostly dry for this to work. The attachments don't have any purpose than to clutter up the little, useless bag. When I was blow-drying my two sisters hair, it over heated and stopped working. It also gives off a burning smell when used on high.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1200 watt folding hair dryer
review_headline: Small, works well, but not durable
review_body: I bought this hair dryer two years ago, and it worked great for its tiny size. However, after flipping the voltage switch to 220 for trips abroad and then back to 120 for domestic trips several times, the switch got misaligned and it was stuck on 220. I figured I'd just have to keep it at that setting, as it still worked okay. But a week later the entire handle fell apart in my hand.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: We had an Oster wall dryer for 10 years and it finally died.  This new one fit our old Oster wall plate for easy installation.  Power cord can be fitted to correct length so you won't have any excess cord laying around.  Dryer is strong and not extremely noisy

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I bought this in late August 2012. I take very good care of my hair products and this barely lasted a year. Recently it has overheated very quickly and today it went out and started smoking from the inside and through the cord. Pretty disappointing that it didn't last more than a year but you get what you pay for.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body:
It's powerful hair dryer. And there're many buttoms to secure the user's safty. I like it.
While, it's a little noisy.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Best hairdryer ever my only complaint is that mine cracked after a year. But it still works so I guess not a problem.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I do not speak English, but I'll try, very good product, works well, has the necessary heat levels, I have not submitted any flaw, I recommend, is light, not heavy, my experience has been good with this product.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: This dryer has 3 sppeds which I love and it has a button for cool shot. I found the location of the button was a little difficult for me but after a while I got used to it.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I am very happy with this hairdryer. It is very powerful. I have a long hair and it usually takes me a lot of time to dry my hair, but with this hairdryer I'm done for 5 min. It is also very light and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this product.

product_title: pro beauty tools professional turbo hair dryer
review_body:
It is not light weight, and does not blow dry hair fast. The only thing it has going for it is it's quieter than the one I have.
I was looking for a good lightweight blow dryer. It does not compare to the T3

product_title: conair 1875 watt ergonomic handle hair dryer
review_body: Good, dry fast, except for the size! It is too big to take it on travel~ it can't be folded.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body:
I owned the model before this one for about 8 years. It was fantastic and worked as well as it did the day I bought it, until its coil lit up and a curl of smoke came out the blower. Alas, it was a sad day. I specifically bought this one based on the performance of the other, and it's not lived up to par, by a long shot.

I bought this dryer 6 months ago and the retractable cord already doesn't work. That's the WHOLE reason I wanted this model. This one is heavier, hotter, and the cool shot is really just warm. Not to mention, it's hot pink.

In all, I'm very disappointed with this dryer, and will look for another retractable one next time. I don't recommend getting this one, if that is the feature luring you.

--UPDATE - Sept 2014
This hairdryer totally died a month ago. I'd had it 18 whole months, and it completely quit working. No fireworks, no warning, just plugged it in, and nothing. I tried several outlets throughout the house, and it would. not. work.

I contacted Conair, and based on its model number, which indicated it was well within warranty, they would replace it for free, sort of. I had to pay $15 in shipping to return it to them. I think that's totally bogus, given that the unit shouldn't have had ANY problems in that timeframe. Hopeful, I sent it along. In about three weeks, they sent me another dryer--same model.

Having used the only other dated dryer I had in the house during that three weeks, I can firmly attest that all dryers are not created equally. I recall now why I I loved the predecessor of this dryer, and this one, before it became problematic. It's quieter, the temperature is more controllable, it's well-vented and easily cleaned. Also, the refinement attachments actually fit the former model, snugly. They fall off this one--the one from the deceased predecessor, and the one that came with this replacement. It's virtually no use to me without the attachments.

But honestly, I am not motivated to rate it any higher, because I don't have faith this one will last. That it works well is only part of what makes a product great. Longevity is part of the equation, as well.I am not motivated to rate it any higher, because I don't have faith this one will last. That it works well is only part of what makes a product great. Longevity is part of the equation, as well.

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body: Good power. Light weight. Nice long cord. Only drawback is cool shot button is sensitive and in awkward place. Otherwise great dryer!!

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: i am a woman of color and i have to say i am very, very impressed with this dryer.  rarely can i just buy a product like this one that actually works on my hair (especially when i have to do it myself and i have a very nice grade of hair).  it get really hot and actually drys the roots and straightens my hair.  i wish i could say that for the numerous curling irons i've bought.  the one "con" i have is that if you are not proficient in drying your own hair with this type of dryer you can get burned and you should take your jewelry off. i suggest you get some kind of attachment to put on the dryer to assist in drying your hair.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: high quality product, but hard to switch btwn levels of heat and wind
review_body: Got this product 2 weeks till now, everything works out fine, while the switcher is too flat and thus hard to switch, for example, you will need to push very hard to switch from low to mid wind. This might be a design problem of this product.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I received this a day ago and it works well, is quiet and my hair is still on my head.....I REALLY LIKE THE CONTROLS!  IT WORKS LIKE A CHARM!

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: This is a nice basic dryer.  I don't like the huge dryers, so I bought this for home use to replace a similar sized one that I've had for 15 years but was really ugly.  Aaaaaand, it dries my hair, so no complaints there.  The only thing I don't like about it as compared to my old jungle print dryer is how loud it is.  On high this thing is like a rocket taking off, so I wouldn't suggest it if you often blow dry your hair at three in the morning.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Quieter than most and gets the job done
review_body:
I don't like that high pitched whine that comes from some blow dryers. I had to rely on reviews here to feel comfortable enough to make this purchase, so I am returning the favor.

This blow dryer is sturdy, substantial and quieter than any dryer I have owned previously. The price was reasonable and the shipping prompt. Note it doesn't fold for travel, but that wasn't a factor for me.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Hair dryer works fine and  is powerful. However it is a bit loud and the retractable cord is a bit difficult to use at first.

product_title: jerdon wall mount hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: Does not last.  I bought two and they both burned out in a few months time.  It was Waste of money!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I have had this dryer for about a year now and it has held up great, has great power and is hot enough.  I have medium length & thick hair just past my shoulders and my hair will dry completely with this dryer in 7 minutes.  My only complaint is that the plug is really loose to the wall so I have to plug it into an adapter I have otherwise it will literally fall out of the wall plug.  Also it is very short cord even when pulled out all of the way.  Sometimes when trying to retract the cord it gets stuck and wont go in all of the way so I have to keep pulling it in and out to try to get it to reel up all the way.  When it does this it makes me just want to wrap the cord around the dryer negating the whole idea of the reel.  Overall its been a good dryer though and am glad I have it and it was a good price.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_headline: Yay! I can dry my hair now!
review_body: This dryer is good enough. Although the switch that controls the power of the wind feels a bit unstable, the wind power is just perfect, and the price is really reasonable.

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body: I've had many good hair dryers and this one might be the best. Lightweight, powerful and it makes my hair so smooth.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I was unsure of what to get for my daughter as she has thick hair, this works great for my daughter's thick hair!

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: This was a replacement to my old one which I had for a very long time. The old dryer was dropped too many times that the plastic cover around the power plug was exposed.  My husband didn't want me to continue to use it for fear of being electrocuted because of exposed wires.  Dryer was still working though.  The new one works just fine. I will be taking this with me when we go to U. K.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: looks good,easy to install fast ship like the fact you can take off vent and clean when its time also cord has not tangled

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: This is the best hair dryer by far.  It dries my hair perfect without it burning my hair or getting too hot.  The vendor delivered the product in perfect condition and in a timely manner.  I couldn't ask for anything more.  I am definitely going to buy a second one for my mother as a Christmas present.

product_title: panasonic kurukuru curling hair dryer eh-ka60-k black | ac100-120v/200-240v (japan model)
review_body: I have only used it once but it was quiet. Didn't feel too hot or blow too forcefully. I still had to use a curling iron briefly to curl short hair which slipped through. Dried hair in good time (I have a bob). I liked the reviews it got and was from Japan. Took  a while to figure out some pictures which were not explained on the English page. I am happy with it.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: Easy to install, sturdy after install and has been working OK for almost a month now
review_body:
No issues with light (some people mentioned it died).. been working OK for almost a month now.
Does the job and does it quite well.. quite powerful and dries hair well.. Now for the price its great! the reason I bought this particular one was because I used it at a hotel and liked the product..
Now the reason for 3 stars:
The quality of the stand and the plastic itself are quite inferior, feel like it gonna crank in about 3 months, the first one I had received had a mold defect and there was a huge dent in the middle so I returned it and got another piece from amazon (easy (and free) return I should say!). But the fact that its quite plastic-ey and the second one I received had the same dent (just smaller) so the finishing is not that great... but I should add it works and does what it should efficiently! I think i would give it 5 stars if it was $5 more expensive but was better quality/finishing..

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: My main complaint about this product is its strong plastic odor.  I've let it air out for days and it still smells..  It's a good product, and it is very quiet compared to other hair dryers.  I've own it several weeks now and the plastic components still really smell.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body:
I got this for an overseas trip after searching through dozens and dozens of reviews of travel hairdryers **that come with diffusers** for my curly hair. I figured, why drop much $ on this if they all are mediocre? And indeed I am glad I did not spend much on this one. It does have strong airflow for such a tiny dryer, which is great for non-curly purposes. But the diffuser does not slow down the air flow very much, and on top of that, the diffuser is SO TINY -- no more than 3 inches in diameter. The low setting does not generate quite enough heat, but the high setting has too much air flow. I end up switching between low and high to build up some more heat, and only stick the diffuser into the roots of my hair so it doesn't totally blow out all the curls.

So if you are picky about drying your curly hair with a diffuser, this probably isn't the travel dryer for you. If you just want to give your curly hair a head start on air-drying because you will be somewhere cold, it's probably fine for that purpose. Might be OK if you have very strong tight curls that don't get blown out as easily. Or maybe you can get crafty and block some of the holes in the diffuser...

The dryer did overheat a few times when using it on 220V with an adapter in Europe, but I think as long as you are conscious about not using it on high setting for too long, it should be OK.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: The retractable cord feature was what I wanted in a new hair dryer. That feature only worked marginally well for about four weeks and thereafter stopped working at all. If you are looking for a retractable cord to save space, don't even consider this product. I have three operative dryers at home. This was to be for my motor home. Waste of money!

product_title: jerdon wall mount hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: I always wanted one of those hair dryers like in a hotel. Now I have my own, conveniently hung at the side of  my sink. Plenty of power for drying hair. Easy installation.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: My hair dryer just blew up. I have owned many hair dryers but not one has ever had an internal explosion. It was aimed at the back of my head at the time so I'm not sure if there were sparks but there are large parts rattling around inside now. Can't wait to open it and see the damage. I used it maybe twice a week and it was less than a year old. Never again with a Revlon dryer.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: i got this a while back and its still working just like new. i love it. i wish the cord was longer but its pretty great and still living strong.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I am glad that I purchased this hair dryer. It is quieter than other hair dryers that I have used in the past.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I thought it was a bunch of nonsense when I read this hair dryer did all these awesome things to your hair, but it actually reduces frizz. I'm not sure if all hair dryers do this or if it's just this hair dryer, but whenever I use it I notice my hair is a lot smoother and easier to brush through. I've had it for 2 years and no problems, definitely would buy again!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Bought this as a gift for my mother to replace her old blow dryer. Should last her years to come.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Seems slow to blow. Works okay otherwise. Not a lot of power compared to my much less expensive dryer that lasted 6 years. I should have replaced it with the same one but went with reviews I saw on Amazon about this dryer. Live and learn.

product_title: hot tools salon hair dryer (model: 1059)
review_body: As far as I know so far this thing is better than anything my wife has tried before. She loves it.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: I'll be under there forever and when I get out my hair is still not dry. Maybe it's my hair but I'm nor 100% satisfied.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: have been using now for 2 weeks. good quality, blows plenty  of hot air. the cord winds well into the dryer

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: This item was exactly as described and the price was great.  I would definitely recommend it and purchase this item again.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
Not much to write about, its a hair dryer, and it works.
It has different heat settings and cool attachments.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: it has useful function to me. Good product at an affordable price,I do not regret buying it， like it, love it

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I love it because it's like a package, with a zipping bag. It's small and light and easy for me to carry around.

product_title: conair 207p infinity tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: A hair dryer made for me
review_body: This was my second of this hair dryer because I accidentally left my first one behind at a hotel. I love all of the features especially the cool button for that last blast to set my style. My hair is wavy/curly and I love the diffuser, my hair always looks good when I use this dryer.

product_title: andis 1600-watt quiet wall mounted hangup hair dryer, white (30135)
review_headline: Wall mounted Hang Up Hair Dryer
review_body:
This is my second dryer. The first one broke in half. I used duct tape to make it useable until I received the new one. The motor continued to work well.
I ordered the same model hoping I could use the same wall mounting. But no, they had redesigned slightly and just enough that we had to remove the first mounting and replace it. I like the convenience, but I would really like to see them redesign it with a few more features: keep it compact, wall-mounted, but add a cool function and make it quieter!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! It is very loud, even though they advertise differently. I would recommend it as is, but would love those additional features.

product_title: proversa micro turbo dual voltage portable hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: I took this hair dryer with me on a trip to Europe this summer.  It takes up very little space and is powerful.  In other words it does the job for which it is intended.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body:
Works like a decent dryer, but I didn't see any improvement in frizz-control. I have very thick, frizzy 2A hair, and this dryer could get my hair mostly dry in under ten minutes.

The retractable cord is nice, as is the defuser.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: Was concerned about purple color, but it is not bad, it is a darker purple that looks more regal than gouche. The blow dryer itself is powerful and effective. Good buy.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_headline: Infinity Pro by Conair 1875 watt Hair Dryer - Purple
review_body: Great hair dryer...I use it when on the road or at the gym.  I like the powerful yet quiet air blast it emits (when compared to a previously owned Conair that died)...this is definitely an improvement and I recommend this effective product.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Works perfectly to dry my curls without frizz & in half the time of my old hairdryer...perfect size and weight for me.  Love the bright red color too.

product_title: br beauty meredith 880w salon hair dryer with casters
review_body: This is a great product for the price. It was very easy to put together too. I would order it again.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: I purchased the hair dryer to use in England.  It performed quite well.  It's very light and I look forward to using in future travels in the US and abroad.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Not very travel friendly.  I was hoping that it would fold up.. it doesn't.  It works great as a back up to my normal hair dryer.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I researched a lot of hair dryers before finally deciding on this one. My priorities for a dryer is to not be too loud, and to dry my hair fast. I have thick long hair, and it can take 10-15 mins to get my hair completely dried. My old Conair dryer was working ok, but it was very loud and was taking a lot time to dry. Aesthetically, this dryer is very cute. It is quite large, but I love the texture and the pink accents. Some people had said it was a bit heavy, it is heavier than my Conair, but not too much where I feel like I have trouble holding it. It comes with 2 attachments, a diffuser and a concentrated air nozzle. I use the concentrated air nozzle every day. It is easy to attach and easy to come off. The best thing about this dryer is that it is not very loud at all! And yes, it does dry my hair a LOT quicker. With the help of the concentrated nozzle and a round brush, I can get my hair dry within 5-10 minutes. This is a huge improvement. It comes in 3 settings with 3 levels of heat, as well as a cold air button. The back of the dryer is easy to twist off for you to clean. Overall, I am very pleased with this dryer. Remington also has a 4 year warranty, which is very comforting.

product_title: farouk deep brilliance professional hair dryer
review_body: very high quality product.  it arrived very quickly and was in excellent shape when received.  god-daughter really enjoyed getting it and uses it constantly.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I had this dryer for a about four months until the motor/fan began to spark and I decided it was no longer safe to use. Prior to this however, it worked wonderfully. Shame it broke.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: The unit does the job of drying hair just fine, but would be easier to use if the dryer hood height was adjustable.

product_title: andis 80345 styler hair dryer
review_body: don't like the  attachments, which is what I bought it for.  the brush is flimsy.  the handle design makes styling difficult.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: bought it, lasted a total of four months before it burned out and quit working.  had a sunbeam before that worked for 5 years.dont buy this maker.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: Installed this a few months ago.  Super convenient and looks good too.  I love the night light feature as much as the hair dryer itself.  Power is good with 2 watt settings.  Iconic dryer does dry hair faster.  It was a little hard to get to the tiny screws in the back to get to the faceplate to attach to the wall, but it is sturdy.  I love the design and function.  I want to put one of these in the guest bathroom too.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_headline: Conair 134R 1600 Watt Wallmount Hair Dryer with LED Night Light
review_body:
This product is awesome! Mount it in your bathroom on the wall and no hassle finding and using it.
We have now bought 4 of these (3 for our home and one as a gift to a house guest who loved it).
Highly recommend!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
So, we bought this dryer as a replacement for my wife's old, loud unit.

Unboxed it, and it felt nice and solidly built. And it was about mid-range, volume wise. Also a good selection of heat and fan-speed adjustments. But, the first morning of use, it ran for about 3-4 minutes, then the breaker-plug began to buzz loudly, and emit smoke.

All use was discontinued, and was returned for a refund.

I award it 2 stars for it being a potentially good unit, but subtract 3 for failing. This seems like a fluke, as most of the reviews are positive, but I'm going to be searching for a different dryer anyway.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I've used it only a couple times, i like it. It gets the job done. Had no problems with packaging or delivery, it arrived fast :)

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Works great, and the cord winds up into the handle at the touch of a button, plus the handle folds down so it takes up less space when it's put away. Solves my pet peeve about hair dryers. I wouldn't use anything else, so I bought an extra one just in case they stop selling these (heaven forbid).

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: This is a GREAT product!  Perfect size and very powerful and dual voltage!  I would recommend it highly, it would make a great travel gift.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: I recently purchased this hairdryer after my previous one started to sound like a dying cat and was extremely hot to touch after use.  After a week and a half I love this new one!!!  I greatly enjoy that I can dry my hair on cool and high, with the temperature choices of cool, med and hot, as well as low and high speed settings, and cool shot to set.  It's light weight and efficient - I'd buy it again easily.

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body: It's ok.  I was disappointed in how big it turned out to be.  I was hoping it would be closer to a travel size.  The diffuser is too big for me....but I decided to keep it regardless.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I LOVE THIS BLOW DRYER..IT STRAIGHTENS AND SOFTENS YOUR HAIR INSTANTLY LEAVING IT WITH NO DAMAGE...I USE IT EVERY DAY!

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)

Thank you very much.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: My daughters aren't strong enough to hold my hair dryer with one hand. This is cute, lightweight, feels like a toy but is a real hair dryer that will dry your hair. Wonderful!

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1200 watt folding hair dryer
review_headline: Loved this little dryer for travelling
review_body: Very light weight and worked fine for my hair which is mid length.  Easy to switch voltage which I did before going to Italy. I did use it on high and had no issues so did not experience what some others posted.  You will need just an adapter.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: This very good for that price I thought it was a little bigger but is fine for me. Bye and thank you for the product.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I'm not that impressed. I didn't notice a difference in the time it took to dry my hair. And it's heavier than my old dryer. However I did notice that my hair does look smoother.

product_title: pro beauty tools professional turbo hair dryer

Also, the diffuser is easier than some to use because you don't have to line up anything to put it on or remove it--it's a simple push on and pull off.  Have just started using this, so can't speak to its durability.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Even though heavier than my other travel dryer, this one worked well on my last trip. I like the ion technology, it does seem to eliminate a lot of the frizzies. I also like that it has THREE settings for blowing. Since my hair is fine, the lower setting is perfect for the round brush. The retractable cord made is easy to travel with.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: I hadn't owned this 10 days when it created an electrical issue......the fire department had to come ...I had an electrician come the next day to make sure it was not my electric outlet or circuits and he assured me it was not my electric outlet....he believes it is the dryer.....I would like to return but now am being told by amazon that my window to return has expired.....not impressed with amazon's service....I should add that this is my third one by jerdon....and I have never had any problems previously.....obviously a lemon....would like it replaced for free....with a new one....not a re-serviced one....some one should agree to do that....

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body:
Very easy to install
Works great and the led light is great.
It looks very neat on the wall.
The different settings are perfect.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: This is the best hairdryer I have ever purchased and used. I feel like I am in a salon every time I blow dry my hair. It is definitely salon quality.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I don't like a large, heavy hairdryer so I wanted a small one that I could also use for travel.  Works just fine.

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body:
Totally worth the money, it dries my hair well and quickly.
I would definitely recommend it to a friend. I love it!

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body: I have long hair.  Used to take me 40 minutes to blow dry my hair.  This dryer has cut down the time to 20 minutes TOTAL.  It's a time saver.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_headline: Just like my old one...does what I need it to
review_body:
Not sure it's a professional grade dryer, but I have trouble working with the heavier ones so this is perfect for me.
Also, the price is right.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_headline: It was good while it lasted, but don't waste your money
review_body: I did give a good review after a couple weeks of use.  But forget it now.  Now I changed my review. That 4 year warranty a joke, especially when Onei company won't contact me back after weeks of waiting.  I bought my hair dryer from the MKT Distribution off Amazon.  Good follow-up from this company but I received a bad unit.  I bought my hair dryer August 2013 and it broke down 3 weeks ago.  While I was blow drying my hair all of a sudden the power went down to a 1/3 of what it was.  As if the life was sucked out of it.  It can't even dry my hair now.  It's like a humming useless object.  Nice to know I wasted 90.00.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: Love my blow dryer.  It dries my hair asap. Good dryer, recommend. works well in all levels, love the attachments.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_headline: 'This is my second one that i purchased
review_body:
I had purchased one for my wife to replace another brand that had quit after two years. She loved it and it does a great job drying hair.

I have added another one on my side of the bathroom so we don't have to share. You'll love the fact that it is so small hanging on the wall and out of the way. Ready to use at anytime without have to untangle cords or put it away. It becomes part of your bathroom accessories. Love it.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_body: Love this hairdryer!  I had no idea that there was such a big difference in hairdryers, but let me tell you, there is.  I had a Ceramic heated Conair hairdryer.  While visiting family, I had to borrow a hairdryer because I forgot to pack mine.  The way my hair looked when it was dry was amazing.  It looked so smooth and shiny.  Not the norm when using my Conair.  I looked at the name brand and took note right away.  So glad I was able to purchase on Amazon.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: We purchased two dryers and love them. My wife was in a Chicago hotel where she them. After she got home we decided to order this dryer. This a great dryer for the price. We would recommend the Andis dryer to others!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: This hairdryer is amazing. It is fast, efficient, and doesn't dry outta hair. I'm very happy with this purchase and would recommend this product to a friend!

product_title: sunbeam 1632-040 global economizer hair dryer
review_headline: Wall mounted keeps it and the wires in place
review_body: We saw this in our hotel room and decided to purchase one for home and it worked out great for the guest bathroom.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Blow drying my hair is by far my least favorite activity everyday so I like to get a powerful blow dryer that can help speed up the process... this one is great! I strongly suggest to anyone looking for one with power!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_body: I use this everyday and absolutely love it, nice color, light weight and love the retraction cord, awesome blow dryer

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I love this hair dryer. It has amazing power, yet is drying my hair very gently. My hair feels smooth after drying it which is a huge improvement compared to my previous hair dryer.

product_title: conair the power of pink ionic hair dryer
review_headline: its pink and it works great
review_body: a great budget hairdryer and its also pink. that in itself is enough to love. glad I got this product and it shipped fast.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
This is the hair dryer I have been looking for. I have had an ionic dryer many years ago and had trouble finding one that actually works as they are supposed to. I tried this one that my daughter had, and bought the same one. I have very short, straight, thinning hair. This dryer does not frizz my already fragile hair. It works beautifully to dry my hair without the frizz and dryness of most other brands that I have tried (even ones that say they are "ionic".
My only complaint is that the concentrator does not swivel, causing me to twist my hand while holding it, instead of moving the concentrator into a different position.
Other than that, I would certainly buy this hair dryer again. Bonus - A GREAT price for a GREAT dryer. Much less expensive than others and does just what I wanted it to do!

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body:
anyone else have trouble attaching the nozzles for this dryer. Neither one of them screwed in place. I am returning it and ordering another in the hopes that this is just a defect specific to this dryer.

*** The replacement arrived and still had trouble screwing in the nozzles. So I asked my daughter-in-law if she could do it. She promptly snapped them into place. After which she made some vague references to dementia that I couldn't quite follow .... 😉

So I have amended my rating because it really is a quiet yet fast little dryer.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: Who knew there could be such a big difference in hair dryers?  Well it's true!  This hair dryer is SO powerful, it dries my hair much quicker than other models.  I love it.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_body: This little dryer fits the bill perfectly.  It is one great addition to our bath room.  Don,t know why we didn't get one sooner

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: If anyone is hesitating about whether or not to purchase this hair dryer, you'll be sorry if you don't get it! My hair is naturally curly, but it's a frizzy curl so I often like to blow dry it straight. This dryer is by far the best dryer I have ever used on my hair. Not only does it dry fast, but my hair looks shiny too, and the best part is it holds all day! The only negative thing I can say about this dryer is that the function buttons are on the inside grip, so I'm constantly pushing the buttons when I'm holding the dryer, a bad design. Otherwise, I love this dryer!

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: There are four thickmaned, long haired females in our household and this hair dryer has been fantastic in tackling drying and styling! It's also surprisingly quiet which is a bonus for early (5am) hair-prep. When our other hairdryer goes up in smoke, I'm going to get a additional Conair.

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body: There's really nothing bad to say about this blow dryer. It's great for the price! And the compact feature comes in handy if you travel a lot.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: I purchased this hairdryer by a recommendation from my hair stylist.  He suggested it would work perfectly for my naturally curly hair when I decide to blow it out straight.  This dryer works extremely well and helps cut down the drying time without frying my hair.  It's definitely worth the money.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Beyond my expectations.  I have had Vidal Sasoon dryers  for many years.  They were reliable and very good. I will continue their products.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: The hair dryer works well. I purchased it based on the 5-star reviews it had received from the few reviewers available at the time. Light weight... various heat settings... positive and negative ion adjustments... etc. My only disappointment is the price. I've tried better or comparable professional hair dryers that are about $20 less expensive. I thought this dryer would be better than those, given the price and excellent reviews. It isn't. Oh well! Still keeping it. Rationalization: It's a perfectly good dryer.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: I have the wall mounted turbo, and decided to purchase one for our new camper.  I do prefer the wall mounted one but didn't want to mount in a camper.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I bought this hair dryer about four years ago and it's been great. I'm really fussy about the air flow, most dryers don't seem to push enough air through to satisfy me, but this one is perfect. It drys quickly, and the heat settings are perfect. The only problem I've faced is about 6 months ago the product starts to make high pitched screaming/squealing noises, and they are LOUD. I like to dry my hair upside down, and I can't anymore because the dryer is especially noisy (I believe the fan unit has come lose and shakes around in the barrel which leads to the screeching). Besides that, it's lasted a long time, and it's a great product at a price you can't beat. After 4 years my current one is probably unsafe to use, so I am ordering my second one soon.

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_headline: Great Hair Dryer for a Cheap Price
review_body: This dryer is really great and simple to use; nothing fancy but def gets the job done; I luv the color and has a hook on the bottom to hang :)

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: I had a small travel hair dryer that finally broke after many years of use. i looked on line for a similar one but the Conair was the only one that folded so I though it might be the same size. it was not. Great for home but too large for travel.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: I originally rated this a 4 star but am now changing it to a 1 star because this dryer broke quickly.  I would re-done the review sooner but didn't think of it.  Don't waste your money!!!!

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Much bigger than expected. I was looking to replace a tiny yet powerful hair dryer. This one is not as compact as it appears.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I have very curly hair, and the finger diffuser is perfect for dryer my hair without messing up my curls. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants a high quality hair dryer that works for all hair types.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Bought this for my boyfriends dad for his birthday.  He loved it, the cord retracts great, and it works great.  Its not to big, and great to take with you on the go.  Plus it gets the job done!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: blows warm now.  cool blast no longer works either.  this is ONLY 9 MONTHS old.. what a POS
review_body:
don't waist your time or money on this one.

This POS is only used for an hour every other week. My $10.00 Braun one lasted 7 years

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: My mom had two of these hairdryers, Both of them have shot sparks out the end when I used them

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I purchased this hair dryer to replace a Chi dryer, one almost twice as expensive as this one, that was none-too impressive and had broken on me twice in a year.  I was somewhat skeptical of spending even $80 on a dryer as my last adventure had not been very successful.  However, this dryer does not disappoint!  It's reasonably light weight, powerful and easy to grip for self-done blow-outs.  I will say, it's not particularly quiet, but I am a consumer level user so I could really care less how much noise it makes.  All in all, it's a solid purchase, highly recommended!

product_title: sedu revolution professional hair dryer (4000i)
review_body: LOVE LOVE LOVE! It seriouskl y dried my hair half the time made it feel silky smooth its quiet compared to my drug store ones. Omg it's awesome. Buy it

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1200 watt folding hair dryer
review_body: Exactly what I wanted, very small and very powerful. Perfect for travel. Amazon should make it easier to go back in and order another, no option for that on your confirmation site after you get the product.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I got this blow dryer on Christmas of 2011. After a good year and two months of use it started making a shrill sound and started squeaking. I ignored it thinking maybe something was what could I do about it? But then after that in the 3rd month of year two (15 months) I started sparking the coils turned bright red and literally shot fire through it at my head. This brand is supposedly a good brand but I disagree. A blow-dryer should last longer than 15 months. Especially one that was used maybe a total of one week a month. I would steer clear here if you don't want to light your hair on fire

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I went thru chemo and my new hair is frizzy so I needed a special dryer and the Onei MK is it. It worked beautifully in calming the frizzes and finally being able to style my hair.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Ansis RC-2 Ionic 1875 Ceramic Hair Dryer
review_body: This ceramic, ionic blow dryer is great.  It has awesome power and dries my thick hair very quick. Its the only one its size that has a retractable cord. I love its size/ performance.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: This one seems to work great. However, I do think the level of the wind is a little bit wired.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: It does the job well, but it is a little heavier than I'd like it to be.  I needed a full size dryer because I have long hair and it gets caught in the air intake of the lighter weight, smaller travel versions.  There are no exposed screws on which my hair can get caught, as there were on other dryers I've tried to use.  I've always used and liked Vidal Sassoon dryers, and this one is no exception.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Nothing special here.  Just a very basic hair dryer.  I like the color and the cord, but not the drying power.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Love it!  Works fabulous, not too hot and does everything it says it will.  I'm no hair pro and only use it for my 4 year old daughter but it works great for us ... also love the small size for storage and the retractable cord ROCKS!

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body:
Have owned 4 of the 30125 model units, I like the small size and heat ranges.
Andis support (unit replacement )when required has been in less than a week, no questions asked.
The high low switch is somewhat prone to failure which has occurred at least twice in the last four years; otherwise this model is quite reliable.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: this dryer is very compact, and has good power for a little dryer.  I purchased it for my travel bag and used it for the first time this weekend.  I was very impressed with how hot it got, how small it was, how well it worked, and how fast it cooled after using it.  I would highly recommend.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: There is a big difference in my hair using an ionic/ceramic dryer. I would give this one 5 stars except for 1 thing. A blue light goes on when using the ions. Shouldn't be a big deal - however, it's right in your eyes as you dry.

product_title: elevate by andis 80405 professional lightweight tourmaline ceramic ionic 1875 watts hair dryer
review_body: I use this blow dryer daily, it works for me, that way I won't have to borrow my daughters on. a good price as well.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I purchased this to replace a 14 year old Conair sufferering from heating element failure.  The old I got for its claim that it was quiet, to use near my sound sensitive husband and hoped that this would be the same.  It is and more!  It does not claim to be quiet but it is.  It is delightfully light to hold too.  The 6 setting options work well.  I am more than satisfied, I now hope for a long lasting relationship.
