product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: The blow dryer works great, so far i have had no issues with it. The retractable cord is convenient. It al o is not as noisy as some other blow dryers.

product_title: babyliss pro one 'n only argan heat ceramic hair dryer, 1875 watt
review_body: Aside from being a bit heavy, I love this dryer. To be fair, I had been working with an ancient blow dryer that didn't have ceramic or tourmaline heating plates so of course this would work far better. And I've been using the argon oil that came with it which is a dimethicone-based product... of course my hair would be silkier than when I use my homemade aloe & grape seed oil concoction. So whether its the dryer, the products or the combination- I'm not sure. But in either case I am happy with the results each and every time. (I've used it 4 or 5 times by now.)

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: This is a great hairdryer for the money. It's light weight and has a cleanable filter which should extend the life of the dryer.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Its a little heavy, but works great for such a low price. The attachments were what won me over :)

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body:
I like the folding handle; saves space. Expected to be smaller but since it folds,
The hairdryer is a good quality and dries my thick hair pretty fast and gives a
silkier texture.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_body: It was way too loud, does not dry the hair as fast as other hair dryers. It pulls way too much current making all the places were I have used it tryp the brakers..... Was not happy at all and gave it away

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: I absolutely love this dryer! It was very easy to assemble and gets extra hot. I would definitely purchase from this company again in the future and would recommend anyone who is in search of a good quality hair dryer to give this one a try.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: This bonnet hair dryer fills the bill.  It dried my hair in no time flat with the bonnet and when I used the dryer wand brush attachment it made my hair very silky.  The one thing I wish is that the bonnet were a bit larger, but all in all it exceeds expectations.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: I owned this dryer for a year when flames shot out of where the dryer connected to the electrical cord.  As a result, my nightgown and chest were burnt.  The burn I sustained took four weeks to heal and left a two inch scar on my chest.  Frankly, despite the severity of the incident, I was grateful that my face or hair were not involved in the incident.  As I thought the malfunction was due to wear and tear, I purchased another one.  After five months, the dryer gave off sparks from the same location.  I was not injured that time.  I contacted Revlon and encouraged them to recall or discontinue the model.  DO NOT purchase this product -- I consider it highly dangerous.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body:
The number of heat and airflow settings are exactly what I need. The purple color is beautiful.
It uses toggle switch (instead of sliding switch) control and is very easy to change modes. Airflow is adequate in high setting. I expect this to last 2 - 3 years (based on my experience with Conair hair dryers).

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: Always wanted one of these and this one is great quality so far. My hair is so straight and tangle free. So much easier than using a comb and dryer with both hands.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body:
The Hair Dryer died on us after using it for a month. All style but no substance with this product. The slide switch almost came off and will not work. No air for my hair! The only thing that worked well on this dryer was the night light.
Not recommended unless you want to throw money away.

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: light, powerful, plug a little big, but over all a great buy, and easy to use, easy to pack, does it's job!

product_title: panasonic nano-e nano care hair dryer eh-na95 | ac100v 50-60hz (japan model)
review_body: The hair dryer is very nice. Just one drawback for me. As the standard voltage is 100v, in north american, I do no dare to use other level than set.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: I bought this dryer just because it was my favorite color. It turns out that it also is a wonderful dryer. I love it. Lots of power and quiet. /Quiet enough to use on my puppy who no longer is frightened of being dried after his bath.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: We receided this product  at the Garden Hotel  in perfect conditio ok it was ok I will recommend to may relatives and friends

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I really enjoy this hair dryer. I needed it to straighten my unruly beard. I don't just it everyday but its loud fast and efficient.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I was looking for something nice but quiet. This isn't bad - doesn't have the high pitched sound some of them have - though it's still a hair dryer so quiet is relative. Both attachments are easy to use and overall very happy with this dryer, especially for the price.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_headline: It Looks Like a Toy, but
review_body: When I first opened this hair dryer, I was quite dismayed!  It was much smaller than I expected - so small in fact that I doubted that it would work at all.  Last night I washed my hair and decided to try out this "mini toy".  I was truly amazed;  while it didn't dry my hair quite as quickly as my large tourmaline dryer, it worked nearly as quickly.  For travel, you can't go wrong with this dryer!

product_title: sunbeam 1632-040 global economizer hair dryer
review_body: The temperature and speed is just right.  It doesn't dry out my hair.  I would highly recommend this hair dryer

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_headline: Broken after a few months use
review_body: The hairdryer was working well but suddenly started making a really loud noise after a few months use. The seller was really helpful and sent out a new one which is working well.

product_title: turbo power 1500 hair dryer
review_body:
I was expecting this blow dryer to be hot really hot but it's not. I don't know maybe is just me
that thinks that way. It gets the job done so I shouldn't be complaining.

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body: This dryer is wonderful, the power you have is second to none .., a little heavy but worth it for the results it leaves. I am very happy.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body:
this one is good and gentle on the hair, however I have not used many so cant really compare.
This one is nice and cheaper on Amazon so go for it.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I have been getting this dryer for 5 yrs each  time I get it I love it more.  I have now got my sisters using it.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_headline: Small and lightweight...just what I needed!
review_body: I have limited strength in my hands and therefore needed the smallest and lightest weight hair dryer I could find and this fit the bill!  The main brands seem to no longer carry one this small, so really had to hunt for this one.  The low speed seems more like a medium speed which I liked.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I purchased this to replace my old Conair folding handle dryer. That one was a bit more compact, which I liked, but this one isn't bulky and works really well. I appreciate the ability to control both the temperature and speed of the air. I would definitely recommend it.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: ABSOLOUTLEY USELESS. WAS SENT DRYER FOR USE WITH AMERICAN ELECTRICITY SUPPLY!!! TO USE WOULD HAVE HAD TO BUY MASSIVE TRANSFORMER.SCRAPPED IT AND PUT IT DOWN TO EXPERIENCE

product_title: conair bb075w pro blackbird 2000-watt hair dryer
review_body: Great dryer but the first one lasted a couple of months, the second died after about 5 blow drys! So listen to the other reviews, I didn't and now I have to buy another dryer. Update: Tried a third, it died after 3 or so blow drys. Clearly defective model, it can't handle it's own heat.

product_title: andis 81290 tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body:
Andis apparently makes products for beauty salons and barbershops. It shows in the products that they make for the general consumer.

Bought this model because of the retractable cord. Great feature if you don't leave your blow dryer on the counter all day and are sick and tired of wrapping five feet of cord around the handle every time you're done. It hangs up when it retracts every once in a while, but it keeps the cord out of the way.

This model has more settings than you can think up reasons for. Two power settigs - 1875W and a second lower setting I never use. Three heat settings and three blower settings. And then add a cold blower setting.

Only reason I didn't give it five stars is because I also bought an Andis traveler blow dryer (RC-2) for the gym (w/ retractable cord and folding handle) that I like better;

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: This thing BLOWS (and not in a good way)
review_body: I purchased this to use for travel. As in, only occasional use. I've had it for about a year but have only actually used it a handful of times. This weekend I brought it on a trip. I plugged it in, and after only a few seconds, the wind died. I let it rest for a few minutes and tried again. Once more, only a few pitiful seconds of tepid warm air before it died. What a pile of crap. Andis owes me damages for the emotional trauma of suffering through an entire weekend with bad hair. Don't waste your money.

product_title: br beauty meredith 880w salon hair dryer with casters
review_body: I am very happy with the dryer so far. It fits in the limited space I have in my salon. I love the way the controls work and I was very surprised how much heat it generates. I am very pleased that it works on a 110 plug as opposed to a 220. I do feel that this is one thing you need to add in the description of this item. I almost did not purchase it because I did not know this piece of information.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This is a standard hairdryer. I can not say, as some have, that it made my hair look any shiner. It does dry my hair just as quickly as any other blow dryer.... no faster, no slower. The different heat settings are varied. Hot is really hot, so I just use the medium heat setting. I have only had it for a month, so I can not comment on its durability. I would recommend it, but, it is a hairdryer, I can not say it will make your hair look any nicer than any other hairdryer.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: Excellent item, already bought one. Not too big, good power, good handling, wonderfull on the wall. Very good item. Very recommanded.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Makes a good dryer for my daughter to take to college with her.... would recommend it again and would buy again.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: This is my third Yellow Bird.  I keep one as a spare just in case -- air flow and heat are superior to any product (including the Conair family) that I've ever used.  I've bought them for both daughters, who will also continue to use them as long as they are produced.

product_title: revlon 1875w rectractable cord, fold & go hair dryer
review_body: This dryer dries hair fast with various heat options and speed.  The retractable cord is very convenient.  I bought this dryer after I used a similar dryer in a Hampton Inn Hotel and loved it. I am surprised at the complaints about this dryer.  I have used it for a year with no problems and I still love the dryer.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I came across this hair dryer at a Hyatt hotel and I was impressed with how quick it dryes my hair (I have lots of thick hair) leaving it looking shinny.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, 36 ounce
review_body: This is the best blow dryer ever. Gets super hot I was using The Chi deep brilliance dryer for my Dominican blowouts which was good but this twin turbo cuts my blowouts to half the time and gets far more straighter with just the blow dryer. You've got my vote.

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body: Drys hair quick! A little bulky but worth it.  The other reviews were worth reading for this item. Thank you

product_title: conair pro styler ionic conditioning hair dryer
review_headline: Went completely dead in less than 12 months
review_body: It was great when it worked, but it went completely dead without any warnings in less than 12 months.  So that speaks so much about its quality.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: This is a great hair dryer for the price, and was sent out and delivered to my house ultra fast.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: I really like this dryer.  This dryer really gets the job done, not only does it dry your hair but it straightens my natural locks

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body: Purchased this for our trip to Europe this year.  It worked like a charm and insured that I was not going to blow up another hair dryer on our annual international sojourn.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I like this hair dryer, it comes with a defuser which I LOVE! Also it has a cooler setting which lets me style without the heat! The price is great and the dryer is top quality!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: The best l have ever used.  Can see and feel the difference in the way my hair styles after drying.  Not too heavy and the controls are placed conveniently to enhance changing the temp and air velocity.  Reasonably priced and with Amazon Prime-----no tax and free 2 day shipping....hard to go wrong.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I had been looking for a professional style blow dryer. My hair was growing back thin after cancer. My old blow dryer didn't give volume to my hair as this dryer does. Wish I had it sooner.

product_title: andis 80345 styler hair dryer
review_body: Extremely loud.  The concept of the side usage is fantastic and that is what I am searching for.  This product is just too loud.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Hot setting should be Nuclear!!!  Watch out!
review_body: I like this hair dryer but the hot setting on it is beyond hot, it's brain boiling!  Use with extreme caution!

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: This is a good dryer, especially for travel use.  The only complaint that I have is that it is heavy to hold after a while.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: My old blow dryer was really bad, so I looked up to read a lot of reviews. This one had quite good reviews, and I'm quite satisfied with this purchase! :)

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body:
I really really like this product. It does a great dryer my hair (I definitely get a salon quality finish with it).

However, this is the second Yellowbird I've bought in 2 years. Both of these stopped generating hot air within 9-10 months. Just blows cold air. It's the oddest thing.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: A good hair dryer but it is a very big
review_body: This hair dryer is easy to use and dries hair fast but its a little too big so if you have small hands this hair dryer is definitely not for you.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_headline: good product, relatively light weight and dry faster
review_body: good product, relatively light weight and dry faster. I love the metallic look purple. I found it's better to use warm temp i/o hot temp, my hair become less fuzz and more shine and smooth.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This blow dryer throws a lot of air, however the air is not necessarily hot enough to dry your hair fast or smooth. Takes a long time to dry my hair and it does it a little frizzy compared to my previous blower which I had to throw Away because the cable began to get hot. But it's a good blower for the price I paid!

product_title: remington compact ionic travel hair dryer, (colors vary) d5000
review_body: I absolutely love this hair dryer. I have long curly hair that I blow out every other day and this hair dryer has been perfect for that. The one downside is that it only lasts about 2 years (I just ordered my FOURTH), but that's actually pretty awesome considering the price. And it's so small that I can take it with me whenever I have to travel for work, rather than risk whatever the hotel might have. I definitely recommend this dryer.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: Great hair dryer. Blows hard & dries my medium long, fairly thick hair dry in 3 minutes. Love it!!!! Would definitely recommend this for any type hair.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: I can set my hair and fall asleep while drying with this hair dryer, It's everything I was looking for and more. Perfect for get sets and tight curls.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_headline: bought it as a gift for my, wife ...she loves it
review_body: my wife remembers her teenage days when this was all the rave ...now she uses it after shampooing and is extremely happy ...she swears this was the best product for the job and at a great price ...if you want to get something for the missus...this is it, you can't go wrong

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_headline: Best hair dryer I've ever owned!
review_body: This is the best hair dryer I've ever owned. It dries my hair in 5 minutes compared to the 20+ minutes it use to take me (I have very long hair). The only reason I gave it 4 stars is due to the location of the settings button on the handle. When holding the hair dryer it is easy to acidentally change the settings but you get use to it.  Overall great hair dryer!!!!

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body: i have thick hair and it always seems like I have to spend FOREVER drying my hair.  This blow dryer is small but powerful.  I love that it folds up to store easily.  My long hair dries in just a few minutes

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: I can't seem to keep the comb attachment on, but I think that is because my hair is so thick. Other than that, it works. Does what it is supposed to!

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: So fast and lightweight I love it even my hairdressing blow dryer was slower than this one .. I am glad it blew up ! Love love love this product

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body:
So originally I had purchased a Andis 75370 Tourmaline Ionic/Ceramic 1875 Watt Hair Dryer last year. The dryer was um, well I didn't like it that much. Too make matters worse, the attachment began falling off with the slightest touch. That becomes very annoying since my hair is so thick.... Anyways, I received this dryer on Saturday which was the day it was supposed to arrive. I had missed the delivery, but I was so anxious to get it that I went to FedEx and picked it up. I ordered this along with the Denman Brushes Thermo Straightening Brush (D79) . So I am Black and I have 4b natural hair. I had been trying to straighten my hair for the longest. I also recently purchased a Babyliss Pro TT Tourmaline Titanium 1.5-inch Steam Styler off of overstock.com, which I like way better than the HSI The Styler Ceramic Tourmaline Ionic Flat Iron Hair Straightener, 1 inch I also purchased last year.

So the whole point is, I really like this hair dryer so far. I wish I could have got the blue one but it cost almost $11 for shipping which made it not worth it. The color is very vibrant. O yea the main thing is, the dryer dries my hair very quickly. The cord moves with you and was a fairly good length. I would recommend this product.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: I ordered 2 of these dryers and returned both.  My hair is very thick and it didn't blow hard enough nor hot enough to dry my hair.  If you don't have really thick or long hair--it will probably work just fine.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Light weight and not too loud
review_body: Liked it.  The cord is definitely shorter than normal. Liked it because I feel it dries well but not at the expense of my hearing.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: My daughter has enjoyed using the hair dryer. She wanted a blow dryer that could handle her thick hair, and this one does.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: Don't buy this item. I bought it after my Vidal Sassoon stopped working and this is garbage! I've never reviewed anything until today because  this was SO BAD. The buttons popped off, the temperature goes from hot to cold to hot to cold every 30 seconds while on hot and sparks come out about every 45 seconds or so. I'm not lying. I have  to use this at my own risk because I don't have a replacement, but I'm on my way to trying to find something that might not cause my hair to catch fire. Save yourself the trouble and go buy something else.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: This dryer might work wonderfully.  I wouldn't know.  It arrived and I opened it and was shocked at how big it was.  Much larger than the photo or specs indicated.  Not suitable for travel, but I can't comment on performance.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Excellent performance and quality--heavier than many other dryers, but with a solid feel and excellent fan performance.  I like it more than other dryers I have used.

product_title: andis 1600-watt quiet wall mounted hangup hair dryer, white (30135)
review_body: USED AT THE BEACH IN THE HOTEL, LOVED IT, AM GOING TO BUY ONE SOON. THANK YOU BARB. DONT HAVE TO SPEND A LOT OF MONEY.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: My elchim hair dryer is a very powerful product that helps me style my hair with ease. It has many settings and temperatures. I highly recommend this item to laymen and professional stylists.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_headline: very good but a little noisey
review_body:
very easy to install and works very well, Better than expected. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because it is a little noisier that I would like .
But its great.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: For all the loud sounds it makes, you'd think it was fiercely blowing air, but you'd be wrong.  It gets hot, but the air volume is low.  If stolen, I'd buy something else.

product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_body:
During normal use, the point where the cord enters the protector on the plug developed a bad connection such that it would only work when the cord was in a certain position. We had the same hair dryer before purchasing this one, and the same issue occurred, and eventually it just stopped working all together.

This time around though...while using it, the cord sparked/shorted and started on fire in the wall socket. The dryer works well when it's not trying to burn the house down and the cord functions properly (if that's something you're looking for). There is clearly a quality control issue with this product and I'd suggest you try something else.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: The old hair dryer that my wife and I used was old and started giving off a burnt electrical smell. While I was online ordering another product from Amazon, I decided to give the hair dryers a quick look. After looking at several, I chose this one because of its features and low price. I must say that we are quite pleased.

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body:
Not only did I receive the WRONG product, but it was also used when it was supposed to be NEW. I have this exact product at home, so I know what it's supposed to look like. The product that I received did not have the twist handle, and it came with 2 of the same attachments. I bought from Lucky Sales. DO NOT buy from them.

I reordered this item from another company and still didn't get what I wanted. It's the right blow dryer, but it came with only 1 attachment. Disappointed. Guess I'll just have to order from folica.com.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Lasted about a year and half
review_body: I have had this hairdryer for about two years and I have to replace it.  At about the one and half year mark it started emanating a horrible smell.  I take care of my things--there is nothing I can see that found its way inside that would be causing this smell.  Even prior to this issue I was never impressed with this product.  It never had a lot of power.  Wouldn't recommend it.

product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_body: This blow dryer is great for traveling.  The fold up handle allows for easy packing.  The cord retractor is great

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: But somewhat noisy.  This is a big improvement over my 15 year old Conair with a higher volume of air pushed out.  Works like a hair dryer should with a compact form.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body:
I ordered this from Amazon and got it really fast,
I used it today, and it made my hair nice and smooth.
It's seems nicer than I thought it would be for $20.00

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: My previous Conair had more power, I really don't see how this is 1875 however it dries my hair just fine

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: My old one had less watts and was much better than the new one. The old dried my hair in half the time it takes now.

product_title: t3 featherweight journey travel hair dryer
review_body: Excellent hair dryer!  Bought this T3 Featherweight Journey Travel Dryer at Amazon.com with  Zadro Next Generation Lighted Travel Mirror & 12 inch Brown Faux Crocodile Pattern 4 Extendable Trays Doctor Style Makeup Bag.  So looking forward to my next trip...  thanks Amazon!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I like it so much, I bought two, for two separate bathroom. It is good for the price you pay.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: I like this hair dryer very much. It hangs on the wall so one does not have to get it out and plug it in. It also has a nice nightlight built in and that's handy in a dark bathroom.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: This hair dryer hangs in the wall in the bathroom so you have more room in your drawers. It works well, but needs to be replaced every few years after daily use. It is powerful enough for my family, but if you have thick or long hair with a lot of girls in your family this hair dryer might not be powerful enough for you.

product_title: conair 1875 watt ionic ceramic folding handle hair dryer
review_headline: Conair Ceramic Turbo Siver Hair Dryer
review_body: I received my Conair Hair Dryer and I love it. I had many other Conair dryer's in the past and i find this one is a sure bet. Those flexible ones just don't do the trick for me anymore. I like that it's sturdy and it blows really well.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: I bought this hair dryer because of the price. It dries my hair nicely. It claims to have ion technology but I think it is a gimmick. My hair dries frizzy with this hair dryer like it did with my previous one that was old and didn't have ion technology.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Used this at a Hyatt Resort in CA.  I immediately bought one through Amazon on the stop.  works great ad is compact.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I love this nice looking hair dryer.  It's powerful, yet sized perfectly for home use.  I highly recommend this product.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: Hair dried and smooth in mknutes!
review_body: Great dryer causing less frizz and easy to use. Relatively lightweight with two good setting. A minute or two on high followed by brief low and shoulder length hair looks Fab!

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I would have preferred to have an in between setting but am adjusting to the high speed/low speed. It is very light weight and small which will work great for traveling.

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Great product, lives up to its name, it is compact, lightweight, plenty of power.  I would recommend it to anyone that travels with a hairdryer.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: my other ionic hair dryer just quite, so took a chance on this brand and not sorry what so ever!! fairly quiet and love the optional speeds and temp's that my other one didn't have.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, 36 ounce
review_body: Was recommended by my hair stylist and I love it! I have thick curly hair and needs a hair dryer that can handle that in a jiffy ... found what I was looking for. Thanks!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
I bought this to replace the exact same model we had for the past 6 years. My wife had dropped our last one for the last time. It didn't stop working, but had so many cracks and was so loose, I was working she would electrocute herself sooner or later.

Anyway, we/she liked it so much, we bought the same model.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Slightly larger than I hoped but works for me. Does not pack down very small.  Does dry my hair fairly quickly.

product_title: panasonic kurukuru curling hair dryer eh-ka60-k black | ac100-120v/200-240v (japan model)
review_body: I like this kind of hairdrier. It leaves my hair a little frizzy but it is light and easy to handle.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: This hair dryer was listed with a "cool shot" which I specifically wanted.  When it arrived I noticed it did not have that feature.  I decided to keep it anyway and plugged it in.  It ran for about 30 seconds and stopped.  Never to run again.  I have another Andis product and it works fine.  I could have paid to ship this item back which seems wrong to me since it was not as advertised.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I purchased this hair dryer for it's Ionic qualities.  I live in an extremely dry and often windy climate, and my hair tends to get fly-away very quickly.  After using this hair dryer only once, I noticed a great improvement in that my hair was no longer as fly away as before.  The dryer has great features, and does the job extremely well.

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_headline: Worked great in China and Hong Kong
review_body: None available.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: Andis hair dryer is very good product.  Protects your hair, the hair dryer is very neat, and it gas a long cord, I love it.  Also, very good price.  I  recommend it.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: nice.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_headline: very convenient and easy to use
review_body: I had one of these hairdryers for several years and had to get another when the old one quit.  Easy to use.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_headline: A Bit Disappointed at First -- But Satisfied with the Seller
review_body:
I have owned an older version of this Sunbeam hair dryer that worked well for many years -- I'm thinking at least 10. Unfortunately, this model was purchased just several months ago and already the On switch will not always catch. I have to keep pushing it or the Off button to get it to work. Often I find, also, that the red Reset switch was triggered. I haven't yet contacted the company, but hope very much that they or Sunbeam will make a complimentary replacement. If so, I will write a new review. If not, never again will I buy a Sunbeam.

New review: The company from which I bought this hair dryer stands behind their product. I have been sent a replacement as well as prepaid postage to return the original. I am very pleased with this company's customer service. I do hope that this Sunbeam product is free from defects. A wall-mounted hair dryer can certainly be convenient.

product_title: sunbeam 1632-040 global economizer hair dryer
review_body: It works so nice and does not take up much space. We love it. The tow speed also is really nice

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: I've had mine for close ten years & still works great.
review_body: I love my hair dryer.  I was only looking because my mom needs a new hair dryer.  I saw a few negative reviews about the quality.  So since mine is pretty old, I can't vouch for the current quality standards of this product.  I've been super lucky with mine.  It gets daily use if not more. I always wished it had additional heat settings but using the cool burst has worked well for be. My cord has never frayed as others reported, but many times the last few inches of cord don't retract. I keep it clear of lint and I think that is a huge saver on its useful life.  I hope everyone has the excellent experience I have had.  Everytime I look at a Revlon or Conair hair dryer, I cringe. I've never had one of those last more than a year. After 10 years, I would purchase this product again, but mine just doesn't want to die just yet!

product_title: pibbs ttec8012 twin turbo 3800 professional ionic and ceramic hair dryer, black, 2100 watt
review_body: being a professional hairstylist i got so tired of expensive blowdryers that dont dry the hair any better than the cheap ones. THEN, i read the reviews for this dryer and again i thought, yeah right. SOOO, i bought it and i must say, this blow dryer rocks. it dries the hair in half the time and leaves it smooth and shiny!!! FINALLY, i found one that delivers on its promise

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: Excellent product!!!  It heats up super fast and is lightweight for easy use.  This dryer would've cost me a fortune at a local beauty supply place.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_headline: Best dryer I have ever had!
review_body: My $160 blow dryer burned out on vacation.  I really could not afford to spend that kind of money again, but I have curly hair so having a good blower to straighten out my hair is important.  This one was cheaper, but I had never heard of the brand before so I was hesitant, but after researching and reading the reviews, I figured I would go for it.  All I can say is I love it!  It's quiet, it's light, it has alot of heat settings, the buttons are positioned well, and it works better than my old blow dryer as far as straightening my hair.  My boyfriend who also uses it, even commented on how much he likes it, and he is one picky kind of guy.

product_title: turbo power megaturbo 3000 professional hair dryer
review_body:
excellent the product
the goods came complete with all accessories in very good condition.
the dryer works great and is equal to the image that is published

product_title: conair pro styler ionic conditioning hair dryer
review_body:
This hair dryer is powerful and does s great and quick job of drying my hair after a shower. The price was right and it was shipped quickly by Amazon.
It is an excellent value for the money.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I bought this for my wife - in fact she didn't even know I got it for her until it arrived. The (now previous) unit she had was making me deaf - from halfway across the house!!  This is much, much quieter, and the frequencies it produces are not ear shattering. She hasn't complained, so maybe she was thinking the same or perhaps she just likes how it does her hair - she looks good to me!!.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Conair use to be a great product, and due to the fact of personal use over thirty years of different hair dryers, I purchased this model. The folding andel, and retractable cord were attractive to me, but the dryer did not last a year. I used it every morning for three to five minutes, but everything now a days is built cheap, and doesen't last. Same with this model. Great size for travel, or small storage, but don't expect it to last.

product_title: fhi heat platform nano salon pro 2000 powerful tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I bought 2 FHI Heat Nano Salon Pro 2000 w/ Nano Fuzeion.  One was a gift.  I used mine and it's great!  I have dry frizzy hair and it's the first dryer I've ever owned that made my hair straight, soft and shiny with little effort.  My daughter thought I used a straightener. I highly recommend it - it's well worth the cost!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I wanted a hairdryer with decent power/air output, that was fairly quiet, at a decent (consumer) price. I was tired of other weak hairdryers that didn't have enough air output, and found this one had the power to dry my thick hair. The finish is a nice rubberized maroon color that looked good too! It's pretty easy to hold, smaller in size and weight, and has a long cord. The lint screen on the back is easy to access too, which is often what causes a hairdryer to lose its air flow, so that's super handy.  I actually purchased a second one of these online (the first one broke, my fault, after I slammed it on the counter oops :S) after Wal-Mart stopped carrying them so I'm a happy customer reviewer (and I'm pretty picky)

product_title: conair pro styler ionic conditioning hair dryer
review_body: This is a good dryer. I gave it 4 stars because it doesn't get as hot as I would like it to, but that's just a personaly thing. Definitely gets hot enough for your hair.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I wanted this style hair dryer which is very hard to find in stores. This one fit the bill perfectly. Have only used it twice but appears to work fine and was exactly what was advertised. So far I am very please and happy with this product.

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_body: I'm in love with this dryer!! My hair usually takes 45 mins to dry and with my new dryer it takes me 30. It is very comfortable and with all the space inside the air gets through quickly having your hair dry pretty fast. I would totally recommend this to everyone. It's at a good price also.

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body: Great Hairdryer with Twin Fans. Does make a scary screeching sound if the power drops. The Hair Dryer is not red, it is pink. also it does NOT have Ionic drying which is a good thing in my case.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I love this product because it does a great job at drying hair with multiple drying settings, but mainly it is great in that it is not bulky like most hair dryers. It folds in half, has a retractable cord, and is fairly light.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: This is second time i've bought this dryer, after first one servced me well.  It's powerful but not LOUD with that annoying whiney sound they usually make.  I love the recoil of cord.  Happy happy, for second time.  :)

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I wanted a smaller hairdryer to take with me while traveling and this is perfect! I couldn't believe how small it is when folded up. Only reason I haven't given it 5 stars is because I haven't used it yet but for travel purposes, it's well worth the money!

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
I took one hair drier from my country. but it doesn't work because of .different voltages.

so I had to buy a new one, then I select it, I got it in two days. it is so fast!

It is perfect@!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: This is a great hair dryer, and not just because it keeps the chord inside... many hair dryers get super hot even on meduim heat, this has a very soft medium heat, and is hot enough... and I am not sure what all makes it work so well, but it dries hair FAST.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: I got this hairdryer for my daughter and after seeing the results had to get one for myself.  I have very curly hair that is always frizzy in summer so matter what products you use.  This is the only hairdryer that seems able to dry my hair (in hundred plus degree summer heat and humidity) and keep away the frizz.  Best investment every.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: We visit my brother in another state for several weeks at a time and we keep items there so we do not need to lug them back and forth when traveling there. We wanted to have a spare hair dryer there, as when our large family gets together there are often items in short supply. This hair dryer fit the bill. IT IS RATHER LARGE. But it does fold up and the cord does retract. Despite its size, it still fits the bin that we use to keep our stuff there. It is fairly powerful and does a very decent job of drying your hair. The only con I can find is that the back end where there is a mesh screen or dust collector, does NOT appear to be removable, so as dust bills up, it will be a bit awkward to clean.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: first the price is really good. I've used it frequently several months and it works well. a little loud but just as most dryers

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Kept looking at different ones and finally decided on this one. I have hair I blow straight everyday so I need something that will last and so far no complaints on this one. Good output and a nice weight.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Cord won't retract after two months
review_body: I bought this model for the retractable cord and folding handle.  After using it 2-3 times/week for the last 2 1/2 months, the cord has frayed in one place and it has stopped retracting.  On the plus side, it was an effective hair dryer, but there are several that work as well.

product_title: conair 207p infinity tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I had one like this for about 8 years. Even though it still works I figured I should retire it as an extra or back up. I searched everywhere and bought several new hair dryers but none compare to my old one. I googled the serial number of my old one and with awesome luck I found the exact same hair dryer that I loved for all those years. Thank you Amazon for the quick delivery and the great product.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_headline: curly cord to short for ease of use
review_body:
design is ugly, cord to electic outlet is great lenght, heat settings are fine, setting for blowing are fine
the curly cord from the unit to handle is way to short - will not reach more than 2 1/2 feet
hard to reach mirror and dryer is handing on wall only 1 inch from the mirror

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: I like this dryer. Compared to its price, it's worthy and both simple and useful. The shape and its power are impressive.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: This compact hair dryer works very well and gets hot quickly getting the job done.  The diffuser was too tiny fro my long hair. Would buy again.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Excellent... A++.+.+.++++++.  It works perfect and is very hot to dry hair.  Excellent article, very low price and ussesfull. Thanks

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: After buying cheap, but high watt  dryers for years, I am a convert. This has cut my drying time in half.

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body: I bought this for the diffuser for traveling.  The air flow is so strong that it doesn't really diffuse very well and my hair ends up being blown all over.  If you just want a compact dryer for traveling this would be fine.

product_title: conair 1875 watt mid-size hair dryer
review_body: While this is bigger than the very small dryer it replaced, it is a light weight at the other, drys hair in minutes, and overall is exactly what I wanted.  I read most of the reviews of this dryer and others before ordering.  I know Conair products are good and a good value.  I'm satisfied with this purchase in every way.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: air leaks from several places, bad quality
review_body: After about two weeks of purchasing, air leaks from the handle, the switch, and the back of the dryer. I concerned there will be electricity leakage, who knows when.Today I want to return it, but it says the return is only allowed within 30 days. I was too busy to request the return when I first found the problem. The product is of poor quality and dangerous to use, plus the short time warranty. I will never buy it!!!

product_title: twin turbo 3200 ceramic and ionic professional hair dryer, 1900 watt
review_headline: This is an ideal item I bought for my wife who is hair stylist!
review_body: This is a professional hair dryer that works with hair stylist is better than ever I guess...Because I didn't hear any complaint or comments from my wife so far!

product_title: jerdon wall mount hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_headline: Blends in with the custom cabinet.
review_body: This hair dryer fills the bill to a tee.  It is small, but yet it performs just as well as the former larger unit.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: She needed a new one, so I surprised her with this one. She absolutely loves it. Its the only thing she uses.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: My husband and I used this dryer at the Ritz-Carlton Naples!  We liked it so much that we ordered Four:  two for home and two for the gym!

product_title: panasonic kurukuru hair dryer eh-ka25-p pink | ac100v 50/60hz (japan model)
review_headline: Only hair dryer that I will use.
review_body: I have curly, coarse hair.  This hair dryer allows me to have straight hair and maintain the natural volume in my hair.  I ordered two, just so that I would never be without it!  Love this product!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I do not like Conair products but my wife insisted to get this since the price is low. It will break, it's just a question of when. I recommend looking at a BaByliss.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: WORKS GREAT,DRYS HAIR FAST LIKE THE LONG CORD.SHOULD OF PURCHASED THIS DRYER A LONG TIME AGO ,HAD MANY OTHER HAIR DRYERS THIS ONE IS THE BEST FOR THE MONEY.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_headline: Worked great in US and will also use in Europe.  Great size for carry-on bag.
review_body: Packed easily in my one carry-on bag for flight to MA.  Was strong enough to blow dry my hair straight just as my larger home dryer does.  (Might have taken a few more minutes but perfectly satisfactory).  It will work when I fly to Europe also, which is very helpful.  Seems as reliable as my previous Conairs--have always liked this brand.

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing hair dryer
review_body: This is the second one I have had.  The old one finally gave up after many years of use.  It is the right size for me and not too many features to confuse me but enough to do the job - and nicely.  I think I'll purchase another one to keep in my RV.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: Worked well for a while.... then died :(
review_body: I bought this product last year. It worked extremely well while it lasted. It died today. I guess I have to purchase another dryer again. Not sure if I will buy this one again or not. I think a hair dryer should last more than a year.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: This is my second one in 8 years and I think it is great. This new one is for a new home.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This is the noisiest hairdryer I have ever used. Apart from waking anyone who might have been sleeping, it was headache inducing. It operates well and looks good but the noise factor was unbearable. I am not a whinger and am pretty easy to please but this was not worth keeping and was returned.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
This dries my hair very well, and doesn't cause any frizz. I have naturally thick, long, curly hair, so whenever I decide to straighten my hair, I need to ensure that it dries halfway straightened (I use a flat-iron after I am done drying). The concentrator does an amazing job straightening my curls while leaving my hair without frizz and fly-away hair (I also use One N' Only argan oil to help control frizz). I use the diffuser whenever I want to dry my curls, and I love the way my hair turns out after a few minutes of drying.

This purchase was definitely worth it!

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_headline: Took it to Europe, plugged it into 220V, and it started smoking. it never worked.
review_body:
Took it to Europe, plugged it into 220V, and it started smoking immediately.

it never worked. It obviously is not dual voltage.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_body:
It does exactly what its supposed to. Perfectly dries your hair in no time!
Fast and furious ,no frizz love it

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: You don't need a flat iron after using that tool! It looks nice and its really affordable !! Glad that I got it!

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body: This was the first time I spent  more than $40 for a hair dryer, so I was expecting it to be great. But after about a month the attachment nozzle kept following off. However the dryer works well, it is still aggravating for the nozzle to fly off while drying my hair. I should have returned it. Too much money for an okay hair dryer!

product_title: t3 bespoke labs 83888-se special edition evolution professional ionic ceramic tourmaline hair dryer
review_body:
Hair dryer was amazing until it started to struggle and make sounds after 2 months of use and completely stopped / broke at 6 months. Contacting the company direct for a replacement since Amazon could not help.

$135 is too much to pay for a hair dryer that lasts 6 months,... even if it was amazing when it worked!

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body:
My wife likes it very much. It's better than the last one she has that got too hot.
Thanks,
Jim

product_title: elevate by andis 80405 professional lightweight tourmaline ceramic ionic 1875 watts hair dryer
review_body: It doesnt do what it says, its not as described,my hair is static not very powerful, compare to other hairdryers

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This is the only dryer I use. I love the force and power it has. If you want volume this is the way to go

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: It does what it is supposed to do, and reasonably priced. I don't see any difference from my old dryer though. Dries hair fast enough, has three heat settings and 3 speeds.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: wow. she is awesome woman say that it doesn't take long to dry there hair. I need to order one more for my daughter.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w hair dryer with cord hanger
review_body: This is a great product! The instructions are very clear and it was super easy to put up! Def. recommend!

product_title: t3 featherweight journey travel hair dryer
review_body: This has hardly any power.. there is another product Pro Beauty Tools Pbdr5886 Professional Travel Hair Dryer, White and Black  which is far cheaper at $25 and 1800 watts, ionic and dual voltage. I dont know why people complain about size of T3. Honestly you can get a smaller lighter dryer which are even more rubbish but light?!, you cant expect power from a smaller motor. I was actually looking for a full size hair dryer which is dual voltage. I dont care about weight so much as performance. Cant seem to find one :( But this is waste of money. By the way to note there is only ONE button for heat and fan. So only TWO settings, the description is misleading. You have low fan and high fan. That's it. There is no adjustment for heat level despite what the description says.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body:
I bought this to replace another Remington that I'd used for a few years. So far, I've been really happy with my purchase. I chose this because of the quality of Remingtons I've had in the past, and this one seems to be just the same as the others. Quality. The blow dryer does have a slight rubbery feel. I've never had one like that. Can't say I care; it's just different. Not better or worse.

I did choose this one specifically because of the attached diffuser. Essential for those of us with curly hair, and it works well.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: The perfect dryer for travelers.  I owned a earlier version of this compact dryer from the mid 90s until 2013.  Used it everyday.  Extremely powerful for its size.  Would still be running if I hadn't plugged it into 220 volt outlet in Europe before flipping the switch from 110 to 220 volts.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I have never owned an professional hairdryer. Mine are usually fairly cheap (under $25). That  being said, this is the best I have seen in it's price range. The attachments fit without being whipped across the room for no reason like my others and it dries hair twice as fast as my previous. I don't have as many split ends either. For durability it has held up fairly well being used at least once daily by a complete klutz who drops things. Never any damage, cracking, or peeling. It is also quite pretty! Some say it is heavy in the reviews. While I was used to a lighter one, I only noticed a weight difference the first few times before it seemed normal to me. The only issue I have had with it is that my long hair will sometimes get sucked in the back. I have learned to keep it held higher. And since it is slightly heavier than my last I guess I get a light work out while doing so, lol. Overall a very good hair dryer and I would recommend.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: Not what I expected from Andis
review_body: This hair dryer was loud and cheaply made. I returned it! The fan was rattling and very loud. I would not recommend.

product_title: conair 1875 watt mid-size hair dryer
review_body: Small hair dryer, perfect to put on you travel bag and use anywhere. Works perfectly. I recommend this product to anyone

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: This hair dryer did not work after 2 weeks. I would not recomend anyone purchasing this hair dryer.  No manufacture info on box either.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I was happy with my new dryer but totally burnt after a month use. Lucikly we have not any injuries!!!

product_title: panasonic kurukuru hair dryer eh-ka25-p pink | ac100v 50/60hz (japan model)
review_body: bought it when my other one broke. love it! i recommend everyone to use this product regardless of the hair type you have.

product_title: andis 1600-watt quiet wall mounted hangup hair dryer, white (30135)
review_body: Used this dryer in hotel and liked it so much that I searched online and found it at great price on Amazon.  Dryer is compact, dries hair fast and heat setting is not too hot.  You have option of mounting on wall bracket or not.  I use as home dryer and also take with me for travel.  Great little dryer and prefer over many other name brand hair dryers I have purchased in the past.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: These were a VG price, so I bought 4 of them so that I could have one in each of my bathrooms for my guests...was tired of having to lend my dryer to family and friends staying overnight at my house.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_headline: LOVE the convenience of this blowdryer~always ready to go when you need it!
review_body: This is my second one. Had the first one for many years and now replacing it with new one. Was so glad they were still available as my family loves this blow dryer. It is so handy and ready to go when ever we need to use it! LOVE!!

product_title: conair thermal shine 1875 watt hair dryer 1 ea
review_body:
I dry my hair almost every day as my hair is rather long. This little beauty does its job, and does it well. There are plenty of settings and options to choose from, depending on what you want and what is best for your hair. I have no complaints whatsoever.

Update: It's been several months now, and I still use this product almost every day, and it still works great. This is easily the best hairdryer I've ever purchased - strong, fast, and definitely good quality!

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I really like the hangup dryers because they save counter space. I don't like this as much as the  last one I had (when it stopped working I threw it away before writing down the manufacturer so I couldn't reorder it), but I'm sure I'll get used to it. It's heavier than my previous dryer, and I'd really like a setting that's between LOW and HIGH, temperature-wise. Fairly easy to attach to the wall, although the template wasn't of much use.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, 36 ounce
review_headline: Great blow dryer, but it only lasted a year and a half.
review_body: The vendor sent me the European voltage model at first and almost didn't take it back at first.  When I called back, they not only sent me another one, but two more.  Fortunately, I had the second one, because the first one pooped out after only a year and a half.  I hope that this second one last longer, as it is an expensive blow dryer.  It does a very professional job and was recommended by my hair stylist.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I love that the cord is kept inside the hair dryer.  No more tangled cord. Glad I bought hair dryer.

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: This blow dryer is light weight, easy to use and quiet.  I love it and it's a great buy for the money.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I upgraded to this dryer from my basic Conair dryer and thought I would get something good based on the reviews, but really, it was a waste of money to simply buy another blow dryer. It doesn't do anything better than previous ones I've owned, and in fact, seems to make my hair slightly MORE frizzy. Plus, the buttons are placed right where your fingers wrap around, so I had to train myself to hold it differently as the first few weeks I kept switching the buttons in the middle of drying. I've seen other complaints about the motor shorting out, and so far, I haven't had any issues like that, just not really impressed with how it dries my hair. And no way is it really quiet. Pfffft.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body:
I am writing this review to save anyone interested in this dryer to beware! If you have thick hair you will not find this brush to be adequate. I have medium long hair and am white, but my hair is very thick.
I know this dryer style is usually advertised for African Americans but it works well for caucasians with thick hair as well. I found a different dryer that is working great. Conair is the manufacture.

Other than the brush this dryer appears to be well constructed. I did not use it so I can say how well it drys.

product_title: conair ionic conditioning 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer w/ retractable cord and folding handle
review_body: My last one burnt out after 3 years of use. Hope this one will last longer. It works very well especially when 3 people use it daily.

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: This is not as good as the hair dryer I use at home, a Conair 225NP Comfort Touch Tourmaline Ceramic 1875-Watt Hair Dryer. For compact, portable, it is not that small. For use as a regular hair dryer, it takes awhile to dry, and just hi/lo heat and volume. My previous portable one was smaller and dried better. This works OK.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_body: These are great.Our other got used so much , it finally quit. Reason 3 girls.enough said. so go buy one.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Dries well, runs cool, if that makes sense...
review_body: The dryer does its job well and despite its large size is fairly easy to handle.  Speaking of the handle, it stays cool, as does the rest of the casing.  It is a bit noisier than I thought it would be but it has a deeper sound than our previous dryer... which kind of whined.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: Just what I was looking for! Had one almost identical but fried it in Iceland. Shopped all the locals and could not find this really small size. Bought one with a folding handle thinking that would make it workable but not so. Found this one on Amazon and it is the perfect replacement. Blows like a fool and is small enough to pack.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_headline: Overall it was a good buy
review_body: I bought this blow dryer to replace another one that I bought online (the previous was not powerful enough). I really like the cord feature but it can hurt you if you aren't careful. It retracts VERY quickly! Overall, I love the blow dryer and am happy with my purchase.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body:
I love Andis products. They all tend do a great job heating up quickly and drying and straightening your hair.
Also, their flat irons are great as well.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I was a little skeptical about buying this blow dryer because of the mixed reviews, but I have had the dryer for at least a month and had no problems with it.  I like it very much.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: My daughter just loves this small hair dryer.  However, it is advertised on Amazon having 1200 watts.  I have a Kill-A-Watt's meter to test the house wattage, and this hair dryer reads 981 watts on high and 255 watts on low setting.  However, it works great and saves some energy.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I have had the blow drier for almost a year.  I love it.  I shut the bathroom door because the light is a little bright however it is great for those middle of the night potty breaks.  It works great for me and I use it every day. One thing that I dont like however it could be because I dont know what I am doing.  Every time I go to use it I have to click the switch on the mount.  it does not automaticallyclick on when I pull it off then push the on on. I have to always click the switch.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body:
I bought this item for my elderly mother.
She and others have tried to use it but
the hose keeps coming detached from the
bonnet.
I would not purchase this product again
or recommend it.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body:
this product does not work well ensendido the button came broken and I can not turn off

este producto no trabaja bien el boton de ensendido vino roto y no lo puedo apagar

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: This is the third wall mount I have purchased. L ove the convenience and that  I don't have to keep in a drawer.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: Bought this for wife and sisters-in-law to use when visiting.  They love it and the retractable cord keeps down the mess.  Comes with each to attach and remove diffuser and concentrator attachments.

product_title: jerdon wall mount hair dryer with 2-speed and heat settings, 1600-watts
review_body: This hair dryer meets all my requirements.  It is compact, the cord stays out of the way the unit is reliable.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: This blow dryer works great for me. I am African American with natural course hair. It has the perfect amount of heat to my hair to straighten just enough so I don't have to use a straightener. But, when I do put heat to my hair after using this blow dryer it lays down so beautifully. I highly recommend this.

product_title: conair 1875 watt mid-size hair dryer
review_body: This is small enough to take on the road and is also small enough to keep at home.  The power is very good.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I bought this hair dryer because it was small and lightweight.  It also was touted as saying it worked on dual voltage for traveling.  I tried it in the U. S. to make sure it worked.  The first time I used it in the U.K. (after switching the voltage) it got very hot and stopped working.  So disappointing. I only rated it one star because the color was nice.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: This is the third unit I've purchased.  They last two or three years.  It is very convenient and has a nightlight.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: It's a good hair dryer, works great on all settings also a great price can't go wrong for the money.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: I just received my dryer 7-19-2013 luv it.. I have thick hair and needed a blow dryer that can do the job this dryer straigthens my hair something kinda serious.. I would recommend it..

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: Believe it or not, I actually bought this to replace an 1875w Dryer by Revlon that was at least 10 years old. I was used to having a button for heat and a button for speed of fan. I see only the one button and it has heat and speed together, I think. There is a cool shot button too. Guess I could read the direction booklet if I did not throw it away. Either way, I like the dryer. It has a trip button on the outlet plug that is a safety feature that helped once on the old one when a thunderstorm went by and I was using the dryer.  A good feature. The dryer is lightweight.

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_body: A little larger than I thought it would be. Very easy to place on the wall. I would recommend this item.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_headline: Does not blow cool air at high speed
review_body:
I never want heat.
I just want cool air blowing hard.
But this dryer will not blow cool air on high speed.
It blows cool air softly just fine.
But, if you turn up the speed, then you get hot air.
So, for me, this dryer gets 1 star.
But, for the other people in my house who want hot air, it gets 5 stars.
So, I am settling on 3 stars.

product_title: conair yb075w pro yellowbird 1875-watt professional hair dryer
review_body: Love it love it love it.  The hair dryer with attachment works great and dries my hair fast.  Buying one for my sister

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: Conair Infinity: Too Bad It Doesn't Work That Long
review_body: The first Conair I ever owned lasted me almost 22 years, so I definitely wanted another Conair and was willing to give the Infinity 223XR a try. I loved the 'Cord-Keeper' idea and the power provided by this model, but after going through two of them in a three year period, I cannot recommend them. Normally I wouldn't write a review, but this is the second Conair Infinity 223XR model I've owned that has exhibited identical problems: the cord stops retracting properly after a few uses and then the dryer one day simply ceases to function. The first one I purchased lasted almost 2 years before it stopped working. Because I take good care of my appliances and they tend to last a long time, I thought I had simply gotten a lemon. It happens to the best products every now and then. Unfortunately, the second one did not perform any better and stopped working after only 7 months. The problem doesn't appear to be motor or fan related. Rather, my husband suspects an electrical issue with either the cord or the plug. Regardless, I am done with this model!

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: This product is geat pushes air fast and hot. three speeds to suit everyones needs. Light weight. not too bulky. Best blow drier i have ever used. Dries hair fast

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_headline: you get what you pay for
review_body: I was hoping that this Revlon drier was a great bargain, and that its price of $12 wasn't an indication of a cheap or shoddy product.  When it arrived, I was chagrined.  It was a very light, very cheap feeling product, which also only had two possible heat settings.  All in all, a very unimpressive hair dryer; I guess sometimes you do get what you paid for.

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body: My hairdresser recommended this dryer, I love it it drys fast and if I use a round brush, my hair comes out straight hardly have to use my flat Iron.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: After the first exact same model stopped working after 18 months, I bought another since my wife liked the style. When the new one came, it fit the bracket exactly as the first.  The only difference is that the new one is noisier than the first one.  Not sure why, but it is annoying, especially in the morning.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: THIS IS MY 2ND. ONE, MY FIRST ONE BROKE WHERE THE HAIR DRYER HOOKS INTO THE MOUNT, I WOULD MAKE THAT AREA STRONGER.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I love this dryer. My old remington was amazing so i knew i wanted to stick w/ the same brand. Its amazing. Works great and the color is the best part. plus it feels like velvet!!

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_headline: Wish it had cool air setting...
review_body: This is a good product.  I've been using it for a month.  It installed well and is easy to use.  I knew when I bought it that it only had high heat and low heat settings, but I've been surprised by how much I've missed having a cool/air only option.  If they had a version with that feature, I would give it five stars.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: This hair dryer is great. I have very thick hair and it dries my hair quickly. Very nice.  Good price too!

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I'm very happy with the hair dryer.  I like a wall mount hair dryer so it is constantly out and available out and yet off the bathroom vanity.  I've had this for a while and have no complaints.  I didn't buy it for the nightlight but it's still working after being plugged in for 24 hours a day for awhile.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: This blow dryer works great. My hair looks really shiny after using and soft. The blow dryer is a little heavy. I would buy again.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_headline: Not as good as I hoped.
review_body: A  holder piece  inside o f the holder  broke in a month so I am unable to hang it up anymore. Too late to ask for a replacementWill not purchase anotherfrom this maker..

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: This is a poorly made product and I'm not buying it again. I'm going to write the Andis company directly.
review_body: I have bought 3 of these in 5 years, they fall apart one way or another. I will in no way buy a 4th.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_headline: Best hair dryer I've ever had
review_body: You can choose hot, warm, or cold air in high or low airflow. The long cord allows you to move freely.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: My hair is very thick and curly. I used to to blow dry my hair as straight as I possibly could, and it did a fine job of achieving the results I wanted. It's sturdy and I love the attachments.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: I like simple, lightweight and efficient and this was perfect.  Like the lighter heat option for finer hair like mine.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: This works very well.  Fits nicely in my hand.  Good for travel and / or  as your main hair dryer.

product_title: babyliss pro babfrv2 volare ferrari designed professional luxury mid sized hair dryer, red, 2000 watts
review_headline: Fast on the track AND on the Hair
review_body:
Although Ferrari is a car's brand it's been known for some decades specially because of the design it's cars offer and now they applied it to the hairdrier.

It's said to have a professional quality and it DOES. The item works amazingly well and looks very beautiful so as you'll when using it.

The hook on its base makes it easy to keep the cable together after the use. The unit is very compact and travel is quite easy as well.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: Dryer good, bed good for one
review_body:
